title: Metro de Lima llegará hasta Ancón en la Línea 3: Dina Boluarte anuncia inicio de estudios para obra
creator: Frank Capuñay
content: El alcalde de Ancón , Samuel Daza , sostuvo una reunión con la presidenta de la República, Dina Boluarte , en el Palacio de Gobierno para discutir los diversos problemas que enfrenta su distrito. En el encuentro, Daza expuso temas cruciales como el transporte , la línea 3 del Metro de Lima , la seguridad ciudadana y la necesidad urgente de rescate financiero para superar la crisis económica de la Municipalidad Distrital de Ancón. Línea 3 del Metro de Lima llegará hasta Ancón Durante la reunión, Daza destacó la promesa de la presidenta Boluarte, quien se comprometió a iniciar los Estudios de Factibilidad para la extensión de la Línea 03 del Metro de Lima o su ramal hasta Ancón . Este proyecto busca mejorar la conectividad y reducir el tiempo de viaje para los más de 3 millones de vecinos de Lima Norte , beneficiando especialmente a los residentes de Ancón. La reunión contó con la participación del ministro de Transportes y Comunicaciones, Ing. Raúl Pérez Reyes, representantes de la Autoridad de Transporte Urbano (ATU) y otros funcionarios del Ejecutivo. "La reunión ha sido muy fructífera y productiva, agradezco a la SPR Dina Boluarte, quien de manera articulada con el MTC y ATU, se ha comprometido a iniciar los Estudios de Factibilidad para que la Línea 03 del Metro de Lima o su Ramal llegue hasta Ancón. De esta manera todos los mas de 3 Millones de...

title: Ayu Ting Ting Kesal Datangi Rumah Pelaku yang Serempet Mobilnya di Jalan Tol
Junger Mann in Lebensgefahr: Balkon mit sechs Menschen bricht von Hauswand ab
content: Sechs Menschen stehen im Hamburg auf dem Balkon eines Mehrfamilienhauses, als dieser plötzlich unter ihnen nachgibt. Die Frau und fünf Männer stürzen aus der dritten Etage in die Tiefe. Ein 30-Jähriger kämpft um sein Leben. Beim Absturz eines Balkons sind in Hamburg am Abend sechs Menschen verletzt worden. Ein etwa 30 Jahre alter Mann habe lebensbedrohliche Blessuren erlitten, sagte ein Sprecher der Feuerwehr. Zwei weitere Menschen seien mittelschwer und drei leicht verletzt worden. Der Unfall im Stadtteil Langenhorn habe sich gegen kurz nach 21.30 Uhr ereignet. Wie es dazu kommen konnte, ist noch völlig unklar. Der Balkon sei am 3. Stockwerk eines Mehrfamilienhauses aus den 60er oder 70erJahren angebracht gewesen. Er sei nicht komplett nach unten gestützt, sondern quasi um 90 Grad nach vorne abgeklappt und hänge immer noch an der Gebäudefassade. Alle sechs Menschen auf dem Balkon, fünf Männer und eine Frau, seien auf die Erde gestürzt. Sie kamen ins Krankenhaus. Die Wohnungen an der betroffenen Seite des Hauses seien geräumt worden, sagte der Feuerwehrmann. Statiker müssten nun überprüfen, wie weiter vorgegangen werden könne. Das Regionalportal "Moin.de" berichtet, dass es bei einer Einweihungsparty zu dem Unglück gekommen sei.

title: Desabastecimiento de medicamentos en Colombia se debe a problemas estructurales en la fabricación, aseguró el Invima
creator: Licsa Gómez
content: El Instituto Nacional de Vigilancia de Medicamentos y Alimentos (Invima) se pronunció sobre la implementación de planes de acción que ha puesto en marcha el Gobierno para abordar el desabastecimiento de medicamentos en Colombia. De acuerdo con la entidad, la situación es atribuida principalmente a problemas estructurales en la fabricación y al no reporte oportuno del estado actual de los productos por parte de los titulares de registro. Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . Esto ha llevado a que, según la entidad, se tomen medidas urgentes para enfrentar la crisis, en dos frentes principales: resolver los trámites internos y coordinar con el Ministerio de Salud y Protección Social y diferentes actores del sector de salud, incluyendo productores, titulares, pacientes y sociedades científicas, para identificar las causas y delinear soluciones viables. Estas aproximaciones incluyen la creación de mesas de trabajo que buscan abordar estas problemáticas desde la raíz. “Se están sumando esfuerzos con el Ministerio de Salud y Protección Social para encontrar soluciones que podamos ejecutar entre todos,” resaltó el Invima. Este enfoque colaborativo también llama a los titulares de registro sanitario y a los importadores para que provean la información detallada sobre el estado de sus históricos de producción y detecten posibles falencias...

title: Jaunpur News: आदेश नहीं मानने वाले राजस्व निरीक्षक और लेखपाल पर कार्रवाई
content: जौनपुर। नगर मजिस्ट्रेट इंद्रनंदन सिंह ने बुधवार को बताया कि चंद्रधर पुत्र राम अक्षयवर ने जनसुनवाई में प्रार्थना पत्र देकर राजस्व निरीक्षक और लेखपाल के खिलाफ पत्थरगड़ी न करने का आरोप लगाया। जांच करने पर पता लगा कि राजस्व निरीक्षक और लेखपाल ने जिलाधिकारी और उप जिलाधिकारी के पूर्व के आदेशों की भी अवहेलना की है। इस पर उसे प्रतिकूल प्रविष्टि देने के साथ ही उसकी वेतन वृद्धि भी रोक दी गई।

title: Trump cố gắng nói về kinh tế khi vận động tranh cử ở North Carolina
creator: Thanh Long
content: – Cựu Tổng Thống Donald Trump hôm Thứ Tư, 14 Tháng Tám, cố gắng tập trung vào vấn đề kinh tế khi vận động tranh cử ở North Carolina giữa lúc ông bị áp lực phải thay đổi chiến lược chứ không nên tiếp tục công kích cá nhân Phó Tổng Thống Kamala Harris, theo The Hill. Trước ủng hộ viên tại Asheville, cựu Tổng Thống Trump tuyên bố ông chỉ nói về kinh tế. Tuy nhiên, nhìn chung, bài diễn văn này cũng tương tự những bài diễn văn vận động tranh cử trước đây của ông. Ông chê bà Harris cười xấu và không thông minh, rồi ông lại nhắc tới vấn đề nhập cư, cáo buộc vô căn cứ rằng một số người nhập cư Mỹ “đang giành chỗ của con em chúng ta.” Ở phần đầu bài diễn văn, cựu Tổng Thống Trump chỉ trích Phó Tổng Thống Harris về vật giá tăng cao làm đời sống người dân khó khăn. Ông đổ lỗi cho bà Harris gây ra lạm phát dai dẳng và tình hình kinh tế tệ hại ở nhiều nơi của Mỹ. Ông kêu gọi cử tri nhớ lại họ cảm thấy ra sao suốt bốn năm ông làm tổng thống để so sánh. “Ở đây có ai giàu hơn dưới thời bà Kamala Harris và ông Joe Bất Lương hơn dưới thời chính quyền ông Trump không? Có cái gì rẻ hơn dưới thời bà...

title: Water advisory rescinded for the lower zone of the Okanagan Falls water system (Penticton)
creator: Casey Richardson
content: Photo: Erin Dawn Brown water in Okanagan Falls last week. The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen announced on Wednesday afternoon that they are rescinding the water quality advisory issued last week. After unexpected water demand spikes stirred up a significant amount of sediment in the watermain, residents started reporting brown water coming through their taps. The RDOS and the Interior Health Authority (IHA) have announced that the advisory issued last Thursday, Aug. 8, for the Lower Zone of the Okanagan Falls water system has been rescinded. The advisory that began on Monday, Aug.12, for properties on Maple St., south of 10th Ave. to Ferguson Pl. is still in effect. The RDOS also reminds all business owners/operators (hotels, motels, bed and breakfasts, restaurants, wineries, stores) and public facilities operators it is their responsibility to notify customers of the rescinded advisory. For further information, contact the RDOS Utilities Department at 250-490-4135 or toll-free at 1-877-610-3737.

title: State, local officials failed 12-year-old Pennsylvania girl who died after abuse, lawsuits say
content: PHILADELPHIA (AP) — The state, two counties and different schools missed warning signs and failed to protect a 12-year-old Pennsylvania girl who was suffering abuse at her home before she died in May, according to lawsuits filed Wednesday by the girl's family. Malinda Hoagland's half sisters filed suits in Pennsylvania state court as well as in federal court alleging that the defendants negligently missed red flags, including that the girlfriend of Malinda's father who was helping care for the girl had a previous child abuse conviction. Malinda’s father, Rendell Hoagland, and the woman, Cindy Warren, are facing murder and other charges stemming from the May death of Malinda in Chester County in suburban Philadelphia. Attorneys are not listed for the pair. “The civil claims seek to ensure that full and complete accountability will be achieved for the heinous actions of the educators, case workers, and institutions who all failed Malinda miserably," the half sisters' attorney, Tom Bosworth, said in a statement. The suit mentions tragic treatment, including that she was chained to an air hockey table, denied food, forced to hold books over her head and do pushups. She was regularly berated and covered it bruises, the suit said. The Chester County district attorney's office arrested Rendell Hoagland and Warren after they reported Malinda was unresponsive in May. She was taken to...

title: State, local officials failed 12-year-old Pennsylvania girl who died after abuse, lawsuits say
creator: AP
content: PHILADELPHIA (AP) — The state, two counties and different schools missed warning signs and failed to protect a 12-year-old Pennsylvania girl who was suffering abuse at her home before she died in May, according to lawsuits filed Wednesday by the girl's family. Malinda Hoagland's half sisters filed suits in Pennsylvania state court as well as in federal court alleging that the defendants negligently missed red flags, including that the girlfriend of Malinda's father who was helping care for the girl had a previous child abuse conviction. Malinda’s father, Rendell Hoagland, and the woman, Cindy Warren, are facing murder and other charges stemming from the May death of Malinda in Chester County in suburban Philadelphia. Attorneys are not listed for the pair. “The civil claims seek to ensure that full and complete accountability will be achieved for the heinous actions of the educators, case workers, and institutions who all failed Malinda miserably," the half sisters' attorney, Tom Bosworth, said in a statement. The suit mentions tragic treatment, including that she was chained to an air hockey table, denied food, forced to hold books over her head and do pushups. She was regularly berated and covered it bruises, the suit said. The Chester County district attorney's office arrested Rendell Hoagland and Warren after they reported Malinda was unresponsive in May. She was taken to...

title: 3G Capital top Q2 moves include cutting Meta, new stakes in Uber, MercadoLibre, Carvana
El camino para que la industria musical del país aproveche su potencial y crezca
content: El desarrollo del talento musical se viene impulsando por cuenta de los artistas que ya tienen un reconocimiento internacional, pero también de aquellos que están comenzando a surgir . En conversación con Miguel Ramirez, lead label manager en la disquera BorderKid Records en joint venture con Sony Music US Latin y director de management en WIP Records, aseguró que las tendencias de la industria están cambiando. (Vea: Coliseo MedPlus presentó balance de su operación en el capital del país ) Contó su caso de éxito, la colaboración en la canción de Bad Bunny y Grupo Frontera, ‘un x100to’, que fue uno de los hitos de su carrera personal, pues este hit musical a nivel global que alcanzó la posición número 1 del mundo en menos de 24 horas en todas las plataformas digitales. ¿En qué momento llega a la música? La música siempre ha sido una de mis más grandes pasiones. Empecé a tocar guitarra cuando tenía 6 años, y desde entonces he desarrollado un oído musical. Mientras crecía empecé a ir a conciertos en vivo y ahí supe que existía el negocio de la música y que quería formar parte de ello. Yendo a estudiar mi pregrado en California, en uno de los vuelos se sentó al lado mío la persona que se convirtió en mi mentor, quien me introdujo al mundo de la música, Lucas Barbosa. En ese momento era manager de un artista que se llama Nicolás Mayorca y las...

title: Ronaldinho’s son snapped up by Championship side after leaving Barcelona
creator: Phil Haigh
content: Joao Mendes, the son of legendary Brazilian forward Ronaldinho, has signed for Championship side Burnley, according to reports. The 19-year-old has spent time at Flamengo, Vasco da Gama and Cruzeiro in his youth career, before moving to Barcelona in 2023. He played for the Under-18 and Under-19 teams with the Spanish giants but did not make the grade and was released at the end of his contract in June. After a short search for a new club, Mendes has signed up with Burnley, with transfer expert Fabrizio Romano reporting the deal and Euro Foot reporting that he has agreed a two-year contract. The forward is yet to make a professional appearance in his career, so it is yet to be seen whether he will be able to impress at Turf Moor enough to feature. Ronaldinho, 44, will be glad his son has found a new club, but is unlikely to be as excited as he was when Mendes signed for Barcelona. The former Brazil superstar told RAC1 last year: ‘Barça has always been part of my life and my heart and it will continue with my son. He added to Marca: ‘Wherever I go I take Barcelona with me. With the arrival of my son at Barca I’ll be more present than ever.’ Burnley got their Championship campaign off the an ideal start with a 4-1 win at Luton Town last weekend in a clash between two sides newly relegated from the Premier League . More Trending Liverpool star reaches agreement to join Man City...

title: ‘No limit’ for Mbappe after scoring on Madrid debut
content: WARSAW, Poland (AFP)— Real Madrid striker Kylian Mbappe said there is “no limit” to the number of goals he can score after netting on his debut for the club to help win the UEFA Super Cup on Wednesday. The France captain slammed home Madrid’s second in a 2-0 win over Europa League winners Atalanta after Fede Valverde opened the scoring after the break. Mbappe darted into space in the area and Jude Bellingham fed the forward who finished clinically in the 68th minute. “We are at Real Madrid, we have no limit, if I can score 50, then 50, but the most important thing is winning and improving as a team, because we will win as a team,” Mbappe told Movistar when asked if he was aiming to net 50 goals this season. The forward has been linked with Madrid for years but was finally able to complete his dream move this summer at the end of his Paris Saint-Germain deal. “It was a great night, I’ve been waiting for this moment for a long time,” explained Mbappe. “To play with this shirt, with this badge, for these fans, it’s a gift for me. “We won a trophy too, that’s very important, we know that here we always have to win and I am very happy.”

title: Kushinagar News: जेल मेन्यू के अनुसार भोजन व नाश्ता देने के निर्देश
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, कुशीनगर
content: पडरौना। अपर जिला एवं सत्र न्यायाधीश व सचिव जिला विधिक सेवा प्राधिकरण शैलेंद्र मणि त्रिपाठी ने लीगल एंड डिफेंस काउंसिल के अधिवक्ताओं के साथ बुधवार को जिला कारागार देवरिया का निरीक्षण किया। बैरकों, पाकशाला, चिकित्सालय व महिला बैरक का निरीक्षण कर बंदियों के भाेजन, साफ-सफाई, चिकित्सा, सुरक्षा तथा उनको दी जाने वाली विधिक सहायता के बारे में जानकारी ली। उन्होंने जेल अधीक्षक को जेल मेन्यू के अनुसार भोजन, नाश्ता देने के लिए निर्देशित किया। अपर जिला जज ने बताया कि अगर किसी बंदी की पैरवी के लिए अधिवक्ता नहीं है तो वह जिला विधिक सेवा प्राधिकरण से सरकारी खर्चे पर अधिवक्ता ले सकता है। रिहाई के पात्र बंदियों को रिहा करने के लिए जरूरी प्रक्रिया शुरू की गई। इस अवसर पर चीफ लीगल एड काउंसिल नरेंद्र कुमार मिश्र, असिस्टेंट लीगल एड काउंसिल कमर जहां एवं जिला कारागार के अधिकारी एवं कर्मचारीगण उपस्थित रहे।

title: Reported pursuit from Antelope Valley results in three detained in SCV
content: A pursuit that reportedly started in the Antelope Valley ended with three suspects being taken into custody around 2 p.m. on Wednesday near the southbound Highway 14 off-ramp at Via Princessa, according to eyewitnesses and first responder radio dispatch traffic. Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department personnel followed the suspects from Palmdale going south on the highway, according to first responder radio traffic. The vehicle began to yield near Via Princessa and Golden Valley Road, according to radio traffic. According to a report from the scene, LASD and California Highway Patrol personnel coordinated in making the felony stop. Traffic was blocked while the suspects were being detained but the roads were eventually reopened. Santa Clarita Valley Sheriff’s Station officials said the pursuit was being handled by the Lancaster station. A spokesperson from that station was not immediately available Wednesday afternoon to comment on the incident.

title: Veterinario crea la primera vacuna del mundo capaz de esterilizar perros sin castrarlos y que es revertible
content: Hasta hoy, la esterilización de un perro es una operación de rutina en la que se extraen los órganos reproductores . En el caso de los machos, se extirpan los testículos, mientras que en el de las hembras, además de los ovarios, se puede extraer también el útero. Si bien, es un método efectivo, incluye una cirugía y se trata de una práctica irreversible. Por ello, y buscando una alternativa a la esterilización quirúrgica animal, el académico de la Facultad de Ciencias Veterinarias de la Universidad de Chile (Favet), Leonardo Sáenz , creó una innovadora vacuna inmunocastradora que bloquea la hormona encargada de la reproducción en mamíferos. Veterinario crea la primera vacuna del mundo capaz de esterilizar perros sin castrarlos y revertible Bautizada EGALITTE , la nueva vacuna fue presentada en el Congreso Veterinario de Chile 2024, y ya se encuentra disponible para su adquisición en centros y clínicas veterinarias del país , permitiendo castrar a perros machos y hembras con un método que, además, es reversible. “Es una alternativa que puede llegar a más población porque es mucho más fácil de usar, además tiene un efecto en el control de la agresividad, sobre todo en machos”, explica el profesor Leonardo Sáenz. La innovación fue posible gracias al trabajo multidisciplinario y la colaboración de los investigadores y académicos de Favet, Mario...

title: Rodolfo Landim confirma data da inauguração do novo estádio do Flamengo
content: Com o terreno do Gasômetro já arrematado em leilão, o presidente do Flamengo, Rodolfo Landim, afirmou que já tem a data de inauguração do novo estádio definido, em vídeo do canal "MUNDO GV SUPERBET", nesta quarta-feira. Segundo o atual mandatário rubro-negro, a primeira partida será disputada no dia do aniversário do clube, 15 de novembro, no ano de 2029. Durante o vídeo, Rodolfo Landim presenteou o anfitrião do canal, o jornalista Getúlio Vargas, com a camisa principal do Flamengo, escrito "estádio" e com o número 29, na parte de trás. Ele explicou o motivo do manto entregue estar personalizado desta maneira, confirmando a data de inauguração do estádio no final da fala. "A gente fez uma camisa, obviamente, com edição superlimitada, para aquelas pessoas que estavam presentes ali, naquele dia da arrematação no leilão do terreno Flamengo. Esse "29" é porque já marcamos a data de inauguração do estádio, que é o aniversário do Flamengo , no dia 15 de novembro de 2029. Essa é a data em que vamos estar botando nosso primeiro jogo lá", disse Landim. O Flamengo arrematou, por meio de leilão realizado no último dia 31, o terreno do Gasômetro onde pretende construir seu novo estádio. O rubro-negro já realizou o pagamento, à vista, dos pouco mais de R$ 138 milhões que se comprometeu com a prefeitura. O local pertencia a um fundo gerido pela Caixa...

title: Maharajganj News: फर्जी जन्म प्रमाण पत्र बनाने के तीन आरोपियों को जेल
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, महाराजगंज
content: महराजगंज। फर्जी जन्म प्रमाण पत्र, निर्वाचन कार्ड व आधार कार्ड बनाने और साइबर फ्राड करने वाले गिरोह का पर्दाफाश हुआ है। पुलिस ने तीन आरोपियों को गिरफ्तार जेल भेज दिया है। अपर पुलिस अधीक्षक आतिश कुमार सिंह ने बताया कि साइबर फ्राड और फर्जी दस्तावेज बनाने वालों के विरुद्ध कार्रवाई की गई। आरोपी फर्जी वेबसाइट के माध्यम से फर्जी फर्जी आधार कार्ड, जन्म प्रमाण पत्र और निर्वाचन कार्ड बनाते थे। राहुल निवासी भीटी थाना हंडिया जनपद प्रयागराज की आईडी और अंगूठा लगाने के लिए रबर का क्लोन बनाकर धंधा किया जा रहा था। आरोपी संजय कुमार वर्मा निवासी ग्राम बहोरपुर थाना पुरंदरपुर, शिव कुमार निवासी ग्राम अगया थाना पुरंदरपुर, विवेक निवासी जंगलबडहरा थाना पनियरा को गिरफ्तार कर जेल भेजा गया है। आरोपियों के पास से बरामद सामान गिरफ्तार आरोपियों के पास से आठ लैपटाप, दो प्रिंटर, सात प्लास्टिक के बायोमेट्रिक क्लोन, दो आइरिस डिवाइस, एक माउस, दो वेब कैम, एक सीपीयू, चार मोबाइल, एक लैमिनेशन मशीन, दो बोयोमेट्रिक मशीन, चार सिम कार्ड, 71 आधार कार्ड, 50 टोकन, 176 निर्वाचन कार्ड, 224 जन्म प्रमाण पत्र, आधार कार्ड की रशीद 1839, चार सिम कार्ड व 4210.00 रुपये नकद, 2 एचडीएफसी बैंक का क्रेडिट कार्ड, 01 पैनकार्ड, 01 आंख का आइरिश बरामद किया गया है।

title: En el cierre de las deliberaciones se acordó repensar cambios en la Carta Orgánica
creator: Verónica Suppo
content: En el último panel y cierre del III Congreso de Participación Ciudadana y Descentralización que se desarrolló en Córdoba, se abrió este miércoles nuevamente la discusión acerca de repensar la ciudad con miras a 2050, pero también analizar si es necesario realizar una reforma sobre la Carta Orgánica Municipal. En este cierre se realizó una primera exposición sobre las políticas de participación y descentralización que se llevan adelante, además de un sondeo con datos acerca de las principales preocupaciones planteadas por los vecinos en los distintos CPC, así como el rol que cumplen los Centros Operativas y las articulaciones con los centros vecinales. Por lo que se sumaron experiencias de presidentes de comisiones barriales, además de las exposiciones de dos referentes de las universidades locales. En ese marco disertó la vicerrectora de Investigación de la Universidad Blas Plascal, Pamela Cáceres; y el director de Organizaciones Públicas de la Universidad Católica de Córdoba (UCC), César Murúa. En la exposición final, el secretario de Participación Ciudadana y Juventud municipal, Juan Domingo Viola, realizó una síntesis de la apertura hacia la participación, la importancia de continuar en la línea de la descentralización, pero al mismo tiempo repensar la ciudad y cambios que puedan ser necesarios para la Carta Orgánica Municipal, que en 2025...

How a stowaway groundhog elevated to local icon
content: A Pennsylvania groundhog is making a name for himself for something other than predicting an early or late spring. An intrepid varmint dubbed Colonel Custard — so named for the frozen custard shop and mini-golf outlet where he was discovered — was found stowed away with a passel of stuffed animals prizes in an arcade game two weeks ago. Players were maneuvering a mechanical claw to pluck toys from the glass game case when they suddenly realized a real live groundhog was blinking back at them. The newly named colonel was found in Hollidaysburg, a good hour's drive from Pennsylvania's far more famous groundhog town, , home to the weather-predicting groundhog Phil. The owners and staff at The Meadows frozen custard shop aren't being shy about promoting their own furry friend. Staff and owners made T-shirts that read “Respect the Groundhog,” held the online naming campaign that drew an avalanche of responses and are working on more promotional ideas, such as naming one of their frozen treat flavors for Colonel Custard. Meadows manager Lynn Castle said no one's sure how the groundhog got in the building, but he must have clambered up the game chute into the machine. “They were just staring at the stuffed animals in there getting ready to decide what to pick and saw the groundhog's eyes blinking and realized there was something alive in there,” Castle said. It took a village to set...

title: ఆన్‌లైన్‌లో హజ్‌ యాత్ర కు దరఖాస్తులు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: హజ్‌ యాత్ర 2025కి మైనార్టీ సంక్షేమ శాఖ దరఖాస్తులు ఆహ్వానిస్తోంది. ఆసక్తిగలవారు సెప్టెంబరు 9లోగా ఆన్‌లైన్‌లో దరఖాస్తు చేసుకోవాలని రాష్ట్ర మైనార్టీ సంక్షేమ, న్యాయశాఖ మంత్రి ఎన్‌ఎండీ ఫరూక్‌ ఆదివారం ఒక ప్రకటనలో తెలిపారు. రాష్ట్రానికి చెందిన ముస్లిం సోదరులు ఈ అవకాశాన్ని వినియోగించుకోవాలని, ఈ యాత్రకు వయోపరిమితి లేదని పేర్కొన్నారు. శిశువులకు ప్రయాణం ఉచితం కాదని, విమాన చార్జీలో 10 శాతం చెల్లించాల్సి ఉంటుందని తెలిపారు. 2 ఏళ్ల కంటే ఎక్కువ వయస్సు ఉన్న దరఖాస్తుదారుడిని వయోజన యాత్రికుడిగా పరిగణిస్తామని తెలిపారు. హజ్‌ కమిటీ ఆఫ్‌ ఇండియా ద్వారా హజ్‌కు అర్హత జీవిత కాలంలో ఒక్కసారే ఉంటుందని తెలిపారు. మెహ్రమ్‌ లేకుండా కేటగిరీలో, 45 ఏళ్లు లేదా అంతకంటే ఎక్కువ వయస్సు గల స్త్రీలు నలుగురు లేదా అంతకంటే ఎక్కువ మంది మహిళల సమూహాల్లో ప్రయాణించడానికి నిబంధనల ప్రకారం అనుమతిస్తామని మంత్రి వెల్లడించారు. హజ్‌ యాత్ర 2025లో ఒక యూనిట్‌కు కనీసం ఒకరు, గరిష్ఠంగా ఐదుగురు పెద్దలు, ఇద్దరు శిశువులు ఉండవచ్చని తెలిపారు. ఎంపికైన హజ్‌ యాత్రికులు మెడికల్‌ స్ర్కీనింగ్‌, ఫిట్‌నెస్‌ సర్టిఫికెట్‌ సమర్పించాల్సి ఉంటుందని తెలిపారు. ఆసక్తి గల వారు ఠీఠీఠీ.జ్చ్జిఛిౌఝఝజ్ట్ట్ఛ్ఛీ.జౌఠి.జీుఽ/ఠీఠీఠీ,్చఞట్ట్చ్ట్ఛజ్చ్జిఛిౌఝఝజ్ట్ట్ఛ్ఛీ.ఛిౌఝలో ఆన్‌లైన్‌ దరఖాస్తులు చేసుకోవచ్చని మంత్రి వెల్లడించారు. సందేహాల నివృత్తి, సహాయం కోసం టోల్‌ఫ్రీ నంబరు 1800-4257873, 0866-2471786 సంప్రదించవచ్చని మంత్రి సూచించారు.

title: Tribunal Estatal Electoral confirma que Adrián de la Garza ganó como alcalde de Monterrey
creator: Martín Fuentes
content: Nuevo León comentarios Tribunal Estatal Electoral confirma que Adrián de la Garza ganó como alcalde de Monterrey Durante la sesión de este miércoles los magistrados determinaron que la elección de la capital de Nuevo León no se anulará Los reclamos de Mariana Rodríguez contra Adrián de la Garza no prosperaron. Por Martín Fuentes 14 de agosto 2024 a las 16:35 hrs. El Tribunal Estatal Electoral de Nuevo León dio un revés a Movimiento Ciudadano y Mariana Rodríguez al declarar inválida la impugnación presentada por las elecciones en Monterrey . Durante la sesión de este miércoles y bajo los números de expedientes JI-153/2024, JI-164/2024, JI-168/2024 y JI-169/2024 los magistrados determinaron que la elección no se anulará. Declaran infundados los agravios reclamados por Movimiento Ciudadano. El fallo de los magistrados fue unánime. Durante la sesión se calificaron de inverosímiles las denuncias del partido naranja. “La narrativa de Movimiento Ciudadano sostiene hipótesis inverosímiles de un control absoluto del aparato estatal, incluso de instituciones como la procuración y administración de Justicia o estrategia legal”, se leyó. En la lectura de hechos se agregó que las narraciones en las denuncias son imprecisas. “Los funcionarios de la mesa directiva de casilla no efectuaron de manera positiva para siquiera dar fe sobre algún indicio de lo...

title: Marçal trocou participação 'física' por 'jurídica' em empresas de capital milionário antes de oficializar candidatura no TSE
creator: Redação Terra
content: Pablo Marçal (PRTB), que declarou R$ 193,5 milhões em bens ao registrar sua candidatura à Prefeitura de São Paulo , trocou sua participação como 'pessoa física' para 'pessoa jurídica' em duas de suas empresas antes de enviar sua declaração patrimonial ao Tribunal Superior Eleitoral (TSE). Conforme apurado pelo Terra , o capital dos negócios, que indiretamente se mantêm sob sua gestão, somam mais de R$ 5 milhões. Receba as principais notícias direto no WhatsApp! Inscreva-se no canal do Terra A reportagem teve acesso a registros da Junta Comercial do Estado de São Paulo (Jucesp), que mostram que, em julho deste ano, Pablo Marçal deixou de ser sócio-administrador de duas empresas, admitiu como sócia a empresa Marçal Participações Ltda --que toca junto com sua esposa, Ana Carolina de Carvalho Marçal-- e, por fim, mudou seu status como "cpf" para administrador das empresas. Tratam-se da R66 Air Ltda e da Plataforma Holding Participações Ltda, empresas com capital de R$ 3,8 milhão e R$ 1,2 milhão, respectivamente. Por estar registrado apenas como administrador nessas empresas, teoricamente, Marçal não precisa declará-las ao TSE. No caso da R66 Air, a mudança foi feita no dia 5 de julho, cerca de oito meses após o início das atividades da empresa. Marçal 'vendeu' sua participação de R$ 200 mil, que foi 'comprada' pela empresa que leva seu nome por...

title: ‘Heartless’: Dutton grilled over Gaza visa call
creator: Clareese Packer
content: Karl Stefanovic has asked Opposition Leader Peter Dutton if he’s a “heartless racist” after the politician declared Palestinians fleeing Gaza shouldn’t be allowed in Australia. Mr Dutton demanded all visa applications from Gaza be refused amid claims people fleeing the war could pose a threat to Australia’s national security. Coalition MPs wrote to Tony Burke on Tuesday, calling on the newly appointed Home Affairs Minister to tighten visa vetting for applicants from Gaza to ensure they held no rhetorical support for Palestinian militant group Hamas. But Mr Dutton went a step further, telling Sky News no one from Gaza should be entering Australia right now. “I don’t think people should be coming in through that war zone at all at the moment,” he said. “It puts our national security at risk.” Mr Dutton was grilled over the comments on Today, with Stefanovic opening his interview by asking if he was a “heartless racist” and whether he had “any humanity”. “We have to make decisions and they can be tough decisions, but the decisions are in our country’s best interests,” Mr Dutton said. He claimed the Albanese government had brought in people from a war zone without doing face-to-face interviews in some cases. “That is without precedent; 1300 people have come here on tourist visas, again, without precedent,” he said. “I think it’s a massive, latest mess of the Albanese government,...

title: Quién es el nuevo secretario de Culto: un ferviente católico que pide una “historia completa” de la dictadura
content: Inmediatamente después de que se conoció la salida de Francisco Sánchez de la Secretaría de Culto, se conoció el nombre de su reemplazante: Nahuel Sotelo , un diputado de la provincia de Buenos Aires de 29 años, fervientemente católico y que, al mejor estilo papa Francisco, siempre pide que recen por él. Acompañó al presidente Javier Milei durante una visita al Vaticano, este año. Es fervoroso militante de la Libertad Avanza desde el inicio del armado en este territorio, donde se constituyó como enemigo de Axel Kicillof . Pese a su fe y a su vínculo de lealtad con el Presidente, Sotelo no tuvo mucho éxito en mantener unido al bloque de diputados de la provincia, que se quebró poco después de la jura en diciembre. La bancada inicial se escindió con un sector – Libertad por Siempre- que terminó por avalar los proyectos de Kicillof . Mantuvo un enfrentamiento público con el titular de ese bloque, Gustavo Cuervo , quien fue instado por la vicepresidenta, Victoria Villarruel, a dejar su banca. Cuervo no se amedrentó y respondió y mantuvo su banca. Sotelo fue un férreo defensor de la Ley Bases , incluso desde antes de que fuera recortada. Llegó a decir que los discursos de Milei tuvieron más rating que el Mundial. Es una figura cercana al expresidente brasileño Jair Bolsonaro , y construyó desde 2021 un espacio junto a José Luis Espert . Autor del libro...

title: Difieren audiencia contra Madueña y funcionarios de la UAS por presuntas compras irregulares en cómputo
creator: Airam Aguilar
content: Culiacán, Sinaloa. Para el mes de octubre, juez de control difirió audiencia inicial de Jesús Madueña Molina , el exdirector de Control de Bienes e Inventarios de la Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa (UAS), Héctor Melesio Cuen Díaz, y otros integrantes del Comité de Adquisiciones de la Universidad , por presuntas compras irregulares de equipos de cómputo. Debes leer: Caso UAS: dictan nueva vinculación a proceso contra Madueña y Robespierre por presunto abuso de autoridad La audiencia estaba programada a las 10:00 en la Sede Regional de Justicia Penal Acusatoria y Oral Centro, pero se reprogramó porque Alfonso Carlos Ontiveros Elgueazábal, abogado de Soila Gaxiola Camacho, señaló que personal de la Fiscalía General del Estado (FGE) le entregó un nuevo tomo de la investigación. Indicó que se trata de un peritaje contable con más de dos mil facturas, mismas que necesita analizar, por lo que pidió que se reprogramara. Sigue la información del Centro de Sinaloa en nuestra sección especial de Línea Directa Los agentes solicitaron al juez de control que se llevara a cabo la diligencia con los indiciados que ya contaban con esta información, pues se les hizo llegar desde hace meses. Sin embargo, luego de escuchar los argumentos, el juez la difirió para el mes de octubre, y en caso de no presentarse las autoridades universitarias se ordenaría el uso de la...

title: İzmir açıklarında 71 düzensiz göçmen kurtarıldı
content: İzmir açıklarında 22'si geri itilen 71 düzensiz göçmen kurtarıldı, 32 düzensiz göçmen yakalandı Sahil Güvenlik Komutanlığının internet sitesinde yer alan açıklamaya göre, Dikili açıklarında lastik botta bir grup düzensiz göçmen olduğu bilgisinin alınması üzerine bölgeye ekip sevk edildi. Ekipler, Yunanistan unsurlarınca Türk kara sularına itilen lastik bottaki 8'i çocuk 22 düzensiz göçmeni karaya çıkardı. Karaburun ile Dikili açıklarında düzensiz göçmenlerin bulunduğu lastik botların motor arızası nedeniyle sürüklendiği ve yardım talebinde bulunulduğu bilgisi üzerine bölgeye ekip sevk edildi. Ekipler, sürüklenen lastik botlardaki 20'si çocuk 49 düzensiz göçmeni kurtardı. 32 DÜZENSİZ GÖÇMEN YAKALANDI Sahil Güvenlik ekipleri, Karaburun açıklarında ise durdurdukları lastik bottaki 11'i çocuk 32 düzensiz göçmeni yakaladı. Düzensiz göçmenler, işlemlerinin ardından İl Göç İdaresi Müdürlüğüne gönderildi. Fotoğraf, AA tarafından servis edilmiştir.

The Chiefs are . The Bills have lost some confidence among fans, particularly since they traded away star wide receiver . In order to subsidize that loss, the team drafted 33rd overall and brought in veteran , but neither is expected to provide the type of dynamism Diggs did with Allen for so many years. Davis was the by the in 2017 but left the team in free agency to sign a big money deal with the in 2021. After two mediocre seasons in which he couldn't stay healthy, Davis . title: Casselman, Ont. struggling to attract doctors because it can't offer same bonuses as neighbouring communities
creator: Jackie Perez
content: The municipality of Casselman, Ont. is struggling to replace three doctors who recently left a local clinic. The Casselman Medical Clinic had six physicians, but in the last five months, one retired, one returned to his home country, and another moved to a nearby town for a better opportunity. That's left more than 2,000 patients in the area east of Ottawa without a family doctor, and the clinic says it is at a disadvantage when it comes to attracting more. Clinic owner Jennifer Arenas says recruiting new doctors has been a challenge. "We've had no luck being able to recruit physicians," she said. "We are fighting against clinics in locations that are able to offer incentive grants." She's referring to the rurality index for Ontario (RIO), a certain score based on population and how long it takes to travel to basic and advanced referral centres. The province says it is meant to ensure funding is specifically targeted to northern and very rural communities. Grants can be used to give doctors bonuses of $80,000 or more to work in specific remote areas of the province. Arenas says Casselman just barely misses the mark to qualify. "You have to have a score of 40 and above. The communities around us are all 40 and above." Casselman has a score of 39. "Right now, with the RIO score being the way it is, we can't unlock certain grants that we can offer doctors," says Mayor Geneviève...

title: Alžírske úrady zadržali 21 osôb za údajný pokus o prepašovanie zbraní
content: ALŽÍR. Alžírske bezpečnostné zložky zadržali 21 ľudí v súvislosti s údajným pokusom o prepašovanie zbraní do krajiny na palube komerčného trajektu prichádzajúceho z Francúzska. Oznámilo to v stredu alžírske ministerstvo obrany, píše TASR s odvolaním na správu agentúry AFP. Dvaja ľudia - manželský pár - boli zadržaní ešte 4. augusta v meste Bejaja asi 220 kilometrov od Alžíru po tom, ako boli v ich aute po príchode z francúzskeho mesta Marseille nájdené zbrane, informovalo ministerstvo. "Bezpečnostné služby zatkli ďalších 19 členov tej istej teroristickej siete a zhabali ďalšie veľké množstvo zbraní, ktoré boli objavené v tajnom sklade pri meste Bidžája," priblížil rezort obrany. Dodal, že zadržaná skupina osôb je súčasťou Hnutia za autonómiu Kabýlie (MAK), ktorú Alžírsko označuje za teroristickú organizáciu. Bidžája sa nachádza na severe Alžírska. Bezpečnostné zložky zadržali celkovo 21 zbraní, 2000 kusov munície a "odevy podobné vojenským uniformám", napísala v stredu štátna tlačová agentúra APS. Nie je známe, ako sa manželskému páru podarilo vyplávať trajektom z francúzskeho prístavu so zbraňami vo vozidle značky Citroen. Alžírske ministerstvo obrany tvrdí, že cieľom zadržanej skupiny osôb bolo "šíriť nepokoj, neistotu a narušiť hladký priebeh...

title: پاسخ معنادار تحلیلگرایرانی شبکه‌های عربی به جنگ روانی دشمنان!
content: به گزارش ، اظهارات امیر موسوی، تحلیلگر ایرانی شبکه‌های عربی در برنامه موسوم به «شامگاهی» شبکه تلویزیونی المیادین خبرساز شد. امیر موسوی، تحلیل‌گر مسائل منطقه و امور بین به پرسشی که در این برنامه تلویزیونی درباره واکنش ایران به حمله هسته‌ای احتمالی دشمنان ضد ایران در صورت وقوع جنگی تمام عیار چه خواهد بود، پاسخ قابل تأملی داد. دیپلمات سابق کشورمان با هشدار به دشمنان کشورمان در اظهاراتی معنادار گفت: «برای نخستین بار می‌گویم... در صورتی که ایران به حمله هسته‌ای تهدید شود، من نمی‌گویم واکنش ایران چه خواهد بود، اما ایران تاکید کرده است که حتی اگر حمله هسته‌ای رخ دهد، پاسخ ایران در همان سطح خواهد بود.» وی در ادامه در واکنش به اصرار مجری المیادین در تشریح ابعاد این خبر که برای نخستین بار از سوی یک تحلیلگر برجسته ایرانی طرح شد، افزود: «از من بیش از این در شرایط موجودی که به سر می‌بریم، پاسخ تفصیلی نخواهید، اما پیام من برای کسانی که مورد خطاب این پیام هستند، ارسال شد.» امیر موسوی در بخش دیگری از سخنان خود به جنگ روانی رسانه‌های همسو با دشمنان و انتشار اخبار مسموم و کذب و فضاسازی‌های روانی در شبکه‌های اجتماعی درباره هراس ایران در عملی کردن تهدید خود ضد پاسخ داد. پیش از این نیز، شبکه خبری المیادین در توئیتی عنوان کرد که «ایران به حمله اتمی تهدید شد، اما تهران به کسانی که این پیام را منتقل کردند، پاسخی قوی‌تر از تهدید داد.» گفتنی است که امیر موسوی، دیپلمات سابق کشورمان در گفت‌وگوی خبری با شبکه تلویزیونی المیادین در رابطه با فتوای «حرام بودن استفاده از سلاح هسته‌ای» از سوی رهبر معظم...

title: En medio del debate por las inversiones forzosas, nace oficialmente un nuevo holding financiero
content: En 2019 se inició un proceso para integrar todas las entidades financieras de carácter estatal con el objetivo de buscar sinergias y economías de escala bajo la estructura de un holding . Siete años después, y tras un cambio de gobierno, este proyecto se materializó en la creación del holding financiero Grupo Bicentenario. Este nuevo holding entra a competir con los 13 conglomerados financieros que ya existen en el país y, de hecho, se ratificó como el cuarto más grande de la nación, solo superado por el Grupo Aval, el Grupo Sura y el Grupo Bolívar. Con activos por 183 billones de pesos y un patrimonio de 18 billones al corte de junio de 2024 , el Grupo Bicentenario está conformado por 13 entidades: el Banco Agrario, el Fondo Nacional de Garantías (FNG), Findeter, Finagro, Positiva, La Previsora, Fondo Nacional del Ahorro (FNA), ENTerritorio, Fiducóldex, Fiduagraria, Fiduprevisora, Financiera de Desarrollo Nacional (FDN) y Bancóldex. Ricardo Bonilla, ministro de Hacienda, explicó que se crea el holding para que las entidades dejen de actuar autónomamente y puedan construir procesos comunes en materia tecnológica, del control de información y de ajustes financieros. De esta manera tendrán “más músculo financiero para participar de manera activa en la financiación de grandes proyectos y no esperar a que cada uno lo haga por separado”, explicó. Justamente...

title: ¿Qué son los bootcamps, cursos de tecnología que lo ayudan a conseguir trabajo fácilmente?
content: .Publicidad. Juan Daniel Hidalgo , uno de los creadores y el presentador de la plataforma Price It , explicó que contrario a lo que muchas personas piensan, existen empleados de empresas mundialmente famosas como Apple, Spotify o Tesla que comenzaron sin siquiera tener un título universitario. ¿Cómo lo hicieron? A través de estos cursos de corta duración llamados bootcamps , que algunos consideran ideales para conseguir trabajo virtual sin experiencia. Los bootcamps son cursos de capacitación en tecnología donde se explican sólo las habilidades necesarias para desempeñar trabajos relacionados con esta área, sin que sea necesario que las personas aprendan otros aspectos que son comunes en las carreras universitarias pero que no son tan útiles en la práctica. Una publicación compartida por PRICE IT | Precios | Ahorro | Descuentos | Viajes (@priceitcol) Uno de los más famosos es Triple Ten y de acuerdo al influencer no sólo enseñan las habilidades necesarias, sino que están conectados con empresas que están buscando personas que puedan desempeñar las funciones tecnológicas que ellos requieren. Algunas de las áreas que abarcan son: Ingeniería de Software, Analítica de Datos, Ciberseguridad o Inspección de Calidad. Ellos aseguran que las personas que hagan sus cursos podrán conseguir trabajo en los primeros seis meses después de terminar el curso. Aunque...

title: जिला आबकारी अधिकारी को ज्ञापन सौंपा
content: बारां| शराब ठेकेदार द्वारा विभिन्न मांगों को लेकर आबकारी अधिकारी को आबकारी आयुक्त जयपुर के नाम ज्ञापन सौंपा। यूनियन महामंत्री किशनगोपाल चंदेल ने बताया कि विगत 4 सालों से पूरे राजस्थान के ठेकेदारों को विभाग की गलत नीतियों की वजह से नुकसान भुगतना पड़ रह बीएलएफ को समाप्त किया जाए, देशी शराब, आरएमएल, अंग्रेजी, बीयर की ईडी बढ़ाई जाए। ताकि भराव कम हो सके। दुकानों का बंदोबस्त लॉटरी द्वारा किया जाए। देहात में सब शॉप की परमिशन मिले। दुकानों की गारंटी 30 प्रतिशत तक कम की जाए। इस दौरान बनवारी मीणा, अंशुल यादव, धर्मेंद्र सुवालका, मनोज प्रजापति, विजय फौजी, जयेश गुर्जर, देवेंद्र कुशवाह, ऋतुराज बना, उज्ज्वल बना, यशवंत मीना, राकेश शिवहरे, इंदरपाल रॉय, भानु बना, सोनू गोस्वामी आदि मौजूद थे।

title: Hoxha i sapodalë nga burgu i quan coftina ata që i pengon feja islame
content: Imami Zekirija Qazimi i dënuar me dhjetë vjet burgim në vitin 2016 për rekrutimin e të rinjve në organizatat terroriste që luftojnë në Lindjen e Mesme, me të shkelë jashtë burgut ka fyer ata që, sipas tij, po u pengon feja islame. I akuzuari për dy vepra penale për rekrutim për terrorizëm dhe nxitje të urrejtjes, përçarjes dhe mos durimit kombëtar, racor, fetar apo etnik, ka cituar ajete kuranore duke thënë “cofni ju të gjithë që ju pengon islami, cofni”. Qazimi, që ishte imam në xhaminë “El Kuddus” në Gjilan kishte ligjërata edhe në kanalin Youtube. Në ligjëratat e tij në “YouTube” kishte thënë se “pija më e mirë për myslimanin është gjaku i jobesimtarit”. Ndërkaq, pas daljes nga burgu i rrethuar nga disa persona, duke cituar ajetet, ka thënë se “ ata të cilët nuk janë besimtarë janë kafshë”. “Cofni ju të gjithë që ju pengon islami, cofni. Ajeti thotë vdisni, por na e kemi në gjuhë shqipe për kafshët. Se ata të cilët nuk janë besimtarë janë kafshë. Ata janë më të humbur se kafshët. Se kafshët i nënshtrohen Allahut”, ka thënë ai pas daljes nga burgu. “Jeta në këtë dynja është jetë e provimeve nuk është jeta e kënaqësive dhe begative. Nuk duhet me u mashtrue në provim me u marrë me gjana të tjera. Në provim duhet me u marrë se qysh me kalu provimin, shpërblimet kanë me kanë në ahiret”,...

title: Venezolanos, mayoría de migrantes que cruzan Honduras
creator: Últimas Noticias de Honduras | La Prensa
content: Más de 276.000 migrantes irregulares, la mayoría venezolanos , han cruzado Honduras este año en tránsito hacia EE.UU., según las autoridades, una cifra que ha desbordado la capacidad institucional del país y evidencia que el fenómeno requiere de cooperación regional y es una responsabilidad compartida. El coordinador del Observatorio de Migración de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Honduras (UNAH), César Castillo, aseguró este miércoles a EFE que la migración es una “responsabilidad compartida” entre los países de origen y destino, pues el fenómeno no se puede atender de “manera aislada” y requiere una “atención de manera regional”. Entre enero y el 7 de agosto, llegaron a Honduras 276.096 viajeros irregulares , de los cuales 132.177 o el 48 % eran venezolanos, una cifra que podría aumentar en los próximos meses ante la crisis en Venezuela, de acuerdo con las estadísticas del Instituto Nacional de Migración (INM). “Es una situación preocupante , recordemos que el flujo de migrantes por el país ha aumentado en los últimos años, hace 3 años teníamos un flujo de 37.000 personas aproximadamente, después pasó a 188.000 y el año pasado tuvimos más de 500.000 personas que ingresaron al país de manera irregular”, subrayó Castillo. Responsabilidad compartida ”Honduras tiene que trabajar en coordinación con estos países para mejorar la asistencia...

title: Bianca Censori opts for daring ensemble as she joins Kanye West’s kids for dinner
creator: Lauren DuBois
content: Bianca Censori isn’t letting a meal with family–including her husband Kanye West’ s kids, keeping her from an eye-popping and daring ensemble. The Yeezy architect, who married the rapper in 2022, is no stranger to risque outfits that turn heads at various outings with her husband and others–which most recently included a plunging bodysuit at a Vultures 2 event. Other shocking outfits included a pantsless look while going to a Deadpool and Wolverine screening with West’s daughter, North , and a tiny swimsuit top and high-waisted shorts while dining at LA’s Chateau Marmont with her spouse. It seems time with family doesn't inspire her to cover up more however, as she once again sported an outfit that left very little to the imagination as she headed to Malibu hot spot Nobu for a dinner with both West’s children and her own family. As she headed to the restaurant, Bianca wore a micro-sized dress which not only put her chest on display, but also barely covered her rear end. The nude-colored strapless ensemble featured a very low neckline and a very high hemline which almost flashed her both her rear end and her privates in the front. She paired it with skin-colored tights, tan heeled sandals, and minimal jewelry. She kept her dark hair slicked back and clipped up off her neck with a claw hair clip. The outfit likely wouldn’t have usually followed Nobu’s “smart/business casual”...

title: SIPAJTE KAŠIKU SOLI U VEŠ MAŠINU PRE PRANJA: Ima ulogu kao prašak i deterdžent, a ono što čini vešu će vas oduševiti
content: So ima višestruku namenu osim u kulinarstvu. Može se koristiti i za druge kućne potrepštine. Ona zbog svog sastava može pomoći da se uklone fleke sa odeće kao i neprijatan miris. Domaćice koje su isprobale trik sa soli kunu se u njegovu delotvornost. Evo o čemu se radi. Ubacite kašiku soli u veš- mašinu pre pranja veša. So će učiniti da veš povrati svežinu i sprečiće da izbledi, što je česta pojava nakon brojnog pranja. Bonus je i što se odeća brže suši. Ovo je posebno korisno kada napolju pada kiša, pa veš sušite u stanu ili kući. So stavite u pregradu kutijice veš-mašine Pre nego što uključite mašinu, u praznu pregradu (onu koju ne koristite) ubacite kašiku soli. Kada dođe vreme za ispiranje veša, so će ući u bubanj i učiniti svoju magiju... Postoji i opcija da se so sipa direktno u bubanj veš mašine, ali u tom slučaju je manje delotvorna kod ovih problema. (Kurir.rs/ Srećna/ M.J)

title: Ana Guevara asegura que ella pagó su vuelo a París
content: En las últimas horas Ana Gabriela Guevara , titular de la Comisión Nacional de Cultura Física y Deporte (Conade), estuvo en el ojo del huracán por el vuelo en primera clase a París 2024 . La ex velocista, en conferencia de prensa, remarcó que el gastó salió de su bolsa y no del erario , y que, para comprobar sus palabras, ya ha solicitado la factura correspondiente. "Ya solicité la factura. En el sexenio nunca he solicitado gastos", apuntó. Guevara Espinoza también tocó el tema del restaurante en el que fue captada en la sede de los Juegos Olímpicos . "Estuvo lo del avión, lo del restaurante. En México es percibido un restaurante caro, pero en París es un restaurante promedio", afirmó la directiva. Y sobre el traslado en avión, añadió: "Pueden ver en transparencia, voy a hacer pública la factura, fue pagada de mi bolsa". La titular de la Conade además explicó que el vuelo lo realizó así por indicaciones del doctor . "En 2006 tuve una lesión y por prescripción médica, el doctor pidió que los viajes mayores a cinco horas se hicieran así". title: Longmont’s Crossroads School kicks off semester with new outdoor classroom
content: Students, faculty and supporters of Crossroads School came together on Tuesday to usher in a new era for the school with the grand opening of its outdoor classroom. The school, 833 15th Ave., celebrated the opening with the Longmont Area Chamber of Commerce . Crossroads School students helped cut the ribbon surrounding the classroom and offered tours of the school to guests. “We love the way our community has gotten behind this school,” said Barb Bulthuis, executive director of Crossroads School. “This feels like an amazing way to start a new school year.” Founded in 2010, Crossroads School offers middle and high school education to students who have struggled in traditional schools. Roughly 30 students are currently enrolled. The outdoor classroom is 20 by 22 feet, with a wood-paneled ceiling and concrete base holding several benches and tables. It was installed this summer, one year after the design was approved. A fan on the classroom’s ceiling keeps the work area cool, and Crossroads School plans to install heaters later this year. Whether kids use it to eat lunch, read a book or study, the new classroom is all about giving students options. “A class may come out here, or a student might come out here if they just need some space,” Bulthuis said. “It’s one more tool in the teachers’ toolbox for how to empower kids.” When asking faculty what they’d like to see added to the...

title: Thủ tướng Thái Lan bị bãi nhiệm, nội các lập tức giải tán
content: Thủ tướng Srettha Thavisin ẢNH: REUTERS Với 5 phiếu ủng hộ và 4 phiếu chống, tòa Hiến pháp quyết định bãi nhiệm ông Srettha vì chọn ông Pichit Chuenban, cố vấn pháp lý lâu năm của gia tộc Shinawatra , làm Bộ trưởng Văn phòng Thủ tướng. Ông Pichit từng ngồi tù 6 tháng vào năm 2008 do cáo buộc hối lộ nhân viên tòa án. Theo phán quyết của tòa Hiến pháp, ông Srettha biết rõ quá khứ của ông Pichit khi ông Pichit không được đề cử làm bộ trưởng trong nội các mà ông Srettha thành lập vào tháng 9.2023. Thế nhưng, ông Srettha vẫn kiên trì đưa ông Pichit vào nội các trong đợt cải tổ chính phủ tháng 5 vừa qua. Chiều qua, tại cuộc họp báo bên ngoài văn phòng thủ tướng, ông Srettha bày tỏ sự tôn trọng đối với phán quyết của tòa Hiến pháp. Ông Srettha cũng là thủ tướng thứ tư của Thái Lan bị tòa phế truất trong vòng 16 năm qua. Sau khi thủ tướng bị bãi nhiệm, nội các Thái Lan cũng đồng thời bị giải thể, nhưng các bộ trưởng vẫn tiếp tục giữ chức vụ tạm quyền, theo tờ Bangkok Post. title: 9 quintessential Adult Swim shows you can stream on Max
creator: Jacob Siegal
content: Max (formerly HBO Max) is one of the most eclectic streaming services on the market. You can watch prestigious HBO original series, dozens of blockbuster movies, reality shows, and Studio Ghibli classics without ever leaving the app. The service is also home to some of the best shows Adult Swim has to offer, for fans of adult animation. If you’re an Adult Swim fan, you already have a list of favorites, but not everyone is familiar with the network’s lineup of absurd creations. Below, we’ve put together a list of the nine Adult Swim shows we think everyone should check out on Max. Best Adult Swim shows on Max One of Adult Swim’s first shows, is a surreal sitcom about a milkshake, a box of fries, and a ball of meat who live together in South New Jersey and embark on ludicrous adventures. They also have a human neighbor named Carl Brutananadilewski, who could not be more sick of their antics. This is a real litmus test for one’s tolerance of Adult Swim’s output — if you simply can’t stand it, this network might not be for you. One of several Adult Swim shows aping classic cartoons, is a parody of Hanna-Barbera’s . The titular character has traded in his superhero costume for a suit as he defends other famous cartoon characters in court, including Fred Flintstone, Grape Ape, Atom Ant, and George Jetson. title: HITNO SE OGLASIO MAKRON Tragedija u Francuskoj, ima mrtvih!
content: Dva francuska pilota poginula su tokom sudara borbenih aviona Rafal u istočnoj Francuskoj, saopštio je predsednik Francuske Emanuel Makron na društvenoj mreži Iks. - Sa žalošću saznajemo za smrt kapetana Sebastijana Mabirea i poručnika Matija Lorensa u avionskoj nesreći tokom trenažnog leta Rafala. Zemlja deli bol porodica i braće po oružju u vazdušnoj bazi Sen Dizije - napisao je on. Ranije je saopšteno da su se dva vojna lovca srušila u sredu na istoku Francuske . Uzroci pada aviona još nisu poznati. Kako su ranije preneli francuski mediji, u avionima su bile tri osobe, jedan od pilota se katapultirao, povređen je, ali je pri svesti. U drugom lovcu koji se sudario nalazila su se dva pilota, a potraga za njima je nastavljena tokom celog dana. Ova vazdušna baza obezbeđuje obuku francuskih i stranih pilota borbenih aviona Rafal, kao i usavršavanje pilota. Kako su preneli francuski mediji, sva tri pilota koja su učestvovala u padu aviona u sredu bila su francuske nacionalnosti, prenosi RIA. title: Отдала тай-брейк с 5 сетболов. Ястремская вылетела из турнира в Цинциннати
content: Украинская теннисистка Даяна Ястремская (WTA 34) завершила выступления на хардовом турнире WTA 1000 в Цинциннати (США). В 1/32 финала украинка в двух сетах проиграла Каролине Муховой (Чехия, WTA 35) за 1 час и 58 минут. WTA 1000 Цинциннати . Хард. 1/32 финала Каролина Мухова (Чехия) – Даяна Ястремская (Украина) – 7:6 (8:6), 6:2 В первой партии Даяна побеждала 6:1 на тай-брейке, но отдала 7 поинтов подряд. Это была четвертая встреча соперниц. Ястремская проиграла все 4 очных поединка. На прошлой неделе Ястремская выступила на соревнованиях идентичной категории в Торонто. Там она также уступила уже в 1-м раунде, вылетев от Тейлор Таунсенд .

title: Longmont’s Crossroads School kicks off semester with new outdoor classroom
creator: Dana Cadey
content: Students, faculty and supporters of Crossroads School came together on Tuesday to usher in a new era for the school with the grand opening of its outdoor classroom. The school, 833 15th Ave., celebrated the opening with the Longmont Area Chamber of Commerce . Crossroads School students helped cut the ribbon surrounding the classroom and offered tours of the school to guests. “We love the way our community has gotten behind this school,” said Barb Bulthuis, executive director of Crossroads School. “This feels like an amazing way to start a new school year.” Founded in 2010, Crossroads School offers middle and high school education to students who have struggled in traditional schools. Roughly 30 students are currently enrolled. The outdoor classroom is 20 by 22 feet, with a wood-paneled ceiling and concrete base holding several benches and tables. It was installed this summer, one year after the design was approved. A fan on the classroom’s ceiling keeps the work area cool, and Crossroads School plans to install heaters later this year. Whether kids use it to eat lunch, read a book or study, the new classroom is all about giving students options. “A class may come out here, or a student might come out here if they just need some space,” Bulthuis said. “It’s one more tool in the teachers’ toolbox for how to empower kids.” When asking faculty what they’d like to see added to the...

title: Celtics front office willing to foot the bill to remain a championship contender
creator: Adam Taylor, Yardbarker
content: The Boston Celtics dominated the NBA en route to the 18th championship in franchise history last season. They led the NBA in offensive rating and were second in defensive rating, proving themselves elite on both sides of the floor. Joe Mazzulla's team benefitted from the moves Brad Stevens' made last summer, bringing in Kristaps Porzingis and Jrue Holiday via two major trades. The downside to having such an elite roster is that it can get incredibly expensive. Boston is a second-apron luxury tax team that comes with multiple punitive measures, including a high tax bill. The new Collective Bargaining Agreement is designed to limit the chances of a dynasty being formed and to throttle a team that looks to sit atop the NBA for multiple years. Stevens has been smart in his roster construction. He moved to build a juggernaut before the new CBA kicked in and then spent this summer extending the Celtics' top stars for multiple years, thus keeping their window open. Unfortunately for the Celtics ownership group, that means there will be some heavy fines heading their way. According to The Athletic's Jared Weiss , all indications are that Boston's ownership will eat the additional outlay for as long as the team remains a genuine contender. The Celtics have what is arguably the best starting five in the NBA. They also have an elite sixth man in Al Horford, for now at least. This summer,...

title: शहीद रामचंद्र विद्यार्थी को श्रद्धांजलि दी
content: बारां| शहर में कोटा रोड स्थित स्वामी विवेकानंद पार्क में बुधवार को एक दिन शहीद के नाम श्रद्धांजलि सभा रखी। शहीद रामचंद्र विद्यार्थी फाउंडेशन के संयोजक दुर्गाप्रसाद प्रजापति व प्रभारी योगेश प्रजापति ने बताया कि सभा में देश की आजादी की लड़ाई में भारत के भारत माता की जय बोले। इतने में अंग्रेजी सैनिकों ने गोलियां चलाई सीने में तीन गोलियां लगी और देश के लिए शहीद हो गए। अमर शहीद रामचंद्र विद्यार्थी की तस्वीर पर सभी कार्यकर्ताओं व पदाधिकारियों ने श्रद्धा सुमन अर्पित किए। इस दौरान फाउंडेशन के संरक्षक जानकीलाल बरवाल, द्वारकीलाल बडूलिया, चैन सिंह प्रजापति, दिनेश बहेनियां, सह प्रभारी मनीष प्रजापति, सदस्य कौशल शर्मा, कुलदीप सिंह, रोहित यादव आदि ने शहीद रामचंद्र विद्यार्थी के जीवन पर प्रकाश डालकर श्रद्धांजलि दी।

title: PM Modi speech on Independence Day 2024 Live Updates: India celebrates 78th I-Day, PM to hoist flag at Red Fort
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is all set to deliver his 11th Independence Day speech from the ramparts of the Red Fort in Delhi around 7.30 am on Thursday. India is celebrating its 78th Independence Day on August 15, 2024 and all eyes are on the customary speech by the Prime Minister of India. August 15 marks the day when India was declared free from the clutches of the British, who ruled the country for more than 200 years. This is among the national days when Indians remember the freedom fighters who sacrificed and dedicated their lives to the freedom of the country. The theme of this year's Independence Day is 'Viksit Bharat @ 2047'. The celebrations will serve as a platform to provide a renewed push to the government's efforts towards transforming the country into a developed nation by 2047. From Srinagar and Ladakh to the nation's capital, the country will come together to celebrate its freedom on August 15. Security has been beefed up in the wake of grand celebrations at the Red Fort and other areas. Security personnel have been deployed in and around the Red Fort, and bomb disposal staff have been carrying out checking of the nearby vicinity of Red Fort along with the dog squad. Not just Delhi, but in other states as well, such as Punjab, Uttar Pradesh and Haryana, security has been upped to avoid any untoward incident. PM Modi first Independence Day address of his third...

title: Huracán Ernesto se aleja de RD; Indomet mantiene alerta por aguaceros y ráfagas de viento
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO. – El Instituto Dominicano de Meteorología (Indomet), informa que el huracán Ernesto sigue alejándose de la República Dominicana, pero sus efectos persisten en el país. Los campos nubosos asociados al fenómeno meteorológico continúan generando aguaceros, tormentas eléctricas y ráfagas de viento en varias provincias. El Indomet mantiene avisos y alertas meteorológicas vigentes en diversas regiones, debido a las condiciones adversas. La población debe estar atenta a las posibles variaciones en el clima y seguir las recomendaciones para prevenir incidentes. Además, reporta temperaturas calurosas en todo el territorio nacional, lo que agrava la sensación de calor. En la costa Atlántica, el oleaje se mantiene peligroso, por lo que se recomienda a los habitantes y turistas evitar las actividades acuáticas hasta nuevo aviso. El Indomet dijo que continuará monitoreando la situación y emitirá actualizaciones conforme sea necesario para mantener a la población informada y segura. Huracán Ernesto sigue alejándose. No obstante, campos nubosos asociados al mismo, generan aguaceros, tormentas eléctricas y ráfagas de viento. Avisos y alertas meteorológicas vigentes en distintas provincias. Temperaturas calurosas. Oleaje peligroso en la costa Atlántica. pic.twitter.com/hG50SpcoKd — Instituto Dominicano de Meteorología (@ONAMET_RDO)...

title: రేపే నింగిలోకి ఎస్‌ఎ్‌సఎల్వీ-డీ3 రాకెట్‌
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: భారత అంతరిక్ష పరిశోధన సంస్థ(ఇస్రో) మరో ప్రయోగానికి సిద్ధమవుతోంది. తిరుపతి జిల్లా శ్రీహరికోటలోని సతీశ్‌ ధావన్‌ అంతరిక్ష ప్రయోగ కేంద్రం నుంచి శుక్రవారం ఉదయం 9.17 గంటలకు ఎస్‌ఎ్‌సఎల్వీ-డీ3 రాకెట్‌ను ప్రయోగించనుంది. ఈ రాకెట్‌ ద్వారా ఈవోఎస్‌-08 ఉపగ్రహాన్ని రోదసిలోకి పంపనున్నారు. రాకెట్‌ మూడు దశల అనుసంధానం అనంతరం శిఖర భాగాన ఉపగ్రహాన్ని అమర్చే ప్రక్రియను శాస్త్రవ్తేతలు పూర్తి చేశారు. ప్రయోగానికి సంబంధించిన మిషన్‌ రెడీనెస్‌ రివ్యూ(ఎంఆర్‌ఆర్‌) సమావేశం గురువారం షార్‌లో జరగనుంది. ఇందులో ప్రయోగానికి సంబంఽధించిన కౌంట్‌డౌన్‌ సమయంపై నిర్ణయం తీసుకోనున్నారు. ఎంఆర్‌ఆర్‌ అనంతరం లాంచింగ్‌ ఆఽథరైజేషన్‌ బోర్డు సమావేశమై ప్రయోగానికి గ్రీన్‌ సిగ్నల్‌ ఇవ్వనుంది. 175.5 కిలోల బరువు గల భూ పరిశీలన ఉపగ్రహాన్ని ఎస్‌ఎ్‌సఎల్వీ-డీ 3 రాకెట్‌ ద్వారా అంతరిక్షంలోకి పంపనున్నారు. షార్‌లోని ప్రథమ ప్రయోగ వేదిక నుంచి రాకెట్‌ నింగిలోకి దూసుకెళ్లనుంది.

title: Diputados rechazó tratar la expulsión de los libertarios que visitaron a genocidas: el polémico voto de dos pampeanos
creator: Diario1 Diario1
content: La Cámara baja, mientras crece la polémica y el escándalo por la visita a la cárcel de Ezeiza de seis diputados de La Libertad Avanza a Alfredo Astiz y otros represores condenados por crímenes de lesa humanidad, rechazó un apartamiento del reglamento para discutir si los legisladores implicados deben ser expulsados. La propuesta fue impulsada por la diputada Gisela Marziotta (Unión por la Patria), quien semanas atrás presentó un proyecto de ley para expulsar de la Cámara a los seis diputados que integran la comitiva a Ezeza a comienzos de julio. En la sesión de este miércoles, el bloque opositor presentó un pedido de apartamiento del reglamento para discutir la propuesta de Marziotta, que fue rechazado con 121 votos en contra, 102 a favor y cinco abstenciones. Para el rechazo fue clave el abroquelamiento protector de los bloques de La Libertad Avanza y el PRO, más varios diputados de la UCR. ¿Cómo votaron los legisladores pampeanos? Los peronistas Varinia Marín y Ariel Rauschenberger, y la radical Marcela Coli a favor de que se abra la discusión sobre la expulsión, en tanto que los macristas Martín Ardohain y Martín Maquieyra votaron negativamente. En la previa a este debate, Marziotta ya había adelantado que se debía avanzar con la sanción máxima y pedir la expulsión de los diputados, una iniciativa que va más allá del pedido de otros legisladores...

title: खटीक समाज की बैठक में सम्मान समारोह पर चर्चा
content: बारां | अपना मित्र परिषद खटीक समाज शाखा की बैठक शहर के पब्लिक पार्क हुई। परिषद अध्यक्ष बृजमोहन आर्य ने बताया कि बैठक के दौरान गत 25 दिसंबर 2023 को कराई गई निशुल्क समान्य ज्ञान प्रतियोगिता परीक्षा का परिणाम आने पर सफल विद्या​र्थियों का सम्मान समारोह आ कार्यकारिणी के सभाध्यक्ष डॉ. भोलाराम दिलावर ने 13 अक्टूबर 2024 को सम्मान समारोह आयोजित करने की बात कही, जिसका समाज बंधुओं ने सर्वसम्मति से स्वागत किया। बैठक में महामंत्री रामस्वरूप वर्मा, उपमहामंत्री सूर्यप्रकाश पहाड़िया, कोषाध्यक्ष बुद्धिप्रकाश दिलावर, सेवानिवृत कॉलेज प्रोफेसर पूरणमल बागोरिया, योगेंद्र आर्य, सत्यनारायण खींची, हुकमचंद छंदक आदि मौजूद थे।

title: Capturan a mujeres que estafaban a familiares de privados de libertad ofreciéndoles la liberación de sus parientes
creator: Redacción Diario La Página
content: La Fiscalía General de la República ordenó la captura de 8 personas vinculadas a una banda de extorsionistas, que ofrecían la liberación de privados de libertad a sus parientes a cambio de importantes sumas de dinero. Según la Fiscalía, estos sujetos contactaban a familiares de privados de libertad por el régimen de excepción y pedían entre $2 mil y hasta $25 mil por la liberación de los detenidos . El cabecilla de esta estructura sería Mateo Sebastián Pinto Rodríguez, quien ha sido identificado como un salvadoreño que reside en Colombia, desde donde dirige la banda. «Pinto contactaba a las víctimas y les solicitaba entre $2,000 y $25,000 dólares para liberar a sus familiares detenidos» , confirmó la Fiscalía. Dentro de las investigaciones consta que, una vez recibido el dinero de las víctimas, este se depositaba en distintas cuentas bancarias y posteriormente era enviado a Colombia. Las detenciones se dieron esta madrugada en la colonia Zacamil, Mejicanos, San Salvador, Cuscatancingo, San Martin y La Libertad. Entre los capturados se encuentran cuatro mujeres que prestaban sus cuentas bancarias para que las víctimas depositaran el dinero. Estas fueron identificadas como Jenifer Gabriela Sandoval Alvarado, Karla Cristina Aguirre Quintanilla, Ana Elizabeth Rodríguez Umaña, y Blanca Miriam Menjívar Pineda. El fiscal del caso aseguró que los estafadores...
