Lula: Economia brasileira não está o “paraíso dos paraísos”
creator: Estadão Conteúdo
content: Publicidade O presidente Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva admitiu que a economia brasileira não está o “paraíso dos paraísos” mas, segundo ele, está tendo um desempenho melhor do que se pensava que ia ter no momento. Ao destacar a importância de fazer o dinheiro circular no país, Lula voltou a criticar o patamar da taxa de juros, a Selic. “A economia brasileira não está o paraíso dos paraísos, até porque, quando ela crescia 14% ao ano, não era o paraíso”, comentou o presidente durante reunião com a indústria farmacêutica para anúncio de investimentos nesta quarta-feira, 14, no Palácio do Planalto. “Naquele tempo, havia diversidade entre economia e ideologia; a economia crescia 14% e a juventude era perseguida porque tentava derrubar o regime militar”, comentou. Apesar de admitir que há melhorias a serem feitas na economia, Lula destacou o atual cenário econômico nacional. “Este momento que estamos vivendo agora é graças, primeiro, à existência de vocês, que acreditam que esse país pode ser melhor, às pessoas que compõem o governo, aos companheiros dos bancos públicos que sabem que o dinheiro tem que circular”, disse. Descubra o passo a passo para viver de dividendos e ter uma renda mensal; começando já nas próximas semanas. Na avaliação do petista, “não tem sentido”, o Banco Nacional de Desenvolvimento Econômico e Social (BNDES) não ter...

title: El curioso método para ejercitar la memoria que no requiere ningún esfuerzo
content: La pérdida de memoria se puede dar por una gran cantidad de factores a lo largo de la vida. Sin embargo, existen diferentes ejercicios para fortalecer las funciones cognitivas y hay una que no requiere ningún tipo de esfuerzo para sorpresa de todos. Las funciones de la memoria comienzan a preocupar al ser humano a medida que pasan los años, pero los especialistas brindan un gran abanico de ejercicios para incorporar en el marco de hábitos saludables. Una persona puede realizar ciertos ejercicios, como hacer 25 minutos de bicicleta fija o consumir algunos alimentos como el té verde o arándanos . Sin embargo, pocos saben de los beneficios que tiene el descanso a la hora de memorizar algo. Cuando se intente memorizar una información nueva, lo mejor es hacer una pausa de 10 a 15 minutos para incorporar de manera efectiva ese nuevo conocimiento . Esto, por supuesto, sin grandes distracciones como un celular. La primera vez que se realizó un estudio al respecto fue en 1900, cuando el psicólogo alemán Georg Elias Müller y su estudiante Alfons Pilzecker les pidieron a los participantes que aprendiesen una lista de sílabas sin significado alguno. Luego lo dividieron en dos grupos: a la primera mitad le pidieron que aprendieran inmediatamente el contenido de la segunda lista, mientras que a la segunda mitad, le dieron un total de seis minutos para descansar antes de...

title: Llama Iglesia Católica llama a evitar la ‘injusta sobrerrepresentación’
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: CDMX.- La Conferencia del Episcopado Mexicano (CEM) lanzó un llamado en el que pide al Instituto Nacional Electoral (INE) y al Tribunal Electoral del Poder Judicial de la Federación (TEPJF) que actúen con responsabilidad y congruencia en la designación de los diputados por representación proporcional para evitar una “injusta sobrerrepresentación”. “Es esencial que en este proceso se respete tanto ‘la letra’ como ‘el espíritu de las Leyes’. Esto implica evitar una injusta sobrerrepresentación de algunas fuerzas políticas. Recordemos que la Constitución ha establecido un equilibrio entre los legisladores de los distintos partidos y coaliciones, y este equilibrio debe ser honrado y mantenido” , señaló la CEM. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Debe permanecer autonomía del INAI: Adrián Alcalá Los obispos señalaron que debilitaría al país si las instituciones no respetan “el espíritu” de lo que mandata la Constitución y la ley. “La democracia debe ser real y no solo formal. Es imprescindible considerar tanto “la letra” de la Constitución Mexicana y las leyes electorales, como ‘el espíritu de las leyes’. Debemos evitar caer en legalismos que traicionen los motivos que dieron origen a dichas legislaciones, pues esto debilitaría nuestra democracia” , advirtió. La iglesia también solicitó a las autoridades del Gobierno Federal que se abstengan de cualquier tipo de...

title: Chandigarh News: तीन साल की कंचन ने किडनी के मरीज को दिया नया जीवन
Sekulov alla Samp, Torregrossa verso Cosenza. La giornata di mercato in Serie B
content: Giornata senza guizzi in Serie B con un solo colpo messo a segno: ovvero il trasferimento del fantasista Nikola Sekulov dalla Juventus alla Sampdoria in prestito con obbligo di riscatto, con il classe 2002 che firmerà fino al 2028. Il Sudtirol ha invece annunciato il rinnovo di contratto dell’attaccante Daniele Casiraghi che ha prolungato per un’altra stagione coi biancorossi legandosi a essi fino al 2026. Il Bari invece ha sfoltito la rosa cedendo in prestito all’Ascoli l’attaccante Ismail Achik e risolvendo il contratto del mediano Matteo Ahmetaj . L’avventura al Sassuolo del centrocampista Alessandro Mercati , classe 2002, è terminata dopo un lungo percorso che lo ha visto protagonista fin dal settore giovanile senza però mai esordire in prima squadra. Il giocatore dopo le esperienze in Serie C con Montevarchi, Gubbio e Carrarese è volato in Grecia per firmare con l’Athens Kallithea. Ernesto Torregrossa è sempre più vicino all’addio al Pisa, dove era arrivato nel gennaio 2022,non rientrando più nei piani della società e del tecnico Filippo Inzaghi. Per questo il club toscano sta cercando una sistemazione al classe ‘92 con l’ipotesi Cosenza, che deve sostituire ancora Tutino, che si sarebbe fatto avanti su esplicita richiesta del tecnico Massimiliano Alvini che stima moltissimo l’italo-venezuelano. Dopo Daniele Verde , ceduto alla Salernitana, in casa Spezia si...

title: Fato Relevante - Vitória Leilão de Palhoça (SC)
creator: DINO
content: São Paulo, 14 de agosto de 2024 - Para fins do disposto na Resolução CVM no 44 de 23 de agosto de 2021 a Aegea Saneamento e Participações S.A. ("Aegea" ou "Companhia"), anuncia que, nesta data, o Consórcio Aegea ("Consórcio"), formado por Aegea, com participação de 1% e Saneamento Consultoria S.A., veículo de investimento no qual a Aegea detém 75% de participação no capital social votante, com participação de 99%, sagrou-se vencedor da Concorrência Pública ("Licitação") no 096/2024/PMP, cujo objeto consiste na concessão comum dos serviços públicos de abastecimento de água e esgotamento sanitário pelo prazo de 30 anos no município de Palhoça, em Santa Catarina ("Concessão"), com uma população de aproximadamente 223 mil habitantes. O Consórcio aguardará a publicação da adjudicação e da homologação do resultado da Licitação, para posterior assinatura do Contrato de Concessão por meio da sociedade de propósito específico a ser constituída para executá-lo. A Concessão será a quinta operação da Aegea no Estado de Santa Catarina, que opera em mais de 500 municípios de 15 estados do país, atendendo mais de 31 milhões de pessoas. Esta conquista representa a concretização de mais uma importante etapa do planejamento estratégico da Aegea, que visa o seu crescimento qualificado e a contribuição para o desenvolvimento do saneamento...

title: Persona 3 Reload producer dashes any remaining hopes for the return of Portable's female protagonist: 'It is likely never going to happen'
content: While we had a lot of love to share in our Persona 3 Reload review , we couldn't help but note one glaring omission in the remade slice of life dungeon crawler: Kotone Shiomi, the female protagonist added in Persona 3's PSP port, Persona 3 Portable. Despite her absence, Players have held out hopes that Portable's female protag option might return as other content from earlier versions of P3 arrives as DLC for Reload. Sadly, Persona series producer Kazuhisa Wada once again says it's not to be. In an interview from Game Informer issue 368—which, because GameStop obliterated the archive for its recently-shuttered magazine, is only available in print—an apologetic Wada said Atlus had considered adding Kotone to P3R while planning the upcoming epilogue DLC, Episode Aigis - The Answer. Unfortunately, the amount of work would prove impossible in the development time Atlus had available. "The more we discussed it, the more unlikely it became," Wada said. "The development time and costs would not have been manageable." Even if Atlus signed off on an eventual female protagonist DLC, Wada says it would release so far in the future that it'd be financially unviable. "P3R has just released, and there is currently a lot of player interest, so if we are to do an additional release, it has to be now. But since it is not possible for us to release P3R with the female protagonist in this...

title: Revisa la entrevista a Michelle Bachelet realizada por La Tercera y Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez
content: En el marco del ciclo “Mujer y Política”, organizado por el Magíster en Comunicación Política y Asuntos Públicos (MCP) de la UAI y La Tercera, la expresidenta Michelle Bachelet conversó acerca de su paso por la política y también su experiencia como mandataria. En el encuentro, la exjefa de Estado, quien actualmente es la figura mejor posicionada del oficialismo para las próximas presidenciales , reflexionó sobre su trayectoria política y las dificultades que enfrentó como la primera mujer en asumir la presidencia en el país. Bachelet afirmó que nunca imaginó ni deseó alcanzar dicho cargo, y mucho menos en dos ocasiones. Capítulo 41 | Desde la Redacción: Presidente del PC aborda tensiones por Venezuela y la entrevista personal a Bachelet Hace 5 horas Matthei critica al oficialismo por presencia de Bachelet en actividades: “Espero no estén gastando plata de todos los chilenos” Hace 9 horas Ante la pregunta sobre si sería candidata presidencial, Bachelet aseguró que no está en sus planes. “Creo que a la democracia le hace bien tener rostros nuevos. No quiere decir que rostros jóvenes necesariamente, pero sí rostros nuevos. Yo creo que hay una incapacidad de la democracia si siguen repitiéndose los rostros todo el tiempo en la política . Ahora, por supuesto, si hay gente que no ha ganado tiene el derecho a volver a postular”. En esa línea, enfatizó...

title: Anh muốn thuyết phục đồng minh cho phép Kiev dùng Storm Shadow tấn công vào Nga
content: Vladimir Zelensky cho biết vào tháng 7 rằng ông ta đã được sự cho phép của chính quyền Công đảng của Anh để sử dụng tên lửa Storm Shadow cho các mục tiêu ở Nga. Báo Telegraph sau đó đưa tin Bộ Quốc phòng Anh phủ nhận thông tin này. Nguồn tin của báo làm rõ rằng vấn đề cấp phép như vậy ngoài Anh ra còn liên quan đến hai nước nữa. Trước đó, Đại sứ Nga tại London Andrei Kelin nói rằng Nga xuất phát từ quan điểm ban đầu của phía Anh về việc Ukraina sử dụng tên lửa Storm Shadow , điều mà nước này đã thông báo vào tháng 5 năm 2023 - khi đó London cho phép Kiev sử dụng chúng trong phạm vi lãnh thổ Ukraina “được quốc tế công nhận”. Người đứng đầu cơ quan đại diện ngoại giao Nga lưu ý rằng tuyên bố của các quan chức Anh về việc cho Kiev sử dụng tên lửa Storm Shadow được chuyển đến nước này, như một quy luật, luôn rất mơ hồ. Nhà ngoại giao nói điều đó cho phép giới truyền thông diễn giải chúng theo các cách khác nhau.

title: सभी के सहयोग से हारेगा टीबी, जीतेगा देश : जिलाधिकारी
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, देवरिया
content: देवरिया। स्वतंत्रता दिवस से पूर्व बुधवार को जिलाधिकारी कार्यालय परिसर में कार्यक्रम आयोजित किया गया। इसमें डीएम दिव्या मित्तल सहित रेडक्राॅस सोसाइटी ने टीबी से ग्रसित 50 मरीजों को गोद लिया। जिलाधिकारी ने पांच टीबी मरीजों को गोद लिया। रेडक्राॅस सोसाइटी की ओर से टीबी मरीजों को पोषण सामग्री की पोटली प्रदान की गई। जिलाधिकारी ने कहा कि सभी के सहयोग से टीबी हारेगा, देश जीतेगा। क्षय रोगियों को रोग से जल्द छुटकारा दिलाने के लिए हाई प्रोटीन आहार की जरूरत होती है। इसलिए टीबी के सभी मरीज हाई प्रोटीन आहार का सेवन करते रहें। इसके लिए स्वयंसेवी संस्थाएं मदद कर ही रही हैं। रोगियों की मदद को आगे आए रेडक्राॅस सोसाइटी का आभार व्यक्त किया और आगे भी उन लोगों से इसी तरह के सहयोग की अपेक्षा की। सीएमओ डॉ. राजेश झा ने कहा कि विभाग की ओर से भी हर टीबी मरीज को निक्षय पोषण योजना के तहत उपचार चलने तक प्रतिमाह पांच सौ रुपये दिए जाते हैं। यह धनराशि मरीज के खाते में सीधे ट्रांसफर की जाती है। टीबी मरीज किसी भी हाल में उपचार पूरा होने तक दवा बीच में बंद न करें। पूरा उपचार किए बिना दवा बंद करना मरीज के लिए घातक साबित हो सकता है। अक्सर लोग जानकारी के अभाव में बिना चिकित्सकीय परामर्श के इलाज के दौरान थोड़ा सा आराम आने की स्थिति में दवा लेना बंद कर देते हैं, जो गलत है। इससे उनकी बीमारी और भी बिगड़ जाती है। रेडक्राॅस सोसाइटी के अखिलेंद्र शाही, नितिन बरनवाल, डॉ. बिपिन बिहारी शर्मा, डॉ. रीतू सिंह ने दो-दो, सोसाइटी के सभापति रमेश चंद्र सिंह, उप सभापति टीपी सिंह, डॉ. मिथिलेश सिंह सिंह, वकील सिंह, टीपी सिंह, मिथिलेश,...

title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford Exits Practice With Leg Injury
content: Los Angeles Rams star quarterback Matthew Stafford exited Wednesday's joint practice with the Dallas Cowboys due to hamstring tightness. ESPN's Lindsey Thiry was among the first to report via Twitter/X. Rams QB Matthew Stafford did not finish today’s joint workout with the Cowboys due to hamstring tightness, per a Rams official. The 36-year-old missed the second half of the practice but remained on the sideline in pads and did not show signs of ailing for the remainder of the practice. "(Stafford) operates at a world class level," offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur said. "But we know that every rep is going to be valuable for him, no matter how many plays he's had. Unfortunately, he had some tightness." Backup quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo worked with the first team for the remainder of the practice. Garoppolo did not play in Sunday's preseason game against the Cowboys and will miss the first two games of the regular season due to a PED suspension. Stafford will enter his 16th season and fourth in Los Angeles. It's been quite the roller coaster for the veteran quarterback, but he's thrived in L.A. under head coach Sean McVay. In three seasons in Los Angeles, Stafford has a 24-17 record in 41 games and has completed 936 passes for 10,938 yards, 75 touchdowns, and 36 interceptions with a 95.8 passer rating. Additionally, Stafford has been named to one Pro Bowl and led the Rams to...

title: Por que Gusttavo Lima não estará em Barretos 2024?
creator: Perfil Brasil
content: A Festa do Peão de Barretos é um evento cultural que acontece anualmente e reúne grandes nomes da música sertaneja. Uma figura desse festival é o cantor Gusttavo Lima , conhecido popularmente como " embaixador ". No entanto, sua ausência nas edições de 2023 e 2024 tem gerado especulações entre os fãs. Desde 2010, a organização do evento homenageia músicos concedendo-lhes o título de embaixador. Esse título começou com Luan Santana e passou por artistas como Cristiano Araújo, Henrique & Juliano, Simone & Simaria e César Menotti & Fabiano . Gusttavo Lima recebeu com o título em 2017 e 2018 e deveria ter recebido novamente em 2020, edição que foi cancelada devido à pandemia. O cantor, desde que assumiu o posto de embaixador, usa o bordão " respeita o Embaixador " em seus shows. Sua última apresentação no evento foi em 2022, levantando dúvidas sobre o que teria acontecido. Una bachata feeling!🎶 "Cem Mil" e "Respeita o Nosso Fim" são dois grandes sucessos do projeto "O Embaixador", gravado em Barretos no ano de 2019. Músicas que marcaram minha história e estão nesse meu novo projeto #Embaixador15Anos . Confira agora! pic.twitter.com/daGeSUPmxr — Gusttavo Lima (@gusttavo_lima) June 11, 2023 A Festa do Peão de Barretos 2024 acontecerá entre 15 e 25 de agosto, porém não contará com a presença de Gusttavo Lima. title: ‘Snow White’ actress says ‘free Palestine’ after Disney debuts trailer featuring Israeli-born Gal Gadot
content: Rachel Zegler, the actress playing Snow White in Disney 's highly anticipated remake of Snow White, is sparking outrage for her latest social media post that promotes a pro- Palestinian message. "I love you all so much! Thank you for the love and for 120m views on our trailer in just 24 hours! What a whirlwind," Zeglar posted on X. "I am in the thick of rehearsals for Romeo and Juliet so I'm gonna get outta here. Bye for now." Her post came after Disney posted a teaser trailer of the live-action version of the classic movie. Following her first social media post thanking fans, Zegler added a second message Monday that stirred controversy. "And always remember, free palestine," she said . The political comment about the Israeli-Hamas conflict in Gaza was seen by over 6 million X users and garnered numerous online reactions. Gal Gadot, an Israeli-born actress, is starring alongside Zeglar in the film as Snow White's nemesis, the Evil Queen. Journalist Seth Mandel pointed out that Zegler was “egging” on the “hordes of antisemites” who attacked Disney's trailer over Gadot's appearance in the film. "The release of the trailer for Snow White got hit with an online backlash against Gal Gadot by hordes of antisemites. Here is Gadot's co-star egging them on," he said in response. "Gonna be a weird/cool experience to be rooting for the evil witch!" author Batya Ungar-Sargon said . "Stay...

title: Эрдоган заявил о продолжении поддержки Палестины правительством Турции
creator: Александра Майданская
content: Турция продолжит поддерживать Палестину и поможет добиться завершения конфликта с Израилем . Об этом президент страны Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган заявил 14 августа на встрече со своим коллегой Махмудом Аббасом. «Турция продолжит поддерживать правое дело Палестины и работать над тем, чтобы остановить Израиль», — сказал он. Кроме того, Эрдоган осудил действия Армии обороны Израиля (ЦАХАЛ), которые «приводят к гибели мирных жителей, в том числе детей, а также разрушение школ, больниц и убежищ в Газе». Он также подчеркнул неприемлемость поддержки Израиля западными странами. До этого Эрдоган уже выражал поддержку Палестине. Так, после гибели главы политбюро ХАМАС Исмаила Хании 31 июля он осудил действия Израиля и назвал это «варварством». Кроме того, президент Турции принял в Стамбуле сыновей погибшего Хании и выразил свои соболезнования. 30 июля произошел новый виток обострения на Ближнем Востоке после удара ЦАХАЛ по объектам ливанского движения «Хезболла» в Бейруте. Отмечалось, что как минимум 68 человек пострадали в результате этого удара. Позднее в ЦАХАЛ сообщили, что при атаке по району Бейрута был ликвидирован один из командиров движения «Хезболла» Фуад Шокр. На следующий день в результате удара по Тегерану погибли глава политбюро ХАМАС Исмаил Хания и его телохранитель . Ситуация на Ближнем Востоке обострилась утром 7 октября 2023 года, когда палестинское радикальное...

title: Bundesregierung: FDP-Fraktionschef sieht Haushaltstreit trotz Regierungskrise gelassen
creator: ZEIT ONLINE: Deutschland - Simon Sales Prado
content: FDP-Fraktionschef Christian Dürr sieht bei den Regierungsberatungen zum Haushalt keinen Grund zur Eile. "Der Bundestag berät zum ersten Mal am 10. September über den Bundeshaushalt. Das zeigt, dass wir noch etwas Zeit haben", sagte Dürr dem RedaktionsNetzwerk Deutschland . "Je zeitnäher es die Einigung gibt, umso besser ist das natürlich." Dürr ist nach eigenen Worten zuversichtlich, dass es eine Einigung geben wird. "Aber dabei geht es nicht um einzelne Tage oder Stunden – das Ergebnis muss stimmen." 99 Prozent des Haushaltes stünden bereits. "Jetzt muss noch die letzte Lücke geschlossen werden. Die Dimension zeigt, dass die Aufgabe machbar ist." Möglichst noch in dieser Woche wollen Finanzminister Christian Lindner ( FDP ), Bundeskanzler Olaf Scholz (SPD) und Vizekanzler Robert Habeck (Grüne) eine Einigung erzielen und diese im Kabinett beschließen . In den vergangenen Tagen war die Auseinandersetzung um den Bundeshaushalt für das kommende Jahr neu entflammt, die Koalitionspartner machten sich teils heftige Vorwürfe . Nach jüngsten Angaben besteht weiterhin eine Finanzierungslücke von mehr als fünf Milliarden Euro im Haushalt bei einem Gesamtvolumen von 480 Milliarden Euro. Bundeshaushalt

title: Kaley Cuoco Reveals Major Relationship Update
content: Kaley Cuoco has huge news to share: She's engaged! The alum, 38, took to her instagram Story on Wednesday, August 14, to make the exciting announcement. "AMAZING WEEKEND," Cuoco wrote in all-caps in the first photo on her Story — a selfie of her and her now-fiance, Tom Pelphrey, grinning from ear-to-ear. The couple leaned into each other affectionately, their noses touching, as the actress showed off her sparkly new engagement ring. Cuoco — who also rocked, fittingly, gold and silver Cartier "Love" bangles on her wrist — fanned her fingers out in front of the alum's face so the camera focused on the emerald-cut diamond. "What a wild, beautiful journey life can be," Cuoco captioned another clip from her and Pelphrey's engagement — this one just of her left hand (with the ring carefully in place). "Grateful for every road that led me straight to you @tommypelphrey." Pelphrey, for his part, wrote his own ode to Cuoco in his engagement upload. "My heart is full of love and gratitude for this miracle. Eternally grateful for the strength and bravery of my soulmate and best friend @kaleycuoco," the actor penned. "You are incredible." Cuoco and Pelphrey also shared a series of photos with their 1-year-old daughter, Matilda, whom they welcomed in March 2023. The alum — who was previously married to Ryan Sweeting from 2013 to 2016, and to Karl Cook from 2018 to 2022 — previously swore...

title: Babu Santana anuncia pausa na carreira de ator e inicia novo rumo; saiba
creator: Mais Novela
content: Babu Santana deu uma pausa na carreira de ator para anunciar sua candidatura a vereador pelo Rio de Janeiro, nas eleições deste ano, pelo PSOL (Partido Socialismo e Liberdade). O artista já possui até mesmo sua marca registrada: o pente na cabeça. "Essa é a foto que vocês verão no dia 6 de outubro. Muitos me chamaram de louco, mas eu estou vivendo um sonho. Durante toda a minha vida eu vivi em prol da arte e da cultura. E hoje, ao olhar essa foto me lembrei de como a arte mudou minha vida", disse ele, no ar em O Jogo Que Mudou a História, série policial do Globoplay, seu mais recente trabalho como ator. "Cresci no morro do Vidigal, enfrentando desafios que muitos conhecem de perto. E foi o teatro, a arte e a cultura que me deram a força e a oportunidade de ser quem sou hoje. Agora, quero retribuir e transformar outras vidas como a minha foi transformada. Como vereador, vou lutar para que mais pessoas tenham essa chance" , continuou. Babu também criou a hashtag #VemPraTropaDoBABU, para que o público e seus seguidores o apoiem nessa sua nova fase, rumo à Câmara Municipal do Rio de Janeiro. Uma publicação compartilhada por BABU (@babusantana)

title: Kurukshetra News: सड़क हादसे में एक की मौत, एक गंभीर
content: लाडवा। पिपली रोड पर गांव सौंटी के पास हुए सड़क हादसे में बाइक सवार एक युवक की मौत हो गई जबकि एक गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गया। बताया जा रहा है कि शाम के समय बाइक सवार दो युवकों को एक पिकअप गाड़ी ने टक्कर मार दी, जिसमें दोनों युवक गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गए। इनमें से एक ने मौके पर ही दम तोड़ दिया जबकि दूसरा युवक समाचार लिखे जाने तक गंभीर रूप से घायल रहा। सूचना मिलते ही पुलिस मौके पर पहुंची तो घायल को सरकारी अस्पताल में भेजा गया। वहीं पुलिस पुलिस ने हादसे की जांच शुरू कर दी है। समाचार लिखे जाने तक हादसे के शिकार युवकों की पहचान नहीं हो पाई थी।

title: Tranquilino J. Martinez: We veterans say ...
creator: Letters to the editor
content: I know that my now gone four brothers and three brothers-in-law all veterans took our sworn honor to “protect and defend the Constitution of these United State against all enemies ....” as a righteous duty expected of all of who took this oath, would agree with the following statements. “No!” to Project 2025 because it’s a Nazi Manifesto, where allegiance is not pledged to the nation’s Constitution but to a dictator. “No!” to Putin’s pal Trump, a vomit-speaking lying crook who is backward and a weirdo! All of us would ask to “save Social Security” and elect those who would defend it, as well as the Affordable Care Act. Where would you or the ones you love be today if these “for the common good” essential programs were to cease? As President John Kennedy asked: “Ask not what this county can do for you ask what you can do for your country.” Vote to preserve our nation, a nation of laws made possible by the blood given by those who gave freely their lives on so many battle fields to preserve the United State of America. I ask that you vote to make Kamala Harris and Tim Walz the President and Vice-President of the United States of America. — Tranquilino J. Martinez/California National Guard and U.S. Navy veteran

title: Rodriguinho rebate criticas após participação no 'BBB 24': 'O que eu mais me irritei...'
creator: Márcia Piovesan
content: O cantor Rodriguinho abriu o jogo sobre as críticas que recebeu durante sua participação no BBB 24. Em entrevista à TV Caras, o famoso confessou que alguns ataques o incomodou. "Acho que, em geral, tivemos uma interpretação muito errada das coisas. O que eu mais me irritei mesmo, o que mais me chateou foi eu falar de vitórias minhas e ser confundido com soberba. Porque nada do que eu falei foi dando carteirada, nada do que falei foi: é, eu tenho. Não foi assim. Estava conversando, tipo: 'Você gosta de tênis, você tem? Pô, mas esse tênis custa tanto'. Eu tenho, ponto. 'Ah, ele é um soberbo, ele fala que ele tem'. Peraí", iniciou o ex-BBB. E continuou: "Teve um dia, que eu estava brincando também, brinquei com a Pitel, porque ela falou dos chinelos. Aí, falei: Não vem com esses chinelos baratos, não. Era brincadeira! Aí você fala: Não tem como discutir com uma pessoa, com uma opinião que já está formada. Isso foi a única coisa que me chateou, o restante não". Rodriguinho ressaltou que não se importa com os haters. " Me importo zero com haters. Sou muito seguro com o que eu sou. É o que falei, que me chateou. Porque quando falo que me chateou, é porque falo de vitórias que eu tive na vida, entendeu? Hoje, eu comprar um tênis caro pra mim já não é mais uma vitória. Mas teve uma época que foi. Teve uma época que trabalhei pra caramba pra ter...

title: Friends of CHOP doctor killed in alleged drunk driving crash petition for cyclist safety
creator: 6abc Digital Staff
content: PHILADELPHIA (WPVI) -- Members of the medical community in Philadelphia are pushing for safety improvements for cyclists and pedestrians after a fatal crash last month . The friends and coworkers of Dr. Barbara Friedes, who worked at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, have teamed up with cycling organizations to get nearly 6,000 signatures for more funding to protect bike lanes. Friedes was killed at 18th and Spruce streets on July 17 . Authorities say the driver who struck her was intoxicated and speeding at the time of the crash while Friedes was bicycling home. Michael Vahey, 68, was charged with homicide by vehicle, involuntary manslaughter, driving under the influence, reckless driving, and related offenses. As Vahey remains in custody, Friedes' friends are determined to make a change. "How do we make safer streets not only for cyclists but also for pedestrians?" asked Kelly McNult, a friend and coworker of Friedes. "We are delivering a petition to the city council as it's in session to ask for renewal of funding for Vision Zero." McNult, a pediatrician and fellow cyclist, says city funding for Vision Zero -- a program designed to end traffic-related deaths -- was slashed in this year's budget. Last year's $2.5 million is now down to $1 million for Vision Zero projects, like protected bike lanes that prevent cars from parking on corners or veering into cyclists. McNult...

title: صحيفة: بريطانيا تحاول إقناع الحلفاء بالموافقة على استخدام أوكرانيا لصواريخ "ستورم شادوو" ضد روسيا
content: وأشارت "تايمز" إلى أن حكومات الدول الأخرى كانت تعارض استخدام أوكرانيا لأسلحة بعيدة المدى ضد أهداف في روسيا بسبب مخاطر التصعيد. وأكد متحدث باسم وزارة الدفاع البريطانية أنه "لم يكن هناك أي تغير في سياسات الحكومة" تجاه استخدام أسلحة بريطانية الصنع، مضيفا أن "لدى أوكرانيا حقا واضحا في الدفاع عن نفسها ضد هجمات روسيا غير الشرعية. وهذا لا يستبعد العمليات داخل روسيا". وكانت صحيفة "تلغراف" قد أفادت بأن الإذن لاستخدام الأسلحة البريطانية ضد روسيا لا يشمل صواريخ "ستورم شادوو" التي تصنع بشكل مشترك مع بعض حلفاء بريطانيا، مضيفة أن استخدام القوات الأوكرانية لها ضد أهداف في روسيا يتطلب موافقة دولتين أخريين. المصدر: "تايمز"

title: Vladimir Cerrón y Perú Libre: ¿Es legal usar el Congreso de la República para exaltar a un prófugo?
content: Keiko Fujimori . Metro UNI . Christian Cueva . Dólar en Perú . Aniversario de Arequipa . Resultados UNI . Rafael Cardozo . Colección de BTS . Examen UNI . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias El último martes, el partido fundado por Vladimir Cerrón estuvo de aniversario y los congresistas de la bancada usaron las instalaciones del Congreso para realizar actos conmemorativos, en donde colocaron fotografías del prófugo. Liderados por el segundo vicepresidente del Congreso, Waldemar Cerrón, hermano del prófugo Vladimir Cerrón, los parlamentarios de la bancada de Perú Libre usaron las instalaciones del Congreso de la República para realizar actividades de celebración por el décimosexto aniversario del partido. Lo polémico de esto, es que diversas fotografías del prófugo Vladimir Cerrón fueron puestas en exhibición en la sala Francisco Javier de Luna Pizarro, como parte de una exposición fotográfica. Además, su imagen fue proyectada en varias pantallas mientras los simpatizantes invitados al parlamento y los congresistas de la bancada lanzaban arengas a favor del investigado por lavado de dinero . Perú Libre celebra aniversario de su partido en el Congreso con imágenes del prófugo Vladimir Cerrón. Foto: Facebook ¿Es legal...

title: ¡Celebramos a los Ganadores del Sorteo Especial del Billetero N°38!
creator: Leyda Milena Chamul Flores
content: Nos complace anunciar los ganadores del Sorteo Especial del Billetero No38 un sorteo dedicado a nuestros agentes vendedores, quienes día a día llevan la esperanza y la ilusión a cada rincón de El Salvador a través de nuestros billetes de lotería. Este sorteo resalta el compromiso y el esfuerzo de los agentes vendedores, con cuyo trabajo han cambiado vidas y hecho realidad muchos sueños. Compartimos con ustedes el testimonio de Don Isidro Galeas, un agente vendedor con 44 años de experiencia de venta en nuestra agencia San Salvador. Don Isidro nos cuenta: «Decidir emprender en la venta de lotería ha sido una de las mejores decisiones de mi vida. Dejar mi antiguo empleo para seguir este camino me ha permitido apoyar a mi familia y ver cómo muchos salvadoreños han cumplido sus sueños, como comprar sus casas gracias 2 los premios obtenidos. Animo a todos los salvadoreños a seguir participando, ya que los premios son una realidad. Los 154 años de historia de la Lotería Nacional de Beneficencia respaldan nuestra promesa de premiar a nuestros jugadores. Jueguen y, con fe y perseverancia, podrán obtener el premio.» Este miércoles de alegría está lleno de emoción, y estamos encantados de anunciar los números ganadores de nuestro Sorteo: Tercer Premio de $10,000.00Billete N20434 No vendido Segundo Premio de $20,000.00 – illete No36489 Vendido Primer Premio Acumulado...

title: Sergio Salomón busca concluir mandato antes de pensar en sumarse a equipo de Sheinbaum
content: “ Estamos firmes en tratar de concluir el gobierno ”, dijo el titular del poder ejecutivo, Sergio Salomón Céspedes Peregrina , luego de que la presidenta electa de México, Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo , dio a conocer que lo invitó a formar parte de la próxima administración federal. ➡️ Únete al canal de El Sol de Puebla en WhatsApp y accede a la información más importante El gobernador evitó dar a conocer el cargo que le fue ofrecido por la próxima presidenta de la República, con el argumento de que será ella quien dé a conocer las decisiones que tome respecto a la integración de su gabinete ; no obstante, adelantó que buscaría concluir su gestión en Puebla hasta el próximo mes de diciembre , a pesar de que el cambio de gobierno federal se dará el próximo 1 de octubre. Yo me siento muy halagado, por supuesto que más comprometido, en mi caso el apoyo fue incondicional y no hay tema, vamos a apoyar con todo y si en su momento hubiera algún cambio, sin ningún problema. Estoy seguro que le va a ir muy bien a México y si se concretan las cosas para mí sería un honor declaró a la prensa. Local Invitó Claudia Sheinbaum a Sergio Salomón a formar parte de su gabinete El mandatario poblano consideró que la invitación realizada por Sheinbaum a gobernadores en funciones para sumarse a su equipo de trabajo , como en su caso, es una decisión acertada que atiende...

title: 탄소중립 청년 서포터즈, 한려해상국립공원에 푹 빠지다
creator: 정경규 기자
content: [진주=뉴시스] 정경규 기자 = 국립공원공단 한려해상국립공원사무소는 지난 7일과 14일 두 차례에 걸쳐 전국에서 선발한 국립공원 탄소중립 청년 서포터즈 21명을 대상으로 국립공원의 정책을 홍보하는 '탄소중립 청년 서포터즈 현장 체험'을 실시했다고 15일 밝혔다. 이번 현장 체험은 한려해상국립공원의 업무를 알리고 누리소통망(SNS) 등을 통해 청년 서포터즈가 국립공원의 다양한 사업과 직무를 이해하기 위한 실질적인 경험을 쌓을 수 있도록 마련됐다. 한려해상국립공원의 핵심사업인 상괭이 보호·보전사업과 멸종위기종(거머리말) 및 국가보호종(흰발농게) 조사 모니터링 사업 등에 대한 소개와 함께 현장에서의 교육을 병행해 높은 호응을 얻었다. 청년 서포터즈는 현장에서의 경험을 바탕으로 오는 9월부터 11월까지 3개월동안 온·오프라인 활동을 통해 국립공원의 정책을 홍보하고 탄소중립 실천 등 올바른 탐방문화를 확산시키기 위한 활동을 본격적으로 이어갈 예정이다. 한려해상국립공원사무소 양수민 탐방시설 과장은 “청년들의 참신하고 혁신적인 아이디어로 국립공원의 다양한 역할이 국민들에게 쉽고 재밌게 전달되기를 바란다"며 "청년세대의 시각으로 바라보는 탄소중립과 국립공원의 중요성을 알리는 서포터즈 활동에 많은 기대와 관심을 부탁드린다"고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Türkiye urges Islamic countries to strive for Gaza ceasefire
content: The communication department of the Turkish presidency issued a statement that Erdogan and Abbas discussed and reviewed the developments in Gaza, including the mass killings of Palestinians by the Zionist regime, according to IRNA’s Wednesday night report citing the Turkish media. Erdogan reiterated that Türkiye will continue to support the just cause of Palestine and stressed that all countries, especially Islamic, should increase their efforts to ensure an immediate ceasefire in Gaza and the uninterrupted delivery of humanitarian aid to the Palestinians. The head of the Palestinian Authority arrived in Ankara on Wednesday evening for a two-day visit after a trip to Moscow. Abbas is scheduled to address the Turkish parliament where lawmakers will hold an emergency meeting in support of Palestine on Thursday. While in Moscow to meet the Russian President Vladimir Putin, the Palestinian Authority chief called the United States the main obstacle to prevent a Palestinian state and denounced efforts to put Russia away from the so-called Middle East peace process. 4399

title: महिला बाल विकास विभाग:आंगनवाड़ी कार्यकर्ता ​का नंबर नहीं होगा सार्वजनिक, अलग सिम मिलेगी
content: महिला बाल विकास विभाग जल्द ही एक लाख सिम कार्ड खरीदकर हर आंगनवाड़ी केंद्र को उपलब्ध कराएगा। अभी तक कार्यकर्ताओं को फोन तो विभाग ने दिए थे पर सिमकार्ड कार्यकर्ताओं को अपना ही उपयोग करना पड़ रहा था। सरकारी नियमों के मुताबिक आंगनवाड़ी कार्यकर्ताओं के नंबर सिमकार्ड सप्लाई के लिए सरकार ने 21 अगस्त तक टेंडर बुलाए थे, अब ये तारीख बढ़ाकर 31 अगस्त कर दी गई है। नया नंबर आंगनवाड़ी केंद्र का स्थाई नंबर होगा, जबकि कार्यकर्ता के रिटायर्ड होने पर नंबर बदल जाते हैं। अभी कार्यकर्ताओं को 3 महीने में सिम रिचार्ज करने के लिए 500 रुपए की राशि दी जाती है। नए सिमकार्ड विभाग खुद सिमकार्ड रिचार्ज करेगा। नया सिस्टम शुरू, विभाग एप से ले रहा अटेंडेंस विभाग ने संपर्क एप से आंगनवाड़ी जाकर हाजिरी लगाने के सिस्टम शुरू किया है। इसके लिए कार्यकर्ता को केंद्र जाकर हाजिरी मोबाइल फोन से लगानी होती है। साथ ही केंद्रों पर मिलने वाले भोजन-नाश्ते का डाटा भी एप में फीड करना होता है। वहीं पोषण ट्रैकर एप से गर्भवती मां और बच्चा होने के बाद उसका रजिस्ट्रेशन होता है।

title: NFL analyst predicts breakout season for young Bengals defensive back | Sporting News
creator: Chris Spooner
content: The offense gets the overwhelming majority of the headlines with the Cincinnati Bengals, and deservedly so. They have one of the best young quarterbacks in the league with Joe Burrow , and one of the best young wide receivers with Ja’Marr Chase. They also have one of the best duos at wide receiver in the league with Chase and Tee Higgins . But the Bengals aren’t just talented on the offense, they have some defensive players worth talking about, as well. Young defensive back Jordan Battle in particular has caught the eye of one NFL analyst. The Athletic’s NFL analyst Nick Baumgardner recently released his top picks at each position to have a breakout year in their second season . Among the defensive backs he’s chosen is the Bengals’ second-year product out of Alabama. In his rookie season with the Bengals, Battle came in and immediately made an impact for the team, making plays at all levels of the defense. In his rookie season, Battle notched seven starts and played in all 17 games. He recorded 71 tackles, four tackles for loss, two sacks, three quarterback hits, five passes defended, and notched his first career interception in the Bengals final regular season game against the Kansas City Chiefs . That playmaking ability at all levels of the defense is what has Baumgardner excited about Battle and his continued development. If he remains healthy, Baumgardner believes that...

title: Jorge Rial reveló detalles sobre un virus que lo tiene a maltraer: "No doy más"
creator: MDZ Show
content: El conductor televisivo y radial Jorge Rial debe estar especialmente atento a su estado de salud tras el infarto sufrido durante 2023, en el que pudo salvar su vida gracias a la rápida reacción de quienes lo rodeaban. Por ello, llamó la atención cuando esta mañana, durante la emisión de su programa radial Argenzuela, que se emite a través de Radio 10, le comentó al Gato Sylvestre que hace semanas se encuentra acarreando un problema de salud del que no puede recuperarse. Jorge Rial conduce Argenzuela en Radio 10 "La verdad estoy hecho bolsa, no doy más. La voz la tengo a la miseria y no se termina de ir" comenzó a detallar Jorge Rial. "Pasan los días y no se pasa". "Me estoy cuidando, ya no hago tantas locuras, salgo menos, me quedo en casa, me abrigo bien, todo por las dudas" dijo en cuanto a los cuidados que tiene sobre su cuerpo. "Hace tres semanas más o menos, ya estuve con un cuadro así, por ahí un poco peor que ahora" dijo sobre la duración de lo que parece ser un cuadro gripal típico de la época, pero con el agravante de su episodio cardíaco. "Es fuerte, es molesto y no sabés cómo sacártelo de encima". Jorge Rial sobre los video de Fernández y Pettinato Jorge Rial fue uno de los periodistas que anticipó de qué momento se trataban los videos difundidos de la visita de Tamara Pettinato con el ex presidente Alberto Fernández. title: Mirzapur News: जलस्तर बढ़ने से बांध का 10 हजार क्यूसेक पानी अदवा नदी में छोड़ा गया
content: हलिया। क्षेत्र में हो रही लगातार बारिश के कारण बुधवार को अदवा बांध का जलस्तर अचानक बढ़ गया। जलस्तर में वृद्धि के कारण चार गेट खोलकर पानी अदवा नदी में छोड़ा गया। इस साल पहली बार नदी का पानी हलिया थाने के पास बने पुल को छू रहा है। अगस्त माह में बांध में पानी रोकने का रोस्टर 170 मीटर है। अचानक पानी बढ़ने से बांध में 191 मीटर पानी हो गया। इस पर अधिकारियों ने बांध के चार गेट खोलवाकर पानी अदवा नदी में छोड़वा दिया। इस संबंध में अवर अभियंता सिद्धार्थ यादव ने बताया कि बांध में अचानक पानी बढ़ जाने से नदी में 10 हजार क्यूसेक से ज्यादा पानी छोड़ा गया है।

title: IZNENAĐENjE SA MARSA: Evo šta su po prvi put naučnici otkrili na Crvenoj planeti (VIDEO)
content: RANIJE je utvrđeno da na polovima planete postoji zaleđena voda, a pronađeni su i dokazi njenog isparavanja u atmosferu. Međutim, ovo je prvi put da je voda u tečnom obliku pronađena na ovoj planeti. Otkriće je zasnovano na analizi podataka koje je prikupila NASA pomoću letelice "Mars Insajt Lender (Mars Insight Lander)", koja je sletela na ovu planetu 2018. godine. Letelica je završila njenu naučnu misiju 2022. godine, pošto je četiri godine "mirno slušala puls Marsa". Svemirska letelica sadržala je seizmometar, koji je tokom četiri godine beležio vibracije, odnosno potrese u unutrašnjosti Crvene planete. Analiza ovih potresa i načina na koji se planeta kreće otkrila je "seizmičke signale" koji ukazuju na postojanje vode u tečnom obliku. Tokom trajanja misije zabeleženo je više od 1.319 potresa, a naučnici su merenjem brzine ovih talasa utvrdili kroz kakav materijal se kreću. "Ovo je zapravo isti metod koji koristimo kada utvrđujemo ima li vode na Zemlji, ili kada tražimo naftu i gas", kazao je profesor Mičel Manga sa Kalifornijskog univerziteta Berkli, koji je bio uključen u istraživanje. Analiza je otkrila rezervoar vode na dubini od 10 do 20 kilometara u kori Marsa. "Razumevanje kretanja vode na Marsu je ključno za razumevanje razvoja klime, površine i unutrašnjosti ove planete", rekao je vodeći istraživač Vašan Rajt, sa Skrips Instituta za...

title: Limitless Wrestling brings its biggest show of the year, maybe ever, to The Colisee
content: Dezmond Cole, right, kicks JT Dunn in the head during a Vacationland Cup qualifying match on July 20 in Yarmouth. Cole is one of eight professional wrestlers vying for the 2024 Vacationland Cup at the Limitless Wrestling event Saturday at The Colisee in Lewiston. Steve Abodeely Photography Limitless Wrestling owner Randy Carver said Saturday’s show at The Colisee is “the biggest step we’ve taken as an organization.” The Vacationland Cup, which starts at 7 p.m., has been an annual event since 2018 and is the Maine professional wrestling promotion’s version Wrestlemania. “It’s our biggest event of the year where we pit eight of the top competitors from our promotion and from around the world,” Carver said. “They go head-to-head, and the winner walks out with not only the trophy but a No. 1 contender shot at the championship. So a lot culminates, a lot of stories, a lot of big-match opportunities for our roster — and it all culminates at this show. “So to be able to bring it to Lewiston for the first time, such a big stage at The Colisee, with a rich sports history is incredible.” The Vacationland Cup begins early in the show with four first-round matches: Alec Price vs. Donovan Dijak, Aiden Aggro (of Waterville) vs. Dezmond Cole, Aaron Rourke vs. Ricky Smokes, and Gabby Forza vs. Davienne. The winners will face each other later in the night in a four-way elimination match to...

title: Renfroe surge como ﻿alternativa a Frankamp para el timón del Betis Baloncesto
content: Sergio A. Ávila Sevilla Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Copiar enlace Facebook X Whatsapp Email Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Esta funcionalidad es sólo para suscriptores A Cvetkovic y Pablo Marín, los dos directores de juego anunciados ya por el Real Betis Baloncesto, se le unirá uno más. Buscaba el club un jugador curtido, con experiencia en la Liga Endesa, ese perfil al que responden muchos de los fichajes ya cerrados, y todo se encamina ahora para que esa ficha se la quede Álex Renfroe. Base estadounidense de 1,91 y 38 metros, el metrónomo nacido en Savannah, estado de Georgia, presenta como principal aval una sólida y amplia trayectoria en la Liga Endesa, en la que ha estado compitiendo hasta esta pasada temporada, en concreto en las filas del Surne Bilbao Basket, con el que también ha disputado la FIBA Eurocup. Con los vizcaínos, Renfroe ha promediado en ACB 6,8 puntos, 3,5 rebotes y 4,7 asistencias en 32 partidos, con un 39% en el lanzamiento exterior. En total, el estadounidense acumula en la ACB 194 encuentros con promedios de 9 puntos, 3,3 capturas, 4,5 asistencias, un 50% en el tiro de dos, un 39% en el triple y un 76% en tiro libre para una valoración media de 11,5 créditos. Cifras que, sin duda, jalonan una trayectoria notable en la máxima categoría del baloncesto español. Renfroe, que tiene pasaporte bosnio y no ocupa...

title: 32 Places That Are Famous Due To A Movie
content: Film fans often flock to see the locations where their favorite movies were made, like the ones on this list. Whether it's a place crucial to the plot of a movie, like the prison in The Shawshank Redemption , or a seemingly minor spot like the burger place in Dazed & Confused , these 32 locations have become iconic for their use on film. Hook & Ladder Company 8 - Ghostbusters The coolest thing about Hook & Ladder Company 8, located on North Moore Street in the Tribeca neighborhood of New York City is that the firehouse, which is still an active station, has incorporated the Ghostbuster's logo into its crest. The building is not run down at all, as seen in the movie, and at almost any time of day, you'll see fans of the movie taking selfies. Quick Stop Groceries - Clerks Kevin Smith famously made Clerks on a minuscule budget . One way he cut costs was to film overnight in his actual place of employment, the Quick Stop Groceries convenience store in Leonardo, NJ. The store is still in business, all these years later and you can be sure they play up the fact that the movie was filmed there. King's Cross Station - The Harry Potter Series King's Cross Station is one of a few train stations in London, and while it's always been a well-known station, its fame leaped to another level with the Harry Potter series. You see, it's there, on platform 9 3/4, that Harry and the rest of the...

title: Chandigarh News: स्वतंतत्रा दिवस में सम्मानित होंगे दिलशेर खन्ना और गुरकरण सिंह
ライダーやサイクリストに優しいゲストハウス...バイク愛好家夫婦がオープン 福井県越前町、聴覚障害ある人にも配慮(福井新聞ONLINE)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 7:33 配信 宿泊者同士が交流できるスペースがあるライダー&ゲストハウス「Cozy Sign」=福井県越前町陶の谷 バイク愛好家の福井県越前町の夫婦が自宅を改修し、ライダー&ゲストハウス「Cozy Sign(コージーサイン)」をオープンした。ライダーやサイクリストに優しい内装や、耳が聞こえない人でも安心して過ごせる体制を整え、誰もが楽しめる宿を提供している。 オーナーは同町陶の谷の内田辰史さん(47)、恵子さん(53)夫妻。 旅好きという2人は3年前、そろってオートバイの免許を取得。定期的にツーリングで遠方に出かけるようになった。転機となったのは、恵子さんが一人旅で訪れた琵琶湖ほとりにあるライダーハウス。バイク仲間との温かな交流を通じて「自分たちもいつかこんな宿を持てたら」と考えるようになった。 辰史さんと相談を重ね今年7月、ライダー以外でも泊まれるゲストハウスとして開業した。辰史さんが耳が不自由なこともあり、聴覚に障害がある宿泊者が快適に過ごせる空間づくりにもこだわった。 改修には県と町の補助金を活用。1階と2階に客室計4室を整備し、1階客室には自転車を持ち込めるスペースを用意している。中庭にはバイクや自転車のメンテナンスを行える小屋を整え、必要な工具は無料で貸し出す。夫婦とは手話で会話ができ、筆談ボードも用意。緊急時の呼び出しボタンや光と振動で知らせる火災報知機も設置している。 また、宿泊客同士が交流できる共有のリビングやキッチンなども設けている。旅行者同士の交流も旅の醍醐味(だいごみ)の一つという2人。「ライダーや家族連れなど誰でも気軽に泊まってもらい、海外の人でも言語の壁を越えた交流を楽しんでほしい」と話している。今後、手話カフェやベビーヨガといったイベントも充実させていくとしている。 素泊まり限定で各部屋1人から宿泊可能。料金は各個室備え付けのベッド1台の使用につき3980円。予約はコージーサインの公式LINEなどから受け付けている。 福井新聞社 【台風7号 15日午前7時更新】伊豆諸島では “猛烈な風” のおそれ...一部の家屋では倒壊の可能性も【雨風シミュレーション】16日から17日にかけ強い勢力で東日本や東北地方に接近へ 西野監督「信じられない」 先発9人全員、県内中学出身快進撃の小松大谷 【台風7号】長野県内はあす16日に大雨や強風となる見込み 土砂災害や浸水、強風による果実の落下などに注意呼びかけ 【台風7号】関東に上陸するおそれ “強い勢力”で16日から17日にかけて 「予報円」の見方は?進路予想は? 気象予報士の解説「備え」「安全確保を」 「プロポーズみたいですね」市長からの名誉市民の申し出に笑顔で快諾【パリ五輪】出口クリスタ選手が金メダルを胸に「約束の」凱旋パレード 今後の目標は「一度リラックスしてから」 つなぐ #戦争の記憶...

content: Disney argues wrongful death suit should be tossed because plaintiff signed up for a Disney+ trial NEW YORK (AP) — Disney is asking a Florida court to dismiss a lawsuit brought by the widow of a New York doctor who suffered a fatal allergic reaction after eating at a restaurant in Disney Springs. The company argues in legal filings that Jeffrey Piccolo agreed to settle any lawsuits against the company out of court when he signed up for a one-month trial of Disney+ in 2019. But Piccolo’s lawyer, in a legal response this month, argues it's “absurd” to believe that Disney+ subscribers have waived all rights to sue the company and its affiliates in perpetuity by signing up for the streaming service. The Algerian boxer faced a torrent of criticism and false claims about her sex during the Paris Olympics. A statement from the Paris prosecutor’s office said Wednesday its unit for combating online hate speech has opened a probe. Under French law, it's up to investigators to determine which person or organization may have been at fault. The prosecutor's office didn’t name specific suspects. title: New York City man sentenced for sex-trafficking teenager almost daily, feds say
content: A New York City man who brutally sex-trafficked a 15-year-old girl for money was sentenced in a federal court in Boston on Wednesday afternoon, federal authorities stated. Sherriff Cooper, 37, was sentenced to 18 years in prison followed by five years of supervised release, acting U.S. Attorney Joshua S. Levy’s office said in a statement. He was convicted in February by a federal grand jury of sex trafficking of a minor by force, fraud and coercion; transportation of a minor with intent to engage in criminal sexual activity; and forced labor. Cooper was also ordered to pay about $97,000 to the victim, Levy’s office added. Cooper met the victim in 2017, while he worked as a security guard at a residential program for pregnant teenagers, Levy’s office stated. The survivor was a then-pregnant 15-year-old girl who ran away from the Massachusetts Department of Children and Families’ custody, Levy’s office added. Cooper began a “sexual relationship” with the victim and, after losing his job in 2018, began sex trafficking her around Boston, Levy said. He posted online ads for her on commercial sex websites and took all the payments she got. “Sherriff Cooper viciously and cruelly exploited a vulnerable minor who was half his age — taking advantage of his position of trust to abuse her into submission. When he lost his job, Mr. Cooper decided he would rather sex traffic a vulnerable...

title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 6:33 p.m. EDT
AI-powered bowel tests ‘will save lives’
AI-powered bowel tests ‘will save lives’
content: The device, known as GI Genius, analyses the video feed of a colonoscopy – where a camera is inserted into the bowel – in real-time. The system places a green box around any potential cancerous and precancerous polyps, known as adenomas, on the video monitor and sounds an alert to let medics know to focus on the highlighted area. Using the device “will save lives”, according to the researcher who led the study. He also said the technology allowed doctors to find lesions that were “more likely to be missed with the human eye”. Some 2,032 patients across 10 centres in England were recruited for the Colo-detect study. Of the group, 1,015 were given a colonoscopy using GI Genius, while 1,017 were given a standard colonoscopy. The study found that GI Genius found 0.36 more adenomas during each colonoscopy and identified at least one adenoma in an extra eight out of every 100 people having the test. It also helped detect more sessile serrated adenomas, which are flat precancerous growths on the colon. Professor Colin Rees, a consultant gastroenterologist at South Tyneside and Sunderland NHS Foundation Trust, and professor of gastroenterology at Newcastle University, led the trial. He said: “This trial has demonstrated that using artificial intelligence can significantly increase detection of the kind of abnormalities in the bowel that may progress to cancer. “We are able to find...

title: Juggler putting on daily shows at Southwest Washington Fair
content: Rhys Thomas’ Jugglemania is a family-friendly comedy juggling performance that will take place on the Community Stage every day of fair week. Thomas has been honored with performances for the International Jugglers Association in the U.S., the European Juggling Convention in Denmark and the Daidogei Street Performers’ World Cup in Japan. According to his website, however, his greatest achievement is raising a family as an artist in America. Thomas’ act combines hilarity and dexterity for an exciting and “clean” performance. With decades of success on theater and festival stages, at corporate events and on cruise ships — in 30 countries — Thomas has learned how to connect with any audience and tickle their funny bones. Among Thomas’ many accomplishments, including opening for Weird Al Yankovich and Weird Al Gore, he says the real highlights are “serving as artist in residence at the Smithsonian Institution, journeying to remote Egyptian tombs to discover 4,000-year-old paintings of jugglers, riding his tall unicycle on the frozen Chukchi sea, juggling a gator in Arkansas, saving a crowd from a stampede, falling in love with a clever woman and raising two wonderfully creative daughters (who, yes, can juggle).”

title: Ramalan Zodiak Aries, Taurus, Gemini hari ini, Kamis 15 Agustus 2024: Horoskop Asmara - Karier
Pre-pregnancy malaria jab could help protect women and their babies, trial finds
content: The findings are a “tremendous advance” in protecting women against the potentially deadly disease, researchers said. They estimate severe malaria infection – or plasmodium falciparum – during pregnancy leads to 50,000 deaths and 200,000 stillbirths in Africa every year. For the study, the team recruited 300 women in Mali who were planning to get pregnant in the coming year. Of the group, 100 were given a low dose of the vaccine, while 100 were given a high dose and 100 were given a placebo. After being jabbed, the women stopped using birth control and were followed up over two malaria seasons spanning almost two years. Of the women who fell pregnant, their babies were also followed up to their first birthday. In the high dose group, efficiency of the vaccine against malaria infection was 86% during the first year in women who went on to get pregnant. The jab’s efficiency in the low dose group during pregnancy was 57% over the two seasons. Researchers also found efficiency in the low dose group to be as high, or higher, in the second year as the first year at 61% without boosting. Alassane Dicko, who leads the team at the Malaria Research and Training Centre (MRTC) in Bamako, Mali, said: “This is a tremendous advance for protecting women against malaria before and during pregnancy.” Vaccinated patients also fell pregnant sooner, researchers found. title: Kurukshetra News: धर्मनगरी में निकाली भव्य तिरंगा यात्रा, मुख्यमंत्री नायब सिंह ने की अगुवाई
content: कुरुक्षेत्र। धर्मनगरी बुधवार देर शाम उस समय देशभक्ति में डूबी दिखाई दी जब भव्य तिरंगा यात्रा निकाली गई। पुलिस लाइन से शुरू हुई तिरंगा यात्रा की अगुवाई मुख्यातिथि के तौर पर मुख्यमंत्री नायब सिंह ने की, जो नया बस अड्डा होती हुई द्रोणाचार्य स्टेडियम तक पहुंची। तिरंगा यात्रा की अध्यक्षता राज्यमंत्री सुभाष सुधा ने की जबकि पार्टी के जिलाध्यक्ष सुशील राणा सहित अन्य पदाधिकारी व बड़ी संख्या में कार्यकर्ता तथा शहरवासी शामिल हुए। तिरंगा यात्रा में पुलिस विभाग के 24 राइडर भी साथ-साथ चले तो करतब भी दिखाए। इसके अलावा हरियाणा पुलिस अकेडमी मधुबन के जवान भी इस यात्रा में शामिल हुए तथा पुलिस विभाग का बैंड भी मधुर धुन बिखेरता रहा। इस दौरान कलाकारों द्वारा सांस्कृतिक प्रस्तुतियां भी दी गई। मुख्यमंत्री ने कहा कि आज पूरा देश आजादी के जश्न में डूबा है। हर देशवासी को अपने देश पर गर्व है और तिरंगा हमारी शान है। यह तिरंगा हर घर पर लहराना चाहिए। हमें अपने देश के लिए हमेशा तत्पर रहना चाहिए। उन्होंने कहा कि प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने हर घर तिरंगा अभियान की शुरूआत की थी, जिसके चलते आज पूरा देश तिरंगा को शान से अपने-अपने घरों पर लहरा रहा है। हर किसी में इस अभियान को लेकर उत्साह बना हुआ है।

title: What Huerzeler told Gruda as midfielder signs deal with Albion
content: Brajan Gruda has revealed what Fabian Huerzeler told him as he signed for Albion . The attacking midfielder has signed a contract until 2028. He shone last season in the Bundesliga with Mainz. Those performances caught the of current Albion boss Huerzeler, who was in charge of St Pauli at the time. In a brief interview with Albion’s website, Gruda said: “I don’t like to lose. “I would say I am a dribbler. I like to dribble. “He said to me he knows me a long time ago and likes how I play. “He just told me good things. “I don’t care if I play right-winger or No.10 or No.8, I just want to play.”

title: Michael Clarke's new girlfriend shows off her incredible figure as she jets off on very luxurious girls' trip to Spain while the cricketer remains in Australia
content: Michael Clarke's new girlfriend shows off her incredible figure as she jets off on very luxurious girls' trip to Spain while the cricketer remains in Australia READ MORE: Michael Clarke reveals he is suffering from debilitating disorder By Kinta Walsh-cotton For Daily Mail Australia Published: 18:33 EDT, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 18:41 EDT, 14 August 2024 e-mail 24 shares 4 View comments Michael Clarke's new girlfriend Arabella Sherborne has jetted off to Spain for a luxury getaway, but the former cricket captain is nowhere in sight. Arabella, 32, who works for Scentre Group in Sydney and is 11 years Michael's junior, flaunted her incredible bikini body as she enjoyed her girls' trip to Mallorca. In several images shared to Instagram on Wednesday, the brunette beauty was all smiles as she stripped down to a two-piece and soaked up some sun with friends. 'Time for a siesta,' the real estate guru wrote in the caption as she modelled several different bikinis during her stay at a luxury resort. She snapped several selfies with her girlfriends including a mirror one in which she sizzled in a pink and red bikini. Another photo saw a close-up of her and her besties' tanned and toned abs as they sunbaked on a huge rock outcrop. When night fell, Arabella opted to cover up a bit more as she slipped into a simple but beautiful black dress for dinner. It comes about three weeks after she...

title: قوات الاحتلال تجبر طواقم الإسعاف على مغادرة شارع عمان في مدينة نابلس حيث تدور مواجهات بين الشبان والاحتلال
Former Dinuba principal charged with murder for DUI crash near Reedley
creator: Marc Anthony Lopez
content: TULARE COUNTY, Calif. (KFSN) -- A former principal from Dinuba is facing murder charges, accused of driving drunk and crashing into another car near Reedley, killing a mother and daughter. The video above is from an earlier story and will be updated. 43-year-old Blake Benham is accused of killing 55-year-old Gloria Barajas and her 35-year-old daughter, Brenda Quinonez in the crash that happened last December on Road 56 near Avenue 430. The California Highway Patrol says Barajas and Quinonez, were heading home from Christmas shopping at the Tulare Outlets with Gloria's husband and younger daughter just after 6 p.m. As they drove north in their Nissan Rogue, officers say a Ford pickup driven by Benham veered into their lane, colliding head-on with the family's SUV. The crash killed Barajas and Quinonez and sent their other two family members to Community Regional Medical Center. The CHP says Benham was under the influence of alcohol when he crashed. RELATED: Dinuba principal bonds out of jail after arrest for deadly DUI crash near Reedley, officials say Benham was the Principal of Kennedy Elementary School at the time of the crash but has been on administrative leave since the crash. The Tulare County District Attorney's Office says he surrendered himself to CHP officers Wednesday without incident. If convicted, Bennan faces life in prison. Stay with ABC30 for the latest details...

title: జగన్‌కు ప్రజాభిప్రాయం బోధపడలేదు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: ‘జగన్‌రెడ్డి పెద్ద గోబెల్స్‌ రెడ్డి. 11 సీట్లుకు పరిమితమైనా ఆయనకు ఇంకా ప్రజాభిప్రాయం బోధపడలేదు’ అని టీడీపీ జాతీయ ప్రధాన కార్యదర్శి వర్ల రామయ్య అన్నారు. బుధవారం టీడీపీ ప్రధాన కార్యాలయంలో మీడియాతో మాట్లాడారు. ‘మళ్లీ అధికారం కోసం కుట్రలు, కుతంత్రాలు, దుర్మార్గపు దుష్ట ఆలోచనలు చేస్తున్నారు. ఆ కుట్రలో భాగమే పత్తికొండలో శ్రీనివాసులు అనే టీడీపీ నాయకుడి దారుణ హత్య. రాష్ట్రంలో కొన్ని హత్యలు చేయించి శాంతి భద్రతలకు విఘాతం కలిగిందని చెప్పాలని జగన్‌ కుట్ర చేస్తున్నారని జనం కోడై కూస్తున్నారు. పోయిన అధికారాన్ని ఎలాగైనా తిరిగి పొందాలని తపన పడుతున్నారు. కుట్రలతో జనాలను చంపి శాంతి భద్రతలు లేవని చెప్పడానికి యత్నిస్తున్నారు. ఇంటెలిజెన్స్‌ అలెర్ట్‌ అయ్యి కుట్రను బహిర్గతం చేసి రాష్ట్రంలో ఒక్క మర్డర్‌ కూడా జరగకుండా చూడాలి. జగన్‌ ఇంటిపై నిఘా పెట్టాలి. ఆయనేం చేయబోతున్నాడో, ఎవరెవర్ని కలవబోతున్నాడో, దుర్మార్గపు ఆలోచనలను ఎప్పటికప్పుడు కనిపెట్టాలి’ అని డిమాండ్‌ చేశారు.

title: Ana Guevara responde a críticas sobre gastos en París: “Lo que gano me lo trago y visto como me da la gana”
creator: Sergio Ramírez
content: Lo que necesitas saber: Ana Gabriela Guevara ofreció una conferencia de presa para rendir cuentas sobre lo que dejaron los Juegos Olímpicos de París Ana Gabriela Guevara, titular de la CONADE, respondió a los cuestionamientos sobre los gastos realizados en París , durante los Juegos Olímpicos, en los cuales mantuvo un perfil más bajo respecto a la edición de Tokio 2020, y aseguró que todos los gastos que realizó salieron de su bolsillo , y no del erario público. Durante los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024, Guevara fue vista en un restaurante en una mesa para seis personas, además viajó de ida y de regreso en vuelos de primera clase, de modo que fueron inevitables los cuestionamientos sobre la calidad de vida que se dio, en contraste con la falta de apoyos a los atletas mexicanos, en especial a los de deportes acuáticos. Así respondió Guevara a los cuestionamientos de sus gastos en París Guevara encabezó una conferencia de prensa en la cual lanzó una serie de frases para tratar de bajar el incendio. “Entre más me chingan, más me crezco”, mencionó sobre las críticas y aseguró que ya solicitó facturas para demostrar sus gastos. “Ya solicité la factura. En el sexenio nunca he solicitado gastos”. Durante la conferencia de prensa insistió que todo lo que gastó en París forma parte de sus ingresos personales y aclaró que el restaurante no fue de primera...

title: B.C. adds $2.65B for Fraser Valley Highway 1 improvement initiative
creator: The Canadian Press
content: The British Columbia government is providing another $2.65 billion for upgrades to Highway 1 through the Fraser Valley in an effort to relieve traffic congestion and ease daily commutes between the communities of Langley and Abbotsford. The funding will go toward upgrades between Mount Lehman Road west of downtown Abbotsford to Highway 11 on the opposite side of the city. The money builds on $2.34 billion in funding approved last fall for upgrades between Mount Lehman Road and 264th Street in the Township of Langley. A statement from the Ministry of Transportation says that work will begin this year and include four new interchanges, as well as the rebuilding of several highway overpasses to increase the clearance height for commercial vehicles. It says procurement for work for the latest funding will begin next year, with major construction starting in 2026 and wrapping up in 2031. Premier David Eby says the widespread flooding that hit the Sumas Prairie in fall 2021 is one of the factors that has delayed the highway improvement. "On the upside, it creates the potential for the road work that we're going to do on the other side of Highway 11 to be not just a road, but also to be infrastructure to protect the community from future floods," Eby told a news conference. "That's why I was so devastated and frankly a little bit pissed off that the federal government gave us $0 on...

title: Edward Rogers becomes executive chair of Rogers Communications
creator: News Staff
content: TORONTO — Rogers Communications says Edward Rogers is becoming the company’s executive chair effective immediately. The company says Rogers, previously chairman, will lead the development and review of the company’s long-term strategy for growth. Lead director Robert Gemmell says the appointment merely formalizes the role Rogers has already been performing at the company. The firm says Rogers’ appointment was unanimously confirmed at a board meeting in Calgary. CEO Tony Staffieri says he has appreciated Rogers’ advice and support over the last several years. Rogers was removed as chairman of the company in October 2021 amid a public battle for control of the company, and was reinstated the following month. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Aug. 14, 2024. Companies in this story: (TSX:RCI.B) The Canadian Press

title: Daniel Sarcos regresa a Telemundo y se integra a “Hoy Día”
creator: Clary Castro
content: Daniel Sarcos regresa a Telemundo como co-host de “Hoy Día” . La revista People en Español ha dado el anuncio oficial, esto es algo que para el cierre de esta nota ninguna cuenta oficial de Telemundo ha confirmado. Sin embargo, dicha publicación cita a Omar Fernández, Director de entretenimiento de la cadena quien dice lo siguiente: “Estará como co host del programa toda una semana”. Adamari López habla de la segunda temporada de ¿Quién Caerá? y de cómo queda ‘Desiguales’ en su ausencia La conversación de Sarcos con People la puedes encontrar aquí . El venezolano asegura estar feliz por esta situación, porque aún y cuando Rashel Díaz y Adamari López ya no se encuentran en el espacio matutino en el que juntos trabajaron durante varios años, sí se encontrará con rostros conocidos en otras dependencias. Fueron ocho años de mucho entretenimiento, en un horario en donde el público amanece con los rostros más queridos de la televisión hispana. Es importante destacar que la llegada de Sarcos como conductor invitado desatará, posiblemente, una serie de rumores y de peticiones por parte del público televidente, ya que muchos, probablemente, querrán tener esta dupla de Carlos Calderón y Sarcos por las mañanas. Hay que recordar que cuando Daniel Sarcos se fue de Telemundo en el año 2018, el conductor se despedía de “Un Nuevo Día”, un programa matutino en el...

title: AltStore PAL drops its annual subscription thanks to a grant from Epic
creator: Jay Peters
content: AltStore PAL, a third-party iOS app store that’s available in the EU, is dropping its annual €1.50 (plus tax) subscription after receiving a “MegaGrant” from developer Epic Games. AltStore originally charged the subscription to help cover Apple’s Core Technology Fee (CTF), which is a fee third-party app marketplaces have to pay for each annual app install. Epic uses MegaGrants as a way to “sponsor the development of exciting projects that may not otherwise have enough funding to fully realize,” . The grants are typically meant for smaller teams using Epic’s technologies to “bring bold, challenging, and insanely creative dreams to life,” but in this case, Epic awarded the grant for “innovation in app distribution,” . AltStore didn’t share the dollar value of the grant, and the company didn’t immediately reply to a request for comment. Current subscribers won’t be charged when their renewal date rolls around, . The AltStore team also plans to “show our appreciation for our existing subscribers in a future update” but didn’t specify what that might look like. Epic is also working on a version of the Epic Games Store for iOS and said earlier this week that the store, , and have been /

title: 'That could've been it' | Woman hit by her own car on I-635 multi-vehicle crash shares her experience during chaotic scene
content: DALLAS, Texas — There’s not much Meghan Smith can do right now without feeling pain. “I have second-degree burns on my leg, on my knees and ankle, burns on my shoulder, and a broken wrist,” said Smith. Smith is one of the several victims injured during the chaotic multi-vehicle crash on I-635 last Tuesday . “I’m just trying to piece it all back together and it’s difficult,” said Smith. Dallas police say 26-year-old Angel Zamora-Moreno is the man responsible for stabbing a man and running over people with their vehicles. Police said three people were taken to hospitals. One man was taken in critical condition but is recovering. All westbound highway lanes at Forest Lane were shut down for more than four hours. Smith, a nurse, was headed to work that morning when she saw a TxDOT employee get hit by a car. “My first initial impression was that was an accident,” Smith said. Smith got out to help, not realizing what would happen. Zamora-Moreno would then jump in her car, and drive towards her. She said she tried to run but Moreno hit her. “That could’ve been it...and I’m so glad it wasn’t,” said Smith. Several other people jumped in to help and were able to hold Zamora-Moreno down until police got to the scene. Smith said she doesn’t regret jumping in to help. “I’ve been told, I very possibly have pulled the aggression off of the TxDOT worker and that’s why he’s still alive,” she...

title: Sergipe fica abaixo da média nacional no Ideb, aponta MEC
content: ✅ Em 2023, nos anos iniciais (1o ao 5o), Sergipe teve a média de 5,4, enquanto a nacional foi de 6,0. Para os anos finais (6o ao 9o) o estado alcançou 4,4, abaixo da média nacional que foi de 5,0. Já no ensino médio, o estado teve 4,0, enquanto a média nacional foi de 4,3. O estado alcançou 5,4 pontos nos anos iniciais do ensino fundamental. O resultado representa um avanço de 0,1 ponto a mais do que a meta estabelecida para o estado no primeiro ciclo do Ideb (2007-2021). Porém, não atingiu as metas nas demais etapas de ensino. O Ideb é calculado a partir dos dados do Censo Escolar e do Sistema de Avaliação da Educação Básica (Saeb). A pontuação varia de 1 a 10, e quanto melhor o desempenho dos alunos e mais alto o número de aprovados, maior é o Ideb. Sobre o Ideb O Índice de Desenvolvimento da Educação Básica foi criado em 2007 e reúne, em um só indicador, os resultados de dois conceitos igualmente importantes para a qualidade da educação: o fluxo escolar e as médias de desempenho nas avaliações. O Ideb agrega ao enfoque pedagógico das avaliações em larga escala a possibilidade de resultados sintéticos, facilmente assimiláveis e que permitem traçar metas de qualidade educacional para os sistemas.

title: سبک زندگی قرآنی از ملازمت و همراهی با قرآن آغاز می شود
content: به گزارش ؛ حجت الاسلام سید مهدی خاموشی رئیس سازمان اوقاف و امور خیریه در آئین اختتامیه چهل و هفتمین دوره مسابقات قرآن استان تهران که عصر روز چهارشنبه در هتل ارم برگزار شد، گفت: در ایام اربعین حسینی و حرکت کاروان‌های اربعینی هستیم آرزو می‌کنیم زائران اربعین حسینی به سلامت بازگردند و همه ما بتوانیم خادمین راه اربعین و خدمتگزار زوار اباعبدالله الحسین ( باشیم. وی با بیان اینکه مردم ایران و عراق در این ایام داشته و نداشته خود را هزینه می‌کنند و این اقدامات گسترده و چشم‌گیر درس تمدن اسلامی است که امیدواریم در جوامع ما این تمدن حاکم شود. تمدنی که محورش ایثار و خود را ندیدن است‌. ویژگی این تمدن این است که انسان‌ها برای خدا به یکدیگر نهایت خدمت را می‌کنند. رئیس سازمان اوقاف اظهار کرد: خادمان حسینی حیا و عفت دارند، اهل مناسک و و اهل عبادت و لبیک به ولایت و اهل نثار مال و جان برای امام حسین ( هستند. آن راهی که پنجره تعالی و تکامل و رسیدن به امام حسین ( است. حجت الاسلام خاموشی با اشاره به تأثیرگذاری ابعاد اربعین حسینی در جهان بیان کرد: جهان معاصر خوب فهم می‌کند و این مسیر هم خوب طی می‌کند. میلیون‌ها نفر به پیاده‌روی اربعین می‌روند و هر کس بخواهد مخفی کند نمی‌تواند. این پیامش جهان گیر است. کجای عالم را سراغ دارید که امروز نام امام حسین ( را نشنیده باشد. سخت جایی را می‌توان پیدا کرد. در همه کشورهای آفریقایی آمریکایی، اروپایی پرچم حضرت ( بالا و بلند است. رئیس سازمان اوقاف گفت: ما هر سال برای حسین ( اشک می‌ریزیم تا این ظلم را به جهان اعلام کنیم و به جهانیان بفهمانیم که دفاع از...

title: NY City Council To Hochul: Stop Cannabis Buffer Zone Loosening Because 'It Encourages Illegal Sales'
creator: Franca Quarneti
content: Nine members of New York City's "Common Sense" Caucus are taking a stand against the state's Cannabis Control Board (CCB), urging Governor Kathy Hochul to block a proposal that could flood the city with more cannabis dispensaries. This proposal, if approved, would allow waivers to the existing 1,000-foot buffer zone between legal cannabis shops, potentially permitting multiple dispensaries to operate on the same block, The New York Post reported. See Also: NY Cannabis Stores Get Green Light For Flashy Ads And Discounts As State Approves Over 100 New Permits In a letter sent to Governor Hochul and CCB chairwoman Tremaine Wright , the council members voiced their concerns about the potential negative impact on New York City communities. "Flooding our city with more dispensaries not only degrades the quality of life in these communities but also decreases the value of these licenses and only encourages more illegal sales," the letter stated. Overcrowded Market Concerns: Why NYC Lawmakers Are Alarmed The council members, including representatives from Queens, Brooklyn, Staten Island, and the Bronx, argue that the current buffer zones are essential to maintaining a balanced and sustainable cannabis market. They believe that reducing these zones would not only lead to an over saturation of the market but also complicate ongoing efforts to combat illegal cannabis sales. "We are at a...

title: «3» ملايين دولار لبطل دوري الخليج
creator: محمد الجزار
content: كشف اتحاد كأس الخليج العربي لكرة القدم عن انطلاق بطولة «دوري أبطال الخليج للأندية» في حُلّتها الجديدة، بعد غياب دام لمدة تسع سنوات بشكل متتالي.. حيث ستنطلق البطولة خلال الفترة من 23 أكتوبر 2024 وحتى 15 أبريل من العام المقبل 2025، بمشاركة ثمانية أندية. وقد اعتمد اتحاد كأس الخليج العربي مشاركة ثمانية أندية وهي أندية: «النصر الإماراتي، والعربي القطري، والرفاع البحريني، والقادسية الكويتي، والاتفاق السعودي، أهلي صنعاء اليمني، ظفار العماني، ودهوك العراقي». من جانبه أكد الأمين العام لاتحاد كأس الخليج العربي لكرة القدم، جاسم الرميحي، بأن قرعة البطولة تم تعديل موعدها لتُقام في الثالث والعشرين من سبتمبر المقبل في العاصمة القطرية الدوحة. وأشار الأمين العام إلى أن مجموع الجوائز المالية سجلت ارتفاعا عاليا، لتصبح جوائز البطولة تنافس جوائز الاتحاد الاسيوي لكرة القدم، وهو ما يُبرهن على الاهتمام الكبير من قبل الاتحاد. وأضاف الرميحي بأنه تم تخصيص حوافز وجوائز للفرق المشاركة، حيث سيحصل صاحب المركز الأول (البطل) على جائزة مالية قدرها (3.000.000) ثلاثة ملايين دولار، فيما بلغت جائزة الفريق صاحب المركز الثاني (1.000.000) مليون دولار. كما تم رصد جوائز فردية للاعبين المشاركين، حيث سيتحصل أفضل لاعب في البطولة على جائزة قدرها (50.000) خمسون ألف دولار أميركي، وجائزة أفضل حارس مرمى على (50.000) خمسون ألف دولار أميركي، بالإضافة إلى هداف البطولة الذي سيتحصل على جائزة قدرها (50.000) خمسون ألف دولار أميركي أيضًا. وخصص اتحاد كأس الخليج العربي لكرة القدم مساهمة مالية...

title: مهرجان قطر للألعاب يستقطب «100» ألف زائر
creator: عوض التوم
content: وسط نجاح كبير اختتم مهرجان قطر للألعاب فعاليات نسخته الثانية أمس الأربعاء وذلك بعد 31 يوماً من الأنشطة الترفيهية والعروض الحيّة التي كانت ملائمة لتطلعات وأذواق جميع أفراد العائلة. وسجَّلت نسخة هذا العام من المهرجان رقماً قياسياً جديداً في عدد الحضور الجماهيري الذي تجاوز 100 ألف زائر، مما يعني زيادة بنسبة %33.3 مقارنة بنسخته الافتتاحية في العام الماضي. وتضمَّن مهرجان قطر للألعاب الذي أقيم بالتعاون مع قناة سبيس تون الشهيرة، 10 مناطق ذات طابع خاص ومجموعة يومية من العروض الحية والمسابقات والحفلات الغنائية والموسيقية. كما استقطب المهرجان مجموعة من أبرز المطربين والفنانين العرب مثل المطرب الكويتي الشهير حمود الخضر والفنان السوري طارق العربي طرقان والفنانة السورية رشا رزق والفنانة القطرية دانة المير والفنان عاصم سكر، مما أضفى على فعاليات المهرجان أجواء احتفالية ونابضة بالحيوية. وتخلل حفل ختام المهرجان عرض مميز قدمه كورال «روح الشرق»، والذي أعقبته كلمة ألقاها السيد حمد الخاجة، رئيس قسم الدعم الفني للفعاليات والمهرجانات في قطر للسياحة بالإنابة. وفي تعليقه على نجاح المهرجان، قال السيد حمد الخاجة: «لقد حققت النسخة الثانية من مهرجان قطر للألعاب نجاحاً كبيراً، وذلك باستقطابها 100.000 زائر وهو رقم قياسي جديد في عدد الحضور. كما تميز مهرجان هذا العام بأنه الأضخم والأفضل في العديد من الجوانب، وتضمن مجموعة متنوعة من أشهر العلامات في عالم الألعاب والعروض والمسابقات. واستمتع الأطفال من جميع الأعمار بفرص التعلم والتفاعل مع ألعابهم المفضلة. إن نجاح المهرجان هو بمثابة...

title: Ralampadu Reservoir: రేలంపాడు రిజర్వాయర్‌కు మరమ్మతులు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: జవహర్‌ నెట్టెంపాడు ఎత్తిపోతల పథకంలో భాగంగా నిర్మించిన రేలంపాడు బ్యాలెన్సింగ్‌ రిజర్వాయర్‌కు మరమ్మతులు చేపట్టాలని ప్రభుత్వం నిర్ణయించింది. రిజర్వాయర్‌ కట్టలో దీర్ఘకాలంగా కొనసాగుతున్న సీపేజీని కట్టడి చేసేందుకు కర్టయిన్‌ గ్రౌటింగ్‌ చేయాలని నిర్ణయం తీసుకుంది. ఇందుకోసం రూ.153 కోట్ల దాకా ఖర్చవుతుందని అంచనా వేసింది. గ్రౌటింగ్‌ కోసం కట్ట ఎగువ భాగంలో డ్రిల్లింగ్‌ చేసి.. పైపులు లేదా గ్యాలరీ ద్వారా సిమెంట్‌తోపాటు ఇతర మిశ్రమాన్ని లోపలికి ఒత్తిడితో పంపిస్తారు. తద్వారా కట్ట కింద నుంచి సీపేజీ (లీకేజీలు) కాకుండా అడ్డుకుంటారు. రేలంపాడు రిజర్వాయర్‌ను.. నెట్టెంపాడు ఎత్తిపోతల పథకంలో భాగంగా గద్వాల, అలంపూర్‌ నియోజకవర్గాల్లో 2లక్షల ఎకరాలకు సాగునీరు, 8 మండలాల్లోని 148 గ్రామాలకు తాగునీరు ఇచ్చేందుకు గుడ్డెందొడ్డి గ్రామంలో నిర్మించారు. తొలుత 2.3 టీఎంసీలతో రిజర్వాయర్‌ నిర్మాణానికి పూనుకున్నారు. మూడు కిలోమీటర్ల మేర మట్టికట్టతో దీనిని నిర్మించారు. కాగా, రిజర్వాయర్‌ సామర్థ్యాన్ని 4 టీఎంసీలకు పెంచుతూ 2014 ఫిబ్రవరిలో ప్రభుత్వం జీవో జారీ చేసింది. ఈ మేరకు 2014-15 నుంచి 2016 దాకా ఇందులో 4 టీఎంసీల దాకా నీటిని నిల్వచే సి విడుదల చేశారు. 2019లో రిజర్వాయర్‌లో భారీగా సీపేజీని గుర్తించారు. డ్యామ్‌సేఫ్టీ కమిటీ కూడా దీనిని పరిశీలించింది. అనంతరం దీనికి మరమ్మతులు చేసినా ప్రయోజనం కలగలేదు. ఆ తర్వాత 2021-22లో రిజర్వాయర్‌లో 3.450 టీఎంసీల నీటిని నిల్వ చేయగా.. భారీగా సీపేజీ చోటుచేసుకుంది. దాంతో రిజర్వాయర్‌లో నీటిని పంపింగ్‌ చేయకుండా ఆపేశారు. ఈ క్రమంలోనే 2021 ఆగస్టులో అధికారులు రిజర్వాయర్‌ను పరిశీలించి.. 2టీఎంసీల వరకే నీటిని...
