title: नीलकंठ महादेव को धराया तिरंगा शृंगार
content: शिवदल की ओर से बुधवार को स्वतंत्रता दिवस की पूर्व संध्या पर फतहसागर यूडीए मार्ग स्थित नीलकंठ महादेव मंदिर में महादेव को तिरंगा शृंगार धराया। शिव दल प्रमुख मनीष मेहता ने बताया कि शृंगार से पहले महादेव का पंचामृत से अभिषेक किया गया । मेहता ने बताया कि केसरिया , सफेद और हरे रंग की अबीर से महादेव के मस्तक पर त्रिपुण बनाया गया उसके बाद उन्हें तिरंगे कलर की पगड़ी ओर वस्त्र धारण कराए गए। इस अवसर पर 78 दियो से महाआरती की गई।

title: Top Hamas official says the group is losing faith in U.S. as a mediator in Gaza cease-fire talks
content: Hamas political official Osama Hamdan speaks during an interview with The Associated Press in Doha, Qatar, Tuesday Aug. 13, 2024. (AP Photo/Malak Harb) DOHA, Qatar — A top Hamas official said the Palestinian militant group is losing faith in the United States’ ability to mediate a cease-fire in Gaza ahead of a new round of talks scheduled for this week amid mounting pressure to bring an end to the 10-month-old war with Israel. Osama Hamdan told The Associated Press in an interview Tuesday that Hamas will only participate if the talks focus on implementing a proposal detailed by U.S. President Joe Biden in May and endorsed internationally. The U.S. referred to it as an Israeli proposal and Hamas agreed to it in principle, but Israel said Biden’s speech was not entirely consistent with the proposal itself. Both sides later proposed changes, leading each to accuse the other of obstructing a deal. Hamas is especially resistant to Israel’s demand that it maintain a lasting military presence in two strategic areas of Gaza after any cease-fire, conditions only made public in recent weeks. “We have informed the mediators that ... any meeting should be based on talking about implementation mechanisms and setting deadlines rather than negotiating something new,” said Hamdan, who is a member of Hamas’ Political Bureau, which includes the group’s top political leaders and sets its...

title: Planes para disfrutar del primer finde de feria en Málaga
Carlo Ancelotti: "Con la calidad que tenemos esperamos una buena temporada"
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: El entrenador del Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti, confió en "una buena temporada", como así empezó este miércoles con el título en la Supercopa de Europa ante el Atalanta, ya que tienen "calidad" como para lograrlo, destacando a un Kylian Mbappé que se estrenó con la camiseta blanca con gol y título en su primera partido. "Tiene una calidad enorme, ha trabajado bien, a nivel defensivo ha trabajado como los otros. El equipo no ha jugado bien la primera parte, pero ha trabajo bien a nivel defensivo. En la segunda parte ha jugado muy bien el equipo", dijo en rueda de prensa tras el 2-0 en el PGE Narodowy (Varsovia). Además, el técnico italiano se refirió a ser parte de la historia del Madrid con el récord de 14 títulos. "Estoy muy contento, es un honor, un privilegio entrenar a este quipo. Lo estamos haciendo bien, también hoy. El partido ha sido difícil. El Atalanta ha jugado muy bien, ha sido fuerte. La calidad que tenemos enfrente se ha mostrado", afirmó. Ancelotti apuntó que hasta que no bajó el ritmo el equipo italiano, la final no entró en terreno del cuadro blanco, como le reconoció al técnico rival Gian Piero Gasperini. "Le he dicho que jugar con el Atalante es como ir al dentista. Cuando han bajado el ritmo hemos tenido más espacio y nos hemos adelantado en el marcador", apuntó. Además, el técnico del Madrid fue preguntado por su centro del campo...

title: Sirsa News: डेरा सच्चा सौदा टीम ने किया पौधरोपण
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, सिरसा
content: ऐलनाबाद। डेरा सच्चा सौदा ब्लॉक ऐलनाबाद की साध संगत ने शाह सतनाम जी ग्रीन एस वेलफेयर फोर्स विंग ने बुधवार को पौधरोपण अभियान चलाया। इस पौधरोपण अभियान में नगर पालिका अध्यक्ष राम सिंह सोलंकी और नंबरदार रूप राम जैपाल मुख्य अतिथि रहे। नगर पार्षद सुभाष चंद्र विशिष्ट अतिथि रहे। साध-संगत हर साल अपने क्षेत्रों में पौधे लगा कई सालों तक उनकी संभाल भी करती है। मुख्यातिथि राम सिंह सोलंकी ने पौधे रोपित करते हुए कहा कि पौधे हमारे जीवन का आधार है। बिगड़ते पर्यावरण के चलते पौधे रोपित करना बहुत जरूरी हो जाता है। पौधे रोपना सराहनीय कार्य है। ब्लॉक ऐलनाबाद 15 मेंबर डॉ. रूप सिंह इन्सां और अमरजीत सिंह इन्सां ने बताया कि गुरमीत राम रहीम सिंह ने हमें हमेशा मानवता भलाई और पर्यावरण कल्याण की शिक्षा दी है। उन्हीं की प्रेरणा पर चलते हुए बुधवार को राम रहीम के जन्मदिन और स्वतंत्रता दिवस की पूर्व संध्या पर पंजाब, हरियाणा, उत्तर प्रदेश, दिल्ली और अन्य राज्यों में साध-संगत ने पौधरोपण किया है। उन्होंने कहा कि विदेशों में भी साध-संंगत ने पौधे लगाए हैं। उन्होंने कहा कि साध-संगत पौधे लगाने के साथ कई सालों तक इनकी संभाल भी करती है। अंत में मुख्य अतिथि का स्वागत कर प्रसाद बांटा गया।

title: Alfredo Ramírez Bedolla inaugura instalaciones de la Defensoría Jurídica en Zamora
creator: razon.online@razon.com.mx (La Razón Online)
content: Al inaugurar las instalaciones de la Defensoría Jurídica del Tribunal de Justicia Administrativa, en las que se invirtieron 2.5 millones de pesos y a que beneficiará a 29 municipios de la región, el gobernador de Michoacán, Alfredo Ramírez Bedolla, resaltó la importancia de estas acciones que ayudan a defender a los usuarios de servicios públicos, de abusos que puedan cometer las autoridades estatales o municipales. El mandatario señaló que este Tribunal de Justicia Administrativa, como cualquier otro en materia civil o penal, es una instancia que busca hacer justicia ante los abusos de la autoridad, por lo que cualquier ciudadano que sienta que le han realizado cobros excesivos , pueden acudir al mismo para recibir asesoría y presentar las demandas correspondientes. Todo de manera gratuita, apuntó. Indicó que espera que pronto se cuente en Zamora con un Juzgado de Justicia Administrativa, permitiendo atender a la población de las regiones Ciénegas y Bajío. En tanto, el presidente del Tribunal de Justicia Administrativa, Hugo Alberto Gama Coria , agradeció al gobernador el apoyo que ha brindado al tribunal y prueba de ello, es la inauguración de las instalaciones en Zamora, lo que permite atender las necesidades de la población de los municipios cercanos. "El Tribunal atenderá 29 municipios de la región , donde se llevan asuntos de materia administrativa...

title: הבית הלבן: ביידן והאריס קיבלו תדרוך על ההתפתחויות במזרח התיכון
content: בצל החשש ממתקפה איראנית על ישראל, הבית הלבן מסר כי נשיא ארה"ב ג'ו ביידן וסגניתו קמלה האריס תודרכו על ידי צוות יועצי הביטחון הלאומי שלהם על "ההתפתחויות במזרח התיכון". התדרוך התקיים בחדר המצב של הבית הלבן, והוא התמקד ב"מאמצים הצבאיים של ארה"ב לתמוך בביטחון ישראל, במאמצים הדיפלומטיים להפגת המתיחות באזור ובהשגת הסכם שחרור חטופים והפסקת אש בעזה", לשון ההודעה. (סוכנויות הידיעות)

title: Cosan (CSAN3) reduz prejuízo em 78% no 2o trimestre; veja o balanço
content: A Cosan (CSAN3) encerrou o segundo trimestre de 2024 com prejuízo líquido de R$ 227 milhões, o que representa uma queda de 78% na comparação com o mesmo período do ano anterior. As perdas são maiores se comparadas com os R$ 192 milhões negativos do trimestre anterior, conforme mostra o balanço da companhia na noite desta quarta-feira (14). Segundo a Cosan, o prejuízo foi decorrente do impacto não recorrente de impairment na subsidiária Rumo (RAIL3). O volume perdido na comparação anual foi menor, por sua vez, o que levou a companhia a apontar como justificativa a maior contribuição dos negócios via equivalência patrimonial. “Os negócios apresentaram indicadores trimestrais em linha com o planejamento para o ano”, afirmou a Cosan em seu balanço. O Ebitda (lucro antes dos juros, impostos, depreciação e amortização) somou R$ 2,370 bilhões no período, o que representa um recuo de 22% na comparação anual e queda de 19% na relação trimestral. Já o Ebitda sob gestão foi de R$ 7,1 bilhões no período, alta de 14,5% sobre igual período do ano anterior, mas 1% menor na relação trimestral. A receita líquida, por sua vez, totalizou R$ 10,694 bilhões, aumento de 6% ante o apurado um ano antes. Na comparação com os três meses anteriores, o resultado é 9% maior. Ainda em seu balanço, a Cosan comentou que o segundo trimestre de 2024 foi marcado pela...

title: NewRange to study possible changes to proposed copper-nickel mine
creator: Jimmy Lovrien
content: HOYT LAKES — The company hoping to build Minnesota's first copper-nickel mine said it would study whether to change several aspects of its plan, including where it would store tailings and the method of dam construction on the tailings basin. NewRange Copper Nickel, a joint venture formed between mining companies Glencore and Teck to advance the NorthMet project near Hoyt Lakes and Babbitt, said that while it was confident in its existing design, it would spend the next year looking at tailings management, dam construction, water quality management, the amount of ore it processes and greenhouse gases. "It's been 20 years since the original plan," Colin Marsh, NewRange's director of external affairs, told the News Tribune. "You have a bigger team with more resources taking a look (at) whether there can be improvements. Again, the company stands by the original plan, but there are possibly some opportunities." Meanwhile, environmental groups opposed to the project, like the Minnesota Center for Environmental Advocacy and Friends of the Boundary Waters Wilderness, said the announcement shows the company now recognizes its proposal was flawed. "Given the substantial redesign now under consideration, PolyMet should withdraw its current application and go back to the drawing board," the Minnesota Center for Environmental Advocacy said in a news release. ADVERTISEMENT NewRange's...

title: Vance agrees that raising grandchildren is ‘whole purpose of postmenopausal female,’ unearthed audio shows
creator: Gustaf Kilander
content: JD Vance agreed with the notion that raising grandchildren was “the whole purpose of the postmenopausal female,” an unearthed 2020 podcast shows. Vance also seemed to concur when the host suggested that having grandparents help raise children was a “weird, unadvertised feature of marrying an Indian woman.” It's the latest in comments from the Republican nominee for vice presdident about women and "traditional" roles that have drawn ire. Vance has faced intense criticism in recent weeks for previous sexist comments, including his remarks about " cat ladies ." Now, his appearance on ThePortal podcast with host Eric Weinstein in April 2020 has been thrust back into the limelight Vance spoke about his wife’s Indian family, noting that they emigrated to the US about a year before his wife, Usha Vance, was born. He said at the time, her parents were “devoted” to Usha and their grandchild as well as to “future grandchildren.” The couple has three children, born in 2017, 2020 and in 2021. “You can sort of see the effect it has on him to be around them like they spoil him,” he said of his first child. “There's sort of all the classic stuff that grandparents do to grandchildren, but it makes him a much better human being to have exposure to his grandparents.” He added: “And the evidence on this is like super clear.” “That’s the whole purpose of the postmenopausal female in theory,”...

title: Kurukshetra News: मारकंडा नदी में फिर आया उफान, किसान व डेरा वासियों में बना भय
content: इस्माईलाबाद। पहाड़ी क्षेत्र में लगातार हो रही बारिश से मारकंडा नदी एक बार फिर से उफान पर है, जिसके चलते मारकंडा नदी के तटबंधों के समीप बसे डेरा वासियों व किसानों में भय की स्थिति बनी हुई है। बुधवार सुबह सुबह मारकंडा नदी में करीब 11 हजार क्यूसेक पानी आने से नदी का पानी तटबंधों को छूकर गुजर रहा है। मारकंडा नदी के विकराल रूप धारण करने से आसपास के गांवों के लोग व किसान डरे हुए हैं। वहीं नहरी विभाग से मिली सूचना के अनुसार मारकंडा नदी का जलस्तर घटने के आसार है। किसान सौरव शर्मा, राजेश शर्मा आदि किसानों ने कहा कि नदी की समय रहते सफाई नहीं की गई है, जिसके चलते मारकंडा नदी के पानी को आगे जाने के लिए रास्ता नहीं मिलता। पानी की रफ्तार धीमी होने से पानी का स्तर बढ़ जाने से तटबंधों को छूने लगता है। जिसके चलते कमजोर तटबंधों के टूटने की संभावना बढ़ जाती है। उन्होंने कहा कि अगर समय रहते विभाग द्वारा सफाई का काम पूरा किया होता तो पानी तटबंधों तक नहीं पहुंच पाता। उन्होंने कहा कि विभाग ने पिछले वर्ष मारकंडा नदी द्वारा मचाए तांडव से कुछ सबक नहीं लिया और इस बार भी क्षेत्र के लोगों को राम भरोसे छोड़ दिया। पिछले वर्ष गांव नैसी के समीप से तटबंध टूटने से मारकंडा नदी की बाढ़ ने डेरा वासियों सहित सैकड़ों किसानों की हजारों एकड़ फसल जलमग्न हो गई थी। कई किसानों की फसल बर्बाद होने से उन्हें दोबारा से धान की रोपाई तक करनी पड़ी थी। इस बार भी मारकंडा नदी का पानी तटबंधों से छू कर चल रहा है। लोगों को घबराने की जरूरत नहीं : एसडीओ सिंचाई विभाग के एसडीओ राहिल सैनी से बात की तो उन्होंने कहा कि मारकंडा नदी में गांव...

title: Генштаб ВСУ заявил о напряженной ситуации на двух направлениях
content: МОСКВА, 15 авг - РИА Новости. Генштаб украинских войск заявил о напряженной обстановке на Купянском и Северском направлениях. "На Купянском направлении... ситуация напряженная... Напряженная ситуация на Северском направлении", — говорится в сообщении, опубликованном генштабом в Telegram-канале. Ранее глава российской администрации Харьковской области Виталий Ганчев сообщил, что ВС России освобождают дорогу, соединяющую Купянск и Сватово, несколько сел вдоль нее уже перешли под контроль российских войск. По словам Ганчева, ВС России медленно, но уверенно продвигаются к самому Купянску. Россия начала военную операцию на Украине 24 февраля. Президент Владимир Путин назвал ее целью "защиту людей, которые на протяжении восьми лет подвергаются издевательствам, геноциду со стороны киевского режима". Для этого, по его словам, планируется провести "демилитаризацию и денацификацию Украины", предать суду всех военных преступников, ответственных за "кровавые преступления против мирных жителей" Донбасса.

والد لامين يامال يتعرض للطعن وينقل للمشفي.. ما القصة..؟!
content: هاي كورة- أكدت التقارير الاسبانية أن والد لامين يامال تعرض للطعن مساء أمس ، الاربعاء، وتم نقله إلى المستشفي على الفور، ولكنه غادرها بعد فترة وجيزة بعد أن استقرت حالته. تفاصيل الواقعة: -تعرض والد نجم برشلونة للطعن بعد شجار مع أنصار حزب VOX (يمين متطرف) في ساحة للسيارات في ماتارو. -وتم تحويله إلى مشفي كانروتي في بادالونا (إصابته كانت طفيفة)، وخرج بعد فترة وجيزة وعاد للمنزل. -اعتقلت الشرطة عدد من المشتبه بهم في الواقعة. -وهذه ليس المرة الاولى التي يتشاجر فيها والد لامين مع اعضاء حزب VOX، ففي يونيو من العام الماضي حكمت المحكمة عليه بدفع غرامة قدرها 550 يورو لمهاجمته خيمة لأنصار الحزب المتطرف في ماتارو خلال الحملة الانتخابية لعام 2023.

title: Imputado Alberto Fernández por “lesiones graves” y “abuso de poder” contra su ex mujer
creator: Lorena Sáez
content: Un fiscal de Argentina ha imputado este miércoles al expresidente Alberto Fernández (2019-2023) por el presunto delito de "lesiones graves" y “abuso de poder y autoridad” contra la ex primera dama Fabiola Yáñez, según han informado medios locales. La imputación ha sido realizada por el fiscal federal Ramiro González, a cargo de la investigación abierta por la denuncia contra Fernández impulsada por Yáñez por supuesta violencia machista. Con esta acusación, el procurador ha solicitado recabar las primeras pruebas en el marco de la denuncia presentada a partir de fotografías y conversaciones halladas por la Justicia en el teléfono de la secretaria de Fernández, como parte de una investigación por presunta corrupción en la contratación pública. Al exmandatario se le imputan los delitos de lesiones graves doblemente agravadas por el vínculo y por darse en un contexto de violencia de género y de amenazas coactivas en perjuicio de su expareja. El pasado 6 de agosto se conoció la denuncia de Yáñez por violencia física y hostigamiento cuando aún era matrimonio. La denuncia se produjo después de que la Justicia argentina, en el marco de una investigación sobre un presunto tráfico de influencias del exmandatario, encontrara en junio pasado mensajes que darían cuenta de un supuesto maltrato físico de Fernández hacia Yáñez. La Justicia halló en el...

title: La "represión" en Venezuela "amenaza con silenciar" las voces más vulnerables, afirma ONG
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Caracas, 14 ago (EFE).- El Observatorio Venezolano de Conflictividad Social (OVCS) afirmó este miércoles que la "represión" durante las protestas contra el resultado oficial de las presidenciales, por el que se ratificó la victoria Nicolás Maduro, "amenaza con silenciar" las voces más vulnerables de la sociedad. "Estas manifestaciones poselectorales han surgido principalmente de las entrañas de los barrios más empobrecidos, antiguos bastiones del chavismo, desafiando la narrativa oficial y enfrentando una represión brutal que amenaza con silenciar las voces más vulnerables de la sociedad venezolana", señaló el OVCS en un informe publicado en su página web. La organización indicó que entre el 29 y 30 de julio documentó 915 protestas en Venezuela, tras el anuncio del resultado por parte del Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), que otorgó la victoria a Nicolás Maduro. Asimismo, dijo que el 80 % de estas manifestaciones se registraron en zonas pobres y populares, "tradicionalmente afectas al Gobierno" y, añadió, el 75 % de las protestas "reprimidas" ocurrieron en barrios pobres. "Pareciera una estrategia deliberada para silenciar a quienes más sufren las consecuencias de la emergencia humanitaria compleja, que actualmente exigen transparencia y entrega de las actas electorales", añadió. El OVCS indicó que la "criminalización" de la protesta socava los...

title: اوکراین مدعی حمله به چهار پایگاه هوایی در خاک روسیه شد
content: به نقل از رویترز، ستاد مشترک ارتش اوکراین در پیامی در تلگرام مدعی شد که به پایگاه‌های خالینو، ساواسلیکا، بوریسوگلبسک و بالتیمور در مناطق وورونژ، کورسک و نیژنی نووگورود روسیه حمله کرد. این نهاد افزود که «اهداف اصلی این حملات انبارهای سوخت و سلاح‌های هوایی بود» و نتایج آن در دست بررسی است. همچنین یک مقام امنیتی اوکراین گفت که هدف این حملات تضعیف توانایی روسیه در استفاده از هواپیماهای جنگی برای بمباران اوکراین بود. وی افزود که میزان خسارات ناشی از این حملات در حال بررسی است. ولودیمیر زلنسکی رئیس جمهور اوکراین در پیامی به ارتش این کشور گفت: بابت این حملات دقیق، به‌موقع و موثر به پایگاه‌های هوایی روسیه ممنونم. پهپادهای اوکراین دقیقا همان کاری را می‌کنند که باید انجام دهند. وزارت دفاع روسیه پیشتر گفته بود که سامانه‌های دفاع هوایی این کشور ۱۱۷ پهپاد و چهار موشک تاکتیکی اوکراین را در چند منطقه از جمله کورسک منهدم کردند. این حملات در حالی انجام شد که ارتش اوکراین مدعی شده است که در حمله به کورسک حدود یک هزار کیلومتر از خاک روسیه را اشغال کرده است. در همین حال، مقام‌های اوکراینی چهارشنبه شب اعلام کردند که نیروهای روسیه به زیرساخت‌های بندر اودسا در جنوب اوکراین حمله کردند و ۲ تن زخمی شدند. «اوله کیپر» فرماندار اودسا گفت که روسیه در این حمله از یک موشک بالستیک استفاده کرد.

title: VERSES Announces NRI Transitions to GENIUSTM
creator: Globe Newswire
content: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- VERSES AI Inc. VERS VRSSF ("VERSES" or the "Company"), a cognitive computing company developing next-generation intelligent software systems, today announced that third party logistics company NRI USA, LLC ("NRI") will be upgrading to the GENIUS Beta program. "NRI was an early adopter of our offerings and saw the vision of what our intelligent software can provide. Since we entered into a commercial agreement with them, our business model has evolved from an industry specific bespoke offering, to that of our current flagship platform offering, GENIUS. So naturally it makes sense to transition our relationship onto the GENIUS platform," said Gabriel René, CEO of VERSES. "It was great utilizing the early capabilities of Wayfinder but we need more than just routing capabilities. The 3PL and supply chain industry is more complex than ever and at times very unpredictable. The ability to apply our vast amounts of data to GENIUS' reasoning capabilities is extremely exciting for our business. This will be a foundational element for when the more advanced Genius capabilities are released in the future, " said Pete McKenna, CEO of NRI. Due to the change of platform and the structure of the GENIUS offering, the existing SaaS contract dated August 25, 2021 is being voided by both parties and no further obligations are...

title: AP Business SummaryBrief at 6:31 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Annual US inflation falls to 3-year low, clearing the way for the Fed to begin cutting rates WASHINGTON (AP) — Year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, the latest sign that the worst price spike in four decades is fading and setting up the Federal Reserve for an interest rate cut in September. Measured from a year earlier, prices rose 2.9%, down from 3% in June. It was the mildest year-over-year inflation figure since March 2021. The ongoing inflation slowdown could affect the presidential campaign, given that former President Donald Trump has highlighted rampant inflation as a key failing of the Biden administration and its energy policies. Vice President Kamala Harris has said she would soon unveil new proposals to “bring down costs and also strengthen the economy overall.” Sweet and salty deal worth $30 billion would put M&M's and Snickers alongside Cheez-It and Pringles M&M’s maker Mars is paying nearly $30 billion for Kellanova, the maker of Cheez-Its and Pop-Tarts. The acquisition could significantly broaden Mars' snacking portfolio and help it expand globally. Kellanova was created last year when the Kellogg Co. split into two companies. Chicago-based Kellanova sells many of the former company’s most profitable brands, including Pringles and Rice Krispies Treats. It had net sales of more than $13 billion last year. Mars is one...

creator: info@fosonline.gr ()
content: Ο Πεπ Μπιελ έκανε καλή προετοιμασία με τον Ολυμπιακό , αλλά τελικά αποφασίστηκε να δοθεί δανεικός για δεύτερη φορά, μετά την περσινή παραχώρησή του στην Άουγκσμπουργκ. Αν και υπήρχε ενδιαφέρον από ισπανικές ομάδες, τελικά ο Μπιελ δεν θα πάει στην πατρίδα του, αλλά στις ΗΠΑ. Ο Ολυμπιακός συμφώνησε να τον δώσει στην Σάρλοτ , με τις πληροφορίες ν αναφέρουν ότι υπάρχει και οψιόν αγοράς από την ομάδα του MLS. Το συμβόλαιο του Μπιελ με τον Ολυμπιακό ολοκληρώνεται το 2027.

title: Mpox: qué es la viruela del mono y cómo se contagia
creator: Redacción Mix
content: mix@diariogestion.com.pe Ante el incremento de casos de la enfermedad infecciosa de mpox, también conocida como viruela símica o viruela del mono, en el continente africano, la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) declaró una emergencia sanitaria internacional de salud pública por representar un riesgo para todo el mundo. Y no es para menos, pues si tomamos en cuenta que 16 de los 26 países que reportaron personas infectadas, las cifras se incrementaron significativamente de mayo a junio de 2024, las alarmas se encendieron. Si bien, esta es una situación muy compleja, en esta nota te damos a conocer qué es y cómo se contagia. Antes te precisamos lo señalado por Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, director General de la OMS, en una rueda de prensa: “Hoy [14 de agosto], el comité de emergencia me confirmó y me avisó que, en su opinión, la situación constituye una emergencia pública de preocupación internacional. He aceptado ese consejo. Está claro que una respuesta internacional coordinada es esencial para detener estos brotes y salvar vidas” . Cabe mencionar que Congo es el país con mayor cantidad de contagiados con 543, mientras que Australia tiene 64, España 54 y Colombia 11. “La mpox es una zoonosis viral causada por el virus de la viruela símica , que pertenece al género Orthopoxvirus, que incluye al virus variola (causante de la viruela)” , precisa la...

title: California Central Valley Democrats and Republicans in close House races skip conventions; here’s why
creator: Gillian Brassil - McClatchy Washington Bureau (TNS)
content: Central Valley Democrats in very close California congressional races won’t be at the party’s national convention next week. Their GOP counterparts skipped the Republican National Convention last month. Their elections, in California’s 13th and 22nd Congressional Districts, are important to whether Democrats or Republicans have the U.S. House of Representative’s majority in 2025. The Democratic National Convention next week could offer a chance for challengers to talk with and hang out with big donors. “In other words, going to the convention means opportunities for fundraising, which will be very important in these races,” said Thomas Holyoke, a political science professor at California State University, Fresno. So why skip the DNC and RNC? National attention and fundraising has already poured into these races. To succeed in November, candidates must get support from swing or unenthusiastic voters in their rural districts — voters who very likely will not be attending, or possibly will be being annoyed at all the partisan rhetoric, at a party convention. Candidates pitching themselves as moderate tend to do well in California’s San Joaquin Valley, and distancing from national party leaders seen either as too conservative or liberal has been a common strategy. “I don’t think going or not going matters all that much, and I can see why members in competitive or somewhat...

title: В Черкасской области Украины произошли взрывы
creator: Газета.Ru
content: В Черкасской области Украины произошли взрывы В Черкасской области Украины произошли взрывы. Об этом сообщается в Telegram-канале издания «Общественное Новости». Других подробностей произошедшего не приводится. До этого координатор николаевского подполья Сергей Лебедев заявил , что удар по порту в городе Одессе, предположительно, пришелся по пусковым установкам и арсеналу западных противокорабельных ракет. Он уточнил, что защищавшая склад украинская система противовоздушной обороны не успела сработать и уничтожить снаряд. Более того, установка «приняла участие в детонации», от удара развалившись на несколько частей. Вечером 14 августа украинское издание «Страна.ua» сообщило, что в городе Одессе произошел мощный взрыв. Журналисты обнародовали кадры с места ЧП, на которых был запечатлен поднимающийся в небо столб дыма. Позже координатор николаевского подполья заявил об ударе по порту, расположенному в данном населенном пункте. Лебедев уточнил, что Вооруженные силы Украины понесли определенные потери. Ранее российские войска нанесли удар по аэродрому в Николаевской области Украины.

title: Arizona sheriff to talk about southern border in Fargo
creator: Forum staff
content: FARGO — A sheriff from Arizona will speak in Fargo about the southern border. Pinal County Sheriff Mark Lamb will appear at 5:30 p.m. Sept. 10 at the Avalon Event Center as part of a rally titled “Law and Border: Crisis in America”, according to a news release. The event is sponsored by the Fargo Area Conservatives PAC. “The purpose of the event is to bring local conservatives together to raise money for candidates who will stand for conservative principles and defend American sovereignty by securing our borders,” the release said. Lamb, who has served as the Pinal County sheriff since 2017, will talk about “fighting criminal cartels supplying the deadly flow of fentanyl and human trafficking,” the release said. The event also will focus on illegal immigration’s impact on the Fargo area, the release said. Pinal County is in south-central Arizona between Phoenix and Tucson. It is the size of Connecticut and employs 500 Sheriff’s Office employees, according to the Pinal County website. Cass County Sheriff Jesse Jahner will join Lamb, according to the event’s website. Early bird tickets are $40 until Sept. 1, the release said. After that, tickets will be $50. There also are tickets available for VIP prices: $100 for individuals and $180 for couples. For tickets and more information, go to fargoconservatives.com/law-and-border-rally .

title: Handball CDM U18 : La paire Abdou Faye-Fadel Diop passe tous les tests avec succès
creator: Papa Mamadou Ndour
content: Abdou Faye-Fadel Diop est le duo d’arbitres internationaux IHF sélectionné pour le championnat du monde de la jeunesse féminine en Chine. Avec une arrivée à l’Empire du milieu le dimanche, la paire sénégalaise a passé tous les tests (écrit, physique et vidéo) avec succès. « Nous sommes arrivés en Chine dimanche, pour le championnat du monde de la jeunesse féminine de handball. Nous avons réussi les différents tests pré-compétition (physiques, écrits et vidéo) », a déclaré monsieur Fadel Diop ce mardi. Quatre paires d’arbitres africains sont représentées : le Sénégal et l’Égypte, dont les deux paires sont des arbitres internationaux IHF. Les deux autres paires sont présentes pour l’obtention du badge IHF : une paire tunisienne (féminine) et une paire marocaine (masculine). Il a également été nommé délégué technique de la compétition le président des arbitres africains, Mamoudou Diabaté de Côte d’Ivoire. L’événement compte également la présence du président de la CAHB, Monsieur Aremou.

title: 이철우 지사 "TK통합은 경제·산업 시너지 극대화 위한 것...통합 법률안 대구시와 협의 중"
creator: 전종훈 기자 apple@imaeil.com
content: 이철우 경북도지사 이철우 경북도지사는 14일 대구경북통합을 위한 특별법과 관련해 "시·도 통합은 지방소멸과 지역 쇠퇴를 막기 위해 경제·산업 성장과 시너지를 극대화하기 위함이 대전제이며, 지역 균형발전도 고려해야 한다"고 강조했다. 대구시와의 절충과정이 남아있지만 이 지사의 시·도 통합 의지는 확고하다. 그는 "시·도 통합이 단순히 행정통합에 머물러서는 안되며 행정통합을 기반으로 우량 기업을 더 많이 유치하고 지역간 연계와 협력뿐 아니라 적절한 분업을 통해 경제와 산업을 키워 시도민이 더 나은 삶을 영위하도록 해야 한다"고 지적했다. 이어 "경제·산업 분야세서의 획기적 도약없이는 대구경북의 미래가 어두운 만큼 대구시와 경북도가 대승적으로 접근해야 한다"며 "현재 도는 외교·국방 등을 제외한 분야에서 4대 원칙에 기초해 총 6편, 272개조로 구성된 통합 법률안을 마련해 대구시와 협의 중이다"고 밝혔다. 이 지사는 지난 12일 한 회의에서 "중앙 권한을 가져오는 것은 협의가 거의 다 됐고 재정 부분도 중앙정부와 협상할 내용만 남았다"고 말했다. 그러면서 "(대구시청과 경북도청) 청사를 어떻게 할 것인지만 협의 대상으로 남아 있다"며 "청사는 현 상태에서 바뀌면 안 되고 (대구시청과 경북도청) 청사를 그대로 두겠다"고 강조한 바 있다. 이 지사는 먼저 합의안을 마련하는데 역량을 집중하고 중앙부처와의 협의 이후...

title: 한동훈, 연평해전 故한상국 상사 부인 만나...'유공자 적극예우' 공감
creator: 김세연 기자 ksy121@imaeil.com
content: 국민의힘 한동훈 대표가 26일 오전 서울 여의도 중앙당사에서 열린 사무처당직자 월례조회에서 인사말을 하고 있다. 연합뉴스 한동훈 국민의힘 대표가 제2연평해전에서 전사한 고(故) 한상국 상사 등을 기리는 출판기념 모임에서 고인의 부인 김한나 씨와의 만남을 가졌다. 지난 14일 한 대표는 김 씨의 SNS글과 사진을 공유하며 모임 참석 소식을 전했다. 김 씨는 전날 페이스북에 "오늘 특별한 모임을 가졌다. 동화책을 만든 한상국 상사 친구들 모임"이라며 "글 작가, 사진작가, 삽화 작가, 번역자, 감수한 분, 출판사 대표 그리고 마지막 멤버인 한동훈 대표"라고 적었다. 한 대표는 모임에서 국가 유공자를 적극적으로 예우해야 한다는 의견에 공감했다고 한 참석지는 전했다. 김 씨는 최근 국회 앞에서 순직 군인 등의 유족에게 사후 진급 추서된 계급에 맞게 연금을 지급하도록 군인사법 개정을 요구하는 1인시위를 한 바 있다. 그는 7·23 전당대회에서 한 대표 후보 후원회장을 맡기도 했다. 한편, 지난 6월 한 대표는 SNS에서 "연평해전의 영웅 한상국 상사님의 삶과 죽음을 이야기하는 동화책이 준비되고 있다고 한다"며 동화책 제작 프로젝트를 소개한 바 있다.

title: 박세리, 부친 논란 2달 만에 전한 심경..."그동안 감사했다"
creator: 배주현 기자 pearzoo@imaeil.com
content: 최근 박세리는 자신의 유튜브 채널 '박세리의 속사정'을 통해 '그동안 정말 감사했습니다'라는 제목의 영상을 올렸다. 유튜브 캡처 부친과 법정 다툼을 이어가고 있는 골프선수 출신 박세리가 그동안의 심정을 밝혔다. 최근 박세리는 자신의 유튜브 채널 '박세리의 속사정'을 통해 '그동안 정말 감사했습니다'라는 제목의 영상을 올렸다. 박세리는 "오늘은 아마 좀 분위기가 다르게 보이실텐데 제가 좀 드릴 말씀이 있어서 처음으로 제 집에서 인사를 드린다"고 설명했다. 이어 "얼마 전에 언론에서 보신 것처럼 어려운 일이 있었는데 감사하게도 정말 많은 분이 응원을 많이 해주시고 좋은 에너지를 많이 전달해주시는 분이 많아 힘입어서 열심히 하루하루 일상생활을 하면서 일하고 있다"고 덧붙였다. 그러면서 "그동안 제가 많은 분들께도 항상 감사 인사를 드렸지만 이번에 일을 겪으면서 더더욱이나 진심으로 감사드린다는 말씀을 전해드리고 싶었다"라며 "진심으로 감사 인사드리겠다"며 설명했다. 이어 박세리는 자신의 일상생활을 담은 '브이로그'를 공개할 예정이라고 했다. 박세리는 "워낙 일이 많아서 바쁜 일정이 끝나고 나면 특별하게 하는 건 없지만 제가 일상생활 속에서 자연스러운 리얼 생활을 보여드릴 수 있을 것 같다"라며 "공감하실 분이 굉장히 많으실 것 같다"고 말했다. 아울러 "모찌(반려견)랑 산책하거나 지인들하고...

title: 둘로 쪼개진 광복절...정부 vs 독립운동단체·野 기념식 따로
creator: 배주현 기자 pearzoo@imaeil.com
content: 광복절을 하루 앞둔 14일 대구 동구 큰고개오거리 일대에서 열린 '나라사랑 태극기달기 캠페인'을 통해 태극기를 무료로 받은 한 상인이 상점에 태극기를 게양하고 있다. 이날 한국자유총연맹 대구 동부지부는 가정용 태극기 500개를 시민들에게 전달했다. 안성완 기자 asw0727@imaeil.com 광복절 경축식이 15일 열리는 가운데 김형석 독립기념관장 임명을 둘러싼 갈등이 해소되지 않으면서 '반쪽' 행사에 그칠 가능성이 커졌다. 제79주년 광복절 경축식은 15일 오전 10시 종로구 세종문화회관에서 열린다. 하지만 광복회 등 독립운동단체와 더불어민주당을 비롯한 야당은 김형석 신임 독립기념관장이 '친일 뉴라이트 인사'라며 이번 경축식 불참을 선언했고 별도 행사를 열기로 했다. 광복절에 정부 주최 경축식과 독립운동단체 기념식이 따로 열리는 것은 사상 초유의 일이다. 광복회를 비롯한 37개 독립운동단체는 효창공원 내 백범기념관에서 광복회원과 독립운동가 유족, 관련 기념사업회 및 단체 회원 등이 참석한 가운데 따로 광복 기념식을 개최한다. 또 민주당 등 야당은 25개 독립운동가 선양 단체로 구성된 항일독립선열선양단체연합 주최로 효창공우너 내 삼의사 묘역에서 열리는 광복절 기념식에 참석한다. 광복회는 자체 기념식 개최를 두고 "정부의 친일 편향적인 정책에 항의하고 일제 극복과 함께...

title: Real Madrid es CAMPEÓN de la Supercopa de Europa por sexta ocasión
creator: EFE
content: Varsovia .- El Real Madrid se ha proclamado campeón de la Supercopa de Europa tras imponerse en la final disputada en Varsovia al Atalanta italiano por 2-0 y con ello pasa a ser el único club que ha conseguido seis veces el título a lo largo de la historia. El conjunto blanco, que ganó el billete para esta cita tras ganar en la final de la Liga de Campeones al Borussia de Dortmund por 0-2, levantando con ello su decimoquinto trofeo en este torneo; releva ahora en la Supercopa al Manchester City , que el pasado curso superó en los penaltis al Sevilla. 🏆 ¡SOMOS SUPERCAMPEONES DE EUROPA! 🏆 🏁 @RealMadrid 2-0 @Atalanta_BC ⚽ 59′ @fedeevalverde ⚽ 68′ @KMbappe #6SuperCups | #SuperCup pic.twitter.com/7xfYmSK25D — Real Madrid C.F. (@realmadrid) August 14, 2024 Su victoria en Polonia permite al bando madridista situarse al frente del palmarés en solitario, abriendo distancia con respecto al Barcelona y al AC Milan , que atesoran cinco. Por detrás de todos ellos aparece el Liverpool con cuatro y el Atlético de Madrid con tres . Por países España domina el historial de la Supercopa de Europa con 17 títulos ; pues a las del Real Madrid (2002, 2014, 2016, 2017 y 2022 más la del 2024), el Barcelona (1992, 1997, 2009, 2011 y 2015) y el Atlético (2010, 2012 y 2018) se suman dos del Valencia (1980 y 2004) y una del Sevilla (2006). Inglaterra se queda con diez trofeos e Italia con...

title: رسالة إلى الحاقدين والكارهين ... هذا هو ريال مدريد
content: هاي كورة _ وجه الصحفي المدريدي إيدو أغيري رسالة قوية إلى جميع خصوم ريال مدريد بعد السوبر الأوروبي. أغيري قال خلال تصريحات له في برنامج التشيرينغيتو التالي: “كان هناك الكثير من الأشخاص يفركون أيديهم ويترقبون، ولكن الواقع وضع الجميع في مكانهم”. “أود أن أطمئن أولئك الذين أرادوا رؤية ريال مدريد ينهزم أمام أتالانتا، لأن ذلك لم يحدث”.

title: "니 냄새 좋아"...유명 디자이너, 동성 미성년자 제자 성추행
creator: 김세연 기자 ksy121@imaeil.com
content: 유명 무용가이자 한복디자이너 A씨로 부터 성추행 피해를 입은 미성년자 제자 B군. JTBC 무용가이자 한복 디자이너로 이름을 알린 A씨가 동성인 고등학생 제자를 성추행한 혐의로 재판에 넘겨졌다. 지난 14일 JTBC 보도에 따르면 유명 한국 무용가 A씨가 앞선 12일 미성년자를 성추행한 혐의로 재판에 넘겨졌다. A씨는 지난 2022년부터 1년 가까이 1대1 개인레슨을 맡았던 고등학생 제자 B군을 성추행한 혐의를 받는다. 피해자 B군은 해당 매체를 통해 "마사지를 해주신다는 이유로 저를 이제 침실에 눕게 하시고 너무 자연스럽게 속옷 안으로 손이 들어온다"고 당시를 설명했다. 또 개인적으로 연락해 "요즘 니 바지에서 나는 냄새가 그렇게 좋다"는 등의 발언을 했다고 밝혔다. A씨는 B군에게 남자 무용수로서 살아남으려면 양성적인 성향이 있어야 한다거나 남자를 좋아할 줄 알아야 하고 마음 자체가 깊어야 한다는 등의 발언을 한 것으로도 알려졌다. B군은 A씨로부터 유사 성행위까지 있었다고 주장했다. 당시 B군은 지속된 가스라이팅으로 이미 판단력을 잃은 것으로 전해졌다. B군은 "스스로 판단하기 어려운 지경까지 갔던 것 같다. 이분의 기분을 망치는 것 자체도 하면 안 되겠구나"고 털어놨다. 이후 B군이 1년여 만에 A씨를 형사고소하자 A씨는 강요는 없었다고 혐의를 부인한 것으로 알려졌다. A씨는 "강요나 어떤 이런 게 아니었기 때문에 1년 반 넘게...

title: Recuperan una principal vía de San Juan de Lurigancho que funcionaba como mercado informal cerca de la Línea 1
content: Keiko Fujimori . Metro UNI . Christian Cueva . Dólar en Perú . Aniversario de Arequipa . Resultados UNI . Rafael Cardozo . Colección de BTS . Examen UNI . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Uno de los puntos críticos del operativo fue la clausura de un bar clandestino que funcionaba como discoteca durante los fines de semana. Cerca de las tres de la madrugada de este miércoles 14 de agosto, los fiscalizadores municipales llevaron a cabo un operativo en el distrito de San Juan de Lurigancho que fue liderado por el alcalde Jesús Maldonado Amao , con el objetivo de recuperar una importante vía que por años había sido ocupada por el comercio informal. La intervención se centró en las inmediaciones de la estación Santa Rosa de la Línea 1 del Metro de Lima . La zona había estado dominada por un desorden generalizado debido a la presencia de vendedores ambulantes . El burgomaestre señaló que esta actividad no solo obstruía el tránsito peatonal y vehicular, sino que también facilitaba la proliferación de delitos conexos, como el transporte informal y la delincuencia. La acumulación de puestos informales en esta área había creado un entorno caótico, contribuyendo al incremento de la inseguridad y a problemas adicionales como el...

title: ‘భద్రత’ కోసం వైద్యుల నిరసన
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: ‘ప్రభుత్వాస్పత్రిలో ప్రమాదకర పరిస్థితుల్లో ఉంది రోగులు కాదు. చికిత్స అందించే వైద్యులే’ అంటూ రాష్ట్రంలో జూనియర్‌ వైద్యులు ఆందోళనకు దిగారు. వైద్యులకు రక్షణ కల్పించే సెంట్రల్‌ ప్రొటెక్షన్‌ యాక్ట్‌ ఫర్‌ డాక్టర్స్‌ చట్టం అమల్లోకి వచ్చేంత వరకు తమ నిరవధిక ఆందోళన విరమించేది లేదని నినదించారు. ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌ జూనియర్‌ డాక్టర్స్‌ అసోసియేషన్‌(ఆబ్జుడా) ఆధ్వర్యంలో మూడో రోజు కూడా జూనియర్‌ వైద్యులు ఆందోళన కొనసాగించారు. కోల్‌కతాలో పీజీ ట్రైనీ విద్యార్థిని హత్యాచారం కేసులో దోషులను కఠినంగా శిక్షించాలని, బాధిత కుటుంబానికి న్యాయం చేయాలని, జూనియర్‌ డాక్టర్ల రక్షణకు కేంద్రం సీపీఏ యాక్ట్‌ అమలు చేయాలని డిమాండ్‌ చేశారు. గుంటూరులో జూనియర్‌ డాక్టర్లు చేస్తున్న నిరసన కార్యక్రమానికి ప్రభుత్వ వైద్యుల సంఘం (జీడీఏ) జీజీహెచ్‌ /జీఎంసీ శాఖ ప్రతినిధులు జూడాల శిబిరాన్ని సందర్శించి వారికి మద్దతు ప్రకటించారు. జీజీహెచ్‌ సూపరింటెండెంట్‌ వై కిరణ్‌కుమార్‌ జూడాలకు మద్దతు తెలిపారు.

title: Video de “rechazo ciudadano” a Patricia Chirinos en Piura no es actual: data de 2023
content: Internautas comparten este abucheo contra la congresista como si fuera un hecho reciente, pero ocurrió el año pasado durante su visita a un hospital. Hace días atrás, Patricia Chirinos , congresista por Avanza País, fue expulsada , junto a su colega Luis Aragón, de Acción Popular, de un bar del distrito de Barranco entre insultos y agresiones. El incidente fue reportado por el medio digital La Encerrona el 4 de agosto a las 2:57 de la mañana. Tras ese suceso, se ha difundido un video que, según los internautas, se trata de una nueva y reciente agresión verbal contra la legisladora en agosto de este año. Pero la información es inexacta. En la secuencia se observa a la exalcaldesa del distrito La Perla (2015-2018) con un polo rosado y el cabello recogido caminando por los pasillos de un establecimiento de salud, que contiene letreros de “sala de espera”, “Imagenología”, “Emergencia”, entre otros. Es acompañada por personal de seguridad y mujeres que visten uniformes azules. De manera simultánea, otro grupo de personas la persiguen hasta llegar a una puerta, que lleva a otra zona, pero que no ingresa porque es impedida. “Corrupta”, “Chirinos sinvergüenza”, entre otros, son algunos de los calificativos que se logran identificar a pesar del bullicio y la música de fondo. En el tránsito se ve a algunas de las enfermeras portando carteles. “Se han suspendido 200...

title: WARMINGTON: Hamilton’s beloved CHML 900 radio goes silent without notice
creator: Joe Warmington
content: The sudden silence heard all across Hamilton on Wednesday morning was deafening. It’s not every day a historic radio station goes off the air before it tells its listeners. They, and staff, found out when beloved AM station CMHL 900 just suddenly went dark. Just like that, an almost 100-year marriage ended without any notice or chance to say so long or thanks for the memories. Just as the newscast was about to start at 11 a.m. someone shut down the 50,000-watt transmitter and took the station off the air before they could announce the biggest story of the day. That story was that, after 97 years of broadcasting in Steeltown, the famous station ceased to exist. “It was shocking,” said venerable Hamilton and Burlington businessman and member of the Order of Canada, Ron Foxcroft, who was listening when the plug was pulled. “I had just got back in the car after officiating a citizenship ceremony to welcome more than 60 new Canadians when I turned on the news.” It didn’t come on. There was nothing. An important announcement from CHML: pic.twitter.com/Z9EA10ix8N “I heard the weather and just then the signal went dead,” said the 78-year-old owner of Fox 40 whistles and Fluke Transportation. “I thought it was a technical glitch but started getting texts.” The station vanished into thin air. For Hamilton, it was like a death of a family member. “ Aired my first (program) in my early...

title: Chehalis Fire Department receives over $200K from FEMA grant
content: During its Monday, Aug. 12, meeting, the Chehalis City Council unanimously approved an ordinance accepting Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) Assistance to Firefighters Grant program funding awarded to the Chehalis Fire Department. The ordinance is now awaiting approval on its second and final reading at the next Chehalis City Council meeting scheduled for Aug. 26. FEMA’s Assistance to Firefighters Grant program aims to provide financial assistance to fire departments and emergency medical services to pay for critically needed equipment, vehicles, protective gear, training and other resources to protect both the public and emergency responders, according to the council’s agenda report. In total, the Chehalis Fire Department was awarded $202,933.00, with $193,269.52 coming from the FEMA grant program and an additional 5% match coming from the City of Chehalis to the tune of $9,663.48. Chehalis Fire Chief Adam Fulbright said the department applies for this grant annually and had been denied when asking for funds to purchase a new ambulance over the past three years. “This year, we put in for brand new hoses to upgrade all the hose packages on all of our engines and the ladder truck,” Fulbright said. “Most of our hose is severely outdated, which does have an impact on ISO (Insurance Services Office) rating.” Most of the department's hoses are 20 years old or older, he...

title: तंबोली समाज की प्रतिभाओं को सम्मानित किया गया
content: सूर्यवंशी कुमरावत तंबोली समाज संस्था एवं महिला शक्ति की आेर से बड़बड़ेश्वर महादेव, सेक्टर 14 में प्रतिभा सम्मान समारोह हुआ। कार्यक्रम की शुरुआत किरण पहाड़िया ने खेलकूद प्रतियोगिताओं एवं लहरिया फेस्ट के साथ की। इसी बीच शिक्षा, खेल सहित विभिन्न गतिविधियों में होनहार विद्यार्थियों को पुरस्कार दिया गया। इस दौरान सुरेश टोडावल, डॉ. शिवानी प्रतीम, मंजू टोडावत आदि मौजूद थे।

title: Estas son las carreras que serán más solicitadas con la ejecución de megaproyectos
creator: Redacción Gestión
content: redacciongestion@diariogestion.com.pe El desarrollo del Megapuerto de Chancay , las obras mineras como Yumpag, Corani y Romina por un valor aproximado de US$ 850 millones e, incluso, un futuro puerto espacial de la NASA proyectado en Piura impulsará el crecimiento económico del país, generando más empleo y demanda de profesionales altamente calificados y especializados. De acuerdo con el Banco Central de Reserva ( BCR ), se generarán más de 121,000 nuevos empleos, entre ellos profesionales con conocimientos sólidos en gestión de proyectos, finanzas, tecnología y destacadas habilidades blandas. Yuriko Huarcaya, jefa académica de negocios de la Escuela de Educación Superior Tecnológica Privada CERTUS, indicó que a la par de este crecimiento se debe ofrecer programas académicos acorde al mercado, como las siguientes denominadas “carreras del futuro”: Administración de Empresas: Esta carrera permite desarrollar habilidades estratégicas para gestionar proyectos de gran envergadura, liderar equipos multidisciplinarios y tomar decisiones basadas en datos y asumir roles como gerente de proyecto, director de operaciones o consultor empresarial. Administración Financiera y Banca Digital: Las herramientas financieras permiten evaluar la viabilidad de proyectos de inversión, gestionar riesgos y optimizar los recursos con conocimientos en banca digital y fintech....

title: Perú registra 1.191 feminicidios entre 2015 y 2023 con la mayor tasa en Huancavelica
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Lima, 14 ago (EFE).- Perú registró 1.191 casos de feminicidio entre el 2015 y 2023, de los cuales 146 se perpetraron el año pasado, y la tasa más alta se reportó en la surandina región de Huancavelica con 2,9 por cada 100.000 mujeres, informó este miércoles el Instituto Nacional de Estadística e Informática (INEI). El documento sobre Feminicidio y Violencia contra la Mujer detalló que el peor año fue el 2018 con 150 víctimas. La tasa de feminicidio a nivel nacional se mantuvo en 0,9 en el 2023, pero en la sureña región Arequipa se elevó a 2,5, en la central Junín fue 2,3 y en la selvática Huánuco 2,2. El mayor número de casos se registró en Lima con 283 y el 4,3 % de las víctimas, a nivel nacional, fueron extranjeras. De acuerdo a las características de la agresión, el 24,7 % fue un ataque con arma blanca, el 22,6 % por estrangulamiento, asfixia o ahogamiento, el 14,4 % por arma de fuego y 10,3 % por un golpe con un objeto contundente, entre otros. En el 50,5 % de los feminicidios, "los celos" fueron el principal motivo para perpetrar la muerte de la mujer, seguido de la violencia familiar (10,3 %), la negativa de la víctima a volver con la pareja (7,2 %) y el abuso sexual (6,2 %), según los datos del INEI. En la mitad de los casos, el ataque ocurrió en la vivienda de la víctima, precisó el informe. Asimismo, la investigación detalló que en el...

title: Experts say no tax on tips will not benefit workers
creator: Serena Marshall
content: It's rare, especially in today's political climate, to see an issue that Republicans and Democrats are united on. Whoever wins in 2025, tax policy will be high on Congress' agenda next year as the Trump era tax cuts expire. But for taxes on tips, this may be an issue that keeps the politicians on one side and the experts on the other. Both candidates have been vague on the "how" of the proposal to stop taxing tips, but is it realistic? To find out, Scripps News asked tax expert Steven Rosenthal, who said, "When I hear the political parties agreeing, I put my hand on my wallet because the only agreements that we seem to have these days are fiscal giveaways. We tax policy professionals are always uncomfortable during campaigns — what we call the silly season. It's one of those proposals that sounds good and may resonate politically, but it scores very badly on our tax policy scorecard." RELATED STORY | Harris mirrors Trump proposal to end federal taxes on tips Rosenthal explains that when it comes to tax policy, this idea is a tax loser — on equity, efficiency and revenue. "Well, here it's a pretty large raiser. The best estimates seem to be around a couple of $100 billion over the 10-year congressional budget window, and that's a large number, and that's a static number that does not even account for all the losses that would occur as more and more workers relabel their...

title: US consumer inflation annually rises 2.9% in July, slowest increase since March 2021
Redwire to acquire satellite manufacturer Hera Systems, bolstering defense portfolio
creator: Sandra Erwin
content: WASHINGTON — Redwire Corporation, a space infrastructure company, announced Aug. 14 it plans to acquire Hera Systems, a manufacturer of small satellites focused on national security space missions. The acquisition aligns with Redwire’s efforts to strengthen its foothold in the defense market and support specialized national security space missions in geostationary orbit, the company said in a statement. Jacksonville-based Redwire was formed in 2020 through the merger of several space technology companies. Hera Systems, a private company founded in 2013 and headquartered in San Jose, California, develops small satellite technologies for the aerospace and defense industry. The company’s geostationary satellite platform was selected for the U.S. Space Force’s Tetra 5 in-orbit refueling experiment planned for 2025. The combined entity will seek to compete for customers in sectors including space domain awareness, rendezvous and proximity operations, mesh network communications, and in-orbit servicing. “This transaction fits squarely within our growth strategy,” said Peter Cannito, chairman and CEO of Redwire. The company has been actively expanding its national security space operations, recently securing a prime contract to develop a very low Earth orbit (LEO) spacecraft for DARPA’s Otter initiative. Financial details of the acquisition have not been disclosed, but Redwire...

title: Chennedy Carter SLAMS her ESPN WNBA ranking as Caitlin Clark's old rival says 'the hate be so obvious' before Chicago Sky's season restarts
content: Chennedy Carter SLAMS her ESPN WNBA ranking as Caitlin Clark's old rival says 'the hate be so obvious' before Chicago Sky's season restarts READ MORE: Stephen A. Smith goes on Caitlin Clark WNBA race rant READ MORE: Clip of Angel Reese almost 'going crazy' for Caitlin Clark goes viral By Eric Blum Published: 23:31 BST, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 00:10 BST, 15 August 2024 e-mail 34 View comments Chicago Sky star Chennedy Carter has slammed her ESPN ranking as the 24th-best WNBA player entering the second half of the league season. ESPN only ranked the top 25 of the 144 in the WNBA, actually placing Carter into the top-20 percent of the league's players. Yet, being recognized as second-to-last sent Carter into a social-media rant. 'How I average less minutes and my stats top in the league? But I am at the bottom,' Carter said. 'This isn't adding up. The hate be so obvious, F/G percentage as well.' Carter is the second-highest ranked player on the Chicago Sky, behind rookie Angel Reese. title: Ryan Reynolds says Parkinson’s most unexpected symptoms made him think his dad was ‘losing his mind’
content: Ryan Reynolds tells Fox News Digital it’s been ‘truly an experience of a lifetime’ collaborating with this Hollywood actor. When Ryan Reynolds’ father, who was diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease nearly 30 years ago, began having delusions, the actor didn’t know what to think. "It really destabilized my relationship with him because I didn’t really know what was happening," the 47-year-old admitted to People magazine recently. He added, "At the time I just thought, ‘My dad’s losing his mind.’ My father was really slipping down a rabbit hole where he was struggling to differentiate between reality and fiction. And subsequently everyone else in his life was losing the bedrock faith and trust that they had on his point of view. There would be conspiratorial webs that he would spin about ‘this is happening’ and that ‘these people might be after me’ or ‘this person is out to get me.’ And just stuff that was such a wild departure from the man that I grew up with and knew." Delusions and hallucinations are not an uncommon symptom of the disease, which affects around 20% to 40% of patients, according to the Parkinson’s Foundation. RYAN REYNOLDS PRAISES MICHAEL J. FOX FOR HELPING HIS LATE FATHER WITH PARKINSON'S ‘FEEL LESS ALONE’ When Ryan Reynolds’ father, who was diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease nearly 30 years ago, began having delusions, the actor didn’t know what to think. title: Euro Manganese Reports Third Fiscal Quarter 2024 Financial Results
creator: GlobeNewswire
content: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Euro Manganese Inc. (TSX-V and ASX: EMN; OTCQB: EUMNF; Frankfurt: E06) (the “Company” or “EMN”) today announced financial results and key developments during the third fiscal quarter and to date. The Company has now filed its June 30, 2024, third fiscal quarter Financial Statements and Management’s Discussion and Analysis. Euro Manganese’s fiscal year end is September 30. Euro Manganese is a battery materials company focused on becoming a leading producer of high-purity manganese for the electric vehicle industry. The Company is advancing development of the Chvaletice Manganese Project in the Czech Republic and pursuing an opportunity to produce battery-grade manganese products in Bécancour, Québec. The Chvaletice Project is a unique waste-to-value recycling and remediation opportunity involving reprocessing old tailings from a decommissioned mine. It is also the only sizable resource of manganese in the European Union, strategically positioning the Company to provide battery supply chains with critical raw materials to support the global shift to a circular, low-carbon economy. Euro Manganese is dual listed on the TSX.V and the ASX and is also traded on the OTCQB. — Authorized for release by the CEO of Euro Manganese Inc. Neither TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined...

title: Recibos altos continúa siendo de las principales quejas ante la CESPT
'Chicago Med' Season 10 Premieres in September: Everything to Know
creator: Johnni Macke
content: Epatha Merkerson as Sharon Goodwin, Oliver Platt as Dr. Daniel Charles. George Burns Jr/NBC Chicago Med is nearing 10 years on air as its milestone 10th season begins next month — and fans will have a lot to celebrate when the show returns. S. Epatha Merkerson , Oliver Platt and Marlyne Barrett will all be back amid shake ups in the showrunner department and there are a few new faces ready to mix it up in the ED. The new season will begin with an explosive story line, picking up one month after season 9’s May finale drama. “When a commuter ship capsizes, the ED finds itself under water as they struggle to treat the influx of new patients and deal with bold new employees taking charge,” the official logline reads. In addition to a medical emergency, Jessy Schram , who plays Dr. Hannah Asher, teased in August that her character is still in a “crush scenario” in season 10 with Dr. Mitch Ripley, played by Luke Mitchell . “Luke has been a great addition, and I feel like he’s definitely been finding his stamp [with] Ripley,” Schram told TVLine . “And it’s fun to be able to be his scene partner while he’s doing that.” Scroll down for everything we know about Chicago Med season 10: During the May finale, fans saw two budding romances with Ripley (Mitchell) and Hannah (Schram) having a make out session over tea and Maggie Lockwood (Barrett) and Dr. Loren Johnson ( Henderson Wade )...

title: Российскому паруснику «Штандарт» запретили заход в порт Гранвиля во Франции
creator: RT на русском
content: Власти французского департамента Манш запретили российскому парусному фрегату «Штандарт» заход в порт Гранвиля и другие порты департамента. Об этом сообщает La Manche Libre со ссылкой на коммюнике. Уточняется, что фрегат должен был принять участие в фестивале парусных судов. Своё решение власти обосновали запретом на заход в порты стран-членов ЕС для кораблей, плавающих или плававших под флагом России до 24 февраля 2022 года. Ранее сообщалось, что фрегат «Штандарт» получил разрешение на заход во французскую гавань Ла-Рошель и пополнение запасов.

title: Disney argues wrongful death suit should be tossed because plaintiff signed up for a Disney+ trial
creator: Philip Marcelo
content: Does signing up for Disney 's popular streaming service mean you have agreed to never sue the entertainment giant over anything forever? That is what Disney argues in a wrongful death lawsuit involving a 42-year-old New York doctor whose family claims had a fatal allergic reaction after eating at an Irish pub in Disney Springs in October. Disney is asking a Florida court to dismiss a lawsuit brought by Jeffrey Piccolo, the widow of Kanokporn Tangsuan, a family medicine specialist with NYU Langone’s office in Carle Place, on Long Island. The company argues Piccolo had agreed to settle any lawsuits against Disney out of court through the arbitration process when he signed up for a one-month trial of Disney+ in 2019 and acknowledged that he had reviewed the fine print. “The Terms of Use, which were provided with the Subscriber Agreement, include a binding arbitration clause," the company wrote in its motion. “The first page of the Subscriber Agreement states, in all capital letters, that ‘any dispute between You and Us, Except for Small Claims, is subject to a class action waiver and must be resolved by individual binding arbitration’.” But Piccolo's lawyer, in a response filed earlier this month, argued that it was “absurd” to believe that the more than 150 million subscribers to Disney+ have waived all rights to sue the company and its affiliates in perpetuity — even if their...

The company argues Piccolo had agreed to settle any lawsuits against Disney out of court through the arbitration process when he signed up for a one-month trial of Disney+ in 2019 and acknowledged that he had reviewed the fine print. “The Terms of Use, which were provided with the Subscriber Agreement, include a binding arbitration clause," the company wrote in its motion. “The first page of the Subscriber Agreement states, in all capital letters, that ‘any dispute between You and Us, Except for Small Claims, is subject to a class action waiver and must be resolved by individual binding arbitration’.” But Piccolo's lawyer, in a response filed earlier this month, argued that it was “absurd” to believe that the more than 150 million subscribers to Disney+ have waived all rights to sue the company and its affiliates in perpetuity...

title: ड्राइंग कंपीटीशन : 123 बच्चों ने भरे स्वतंत्रता के रंग
content: उदयपुर| रोटरी क्लब उदयपुर पन्ना की ओर से बुधवार को किड्स ड्राइंग कंपीटीशन में 123 बच्चों ने भाग लिया। कार्यक्रम की मुख्य अतिथि डीएसपी चेतना भाटी व एसआईएआरटी डिप्टी डायरेक्टर आशा मंडावात थे। क्लब अध्यक्ष कुणाल भटनागर ने बताया कि इस प्रतियोगिता का उद्देश्य बच्चों में बचपन से ही अपने देश के प्रति सम्मान व देशभक्ति का भाव लाना था। कार्यक्रम की संयोजिका का सुरभि खत्री ने बताया कि 5 वर्ष से 12 साल के बच्चों ने एक से बढ़कर एक स्वतंत्रता दिवस की थीम पर पेंटिंग्स बनाई।

title: 김영대, 주연 아니었어?...시작 5분만에 피습→사망 ('완벽한 가족')[어저께TV]
WSP Conducting Aeiral Patrols in Southwest Washington, including Skamania County, through Aug. 18
creator: Washington State Patrol, District 5
content: Southwest Washington – The Washington State Patrol (WSP) District 5 is teaming up with troopers in the air this week to bring Target Zero Aeiral Patrols (TZAP) to Southwest Washington (SWWA). The WSP’s Aviation Section is a force multiplier, using TZAP to support the statewide Target Zero initiative. Target Zero aims to reduce serious injury and fatality crashes on our roadways by 2030. TZAP supports that mission by putting troopers in the air and on the ground to combat dangerous driving behaviors. Troopers will fly night missions, utilizing the aerial vantage point to detect and report traffic violations. The airplanes are equipped with Forward Looking Infrared (FLIR) cameras and crewed by two troopers. These patrols are specifically focused on identifying aggressive and reckless drivers. Many times, these patrols can also identify impaired drivers. As we approach the final days of summer, the WSP wants to remind motorists it only takes a few minutes to make a responsible decision that may prevent a tragedy that will result in life-lasting impacts. Reduce your speeds, increase following distance, don’t drive impaired, and always buckle up! Additional patrols from the WSP will be conducted in Lewis, Cowlitz, Clark, and Skamania counties and will continue through Sunday, Aug. 18. Troopers will focus on dangerous driving behaviors, including speeding, racing, and impaired...

title: Crystal Palace must break transfer record to sign former Liverpool target as Guehi replacement
creator: CJ
content: The Eagles are on the lookout for a new centre-back with reports heavily Marc Guehi to Newcastle United following an excellent 2023/24 campaign and a strong showing for England at Euro 2024. Kossounou is another centre-back in high demand following his role in Leverkusen’s unbeaten domestic season, winning the Bundesliga and DFB-Pokal double while also reaching the Europa League final. The 24-time Ivory Coast international made 34 appearances across all competitions, averaging 1.34 interceptions, 1.14 aerial duels won and 6.57 recoveries per 90 minutes in league play. , Liverpool are big admirers of Kossounou and lodged an enquiry to Leverkusen about the 23-year-old earlier in the window. However, their interest seems to have cooled more recently. Crystal Palace now appear to be the most interested party in Kossounou and are thought to be emboldened by Leverkusen’s willingness to cash in this summer. However, according to German outlet Kicker (via ), it could take bids of €40-45m (£34.3m-£38.6m) to persuade to let their title winner go. The August 2016 move for Belgian striker Christian Benteke for £27m plus £5m in add-ons (per ) remains Crystal Palace’s record transfer to date, while the of midfielder Adam Wharton is their largest incoming transfer in the past 12 months.

title: Eşini öldürmek için tetikçi tutmuştu! Yağmur Sarnıç’la ilgili flaş gelişme
content: Milli futbolcu Emre Aşık'ın eski eşi Yağmur Sarnıç'ın, 4 yıl önce Aşık'ı öldürmeyi planladığı ortaya çıktı. İki tetikçi tutan ve mezar yeri ayarlayan Sarnıç, uzun süre yakalanamadı. Beşiktaş'ta polis tarafından fark edilen ve GBT kontrolünde "suçluyu kayırma" suçundan arandığı tespit edilen Sarnıç, gözaltına alınarak Beşiktaş Polis Merkezi'ne götürüldü. İşlemlerinin ardından adliyeye sevk edilen Sarnıç, mahkemece tutuklanarak cezaevine gönderildi. Emre Aşık'ı öldürme suçlamasıyla ilgili dava ise devam ediyor.

title: ¡Bienvenida a tu 'brat summer'! 10 looks para sumarte a la estética más rebelde de la temporada
Dos tercios de los votantes de EEUU creen que la situación en Oriente Medio es una "gran crisis"
content: El 89% de los consultados consideran la situación como una crisis, incluyendo al 66% que lo considera una crisis importante, indica el reporte. Sólo seis de cada 100 de los consultados no considera a la actual situación como una crisis en absoluto, añade. Los votantes estadounidenses también creen que el expresidente y candidato republicano a la presidencia, Donald Trump (2017-2021), es más hábil que su contraparte demócrata y actual vicepresidenta, Kamala Harris, para manejar la situación. Internacional Zelenski necesita entender que "la prioridad para EEUU siempre va a ser Israel" 3 de julio, 10:35 GMT La encuesta se realiza en medio del conflicto que mantienen Israel y la organización islámica palestina Hamás en la franja de Gaza, así como también en plena escalada de tensiones entre Israel e Irán. La encuesta consultó a 1.091 posibles votantes estadounidenses los días 7, 8 y 11 de agosto pasados y su margen de error es más, menos 3%, con un nivel de confianza del 95%. title: VERSES Announces NRI Transitions to GENIUSTM
content: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- VERSES AI Inc. (CBOE:VERS) (OTCQB:VRSSF) (“VERSES” or the “Company”), a cognitive computing company developing next-generation intelligent software systems, today announced that third party logistics company NRI USA, LLC (“NRI”) will be upgrading to the GENIUS Beta program. “NRI was an early adopter of our offerings and saw the vision of what our intelligent software can provide. Since we entered into a commercial agreement with them, our business model has evolved from an industry specific bespoke offering, to that of our current flagship platform offering, GENIUS. So naturally it makes sense to transition our relationship onto the GENIUS platform,” said Gabriel René, CEO of VERSES. “It was great utilizing the early capabilities of Wayfinder but we need more than just routing capabilities. The 3PL and supply chain industry is more complex than ever and at times very unpredictable. The ability to apply our vast amounts of data to GENIUS’ reasoning capabilities is extremely exciting for our business. This will be a foundational element for when the more advanced Genius capabilities are released in the future, ” said Pete McKenna, CEO of NRI. Due to the change of platform and the structure of the GENIUS offering, the existing SaaS contract dated August 25, 2021 is being voided by both parties and no further...

title: Hijo de Pepe Aguilar confiesa que trabaja de plomero: nunca le he pedido ni un centavo a mi papá
content: Gossip / miércoles 14 de agosto de 2024 Hijo de Pepe Aguilar confiesa que trabaja de plomero: nunca le he pedido ni un centavo a mi papá Emiliano Aguilar, el hijo mayor de Pepe Aguilar, reconoció que prefiere no recurrir a la ayuda de su padre y buscará su propio éxito Pepe Aguilar y Emiliano Aguilar. Fotos: Instagram: @pepeaguilar_oficial y @emiliano_aguilar.t Alma Hidalgo / El Sol de México La dinastía Aguilar ha enfrentado múltiples críticas en redes sociales , debido a que algunas personas aseguran que la familia está repleta de “ nepobabys ” , es decir que solo tienen éxito gracias a las conexiones que han construido sus antepasados. Pepe Aguilar fue el primero de la familia en recibir estas críticas , pues consideran que su talento no se compara con el de su padre , Antonio Aguilar, pero la fama del patriarca le permitió cosechar su éxito. Ángela Aguilar también ha recibido hate en redes sociales por ser “famosa” por su padre. Previniendo estos comentarios, Emiliano Aguilar, el hijo mayor de Pepe decidió alejarse de los medios y reveló que tiene un trabajo común. Gossip Pepe Aguilar confiesa que Ángela lloró por las críticas que recibía en redes sociales ¿Qué hace el hijo mayor de Pepe Aguilar? Emiliano Aguilar, el hijo mayor de Pepe Aguilar, reveló que en Estados Unidos se dedicó a desenterrar pipas, y trabajaba de plomero , carga que calificó...

title: Ideb 2023: Ceará tem avanços no ensino fundamental, mas desempenho no ensino médio fica abaixo da meta
content: Para o Ministro de Estado da Educação, Camilo Santana, o resultado do Ideb reforça a importância de o MEC seguir atuando junto aos estados e aos municípios para a superação das desigualdades educacionais. Rede pública estadual obteve 4,6, superando a média nacional (4,1) no Ensino Médio tradicional e Médio integrado à Educação Profissional — Foto: Divulgação/Governo do Ceará O Ceará conquistou o , considerando apenas a rede pública de ensino. Além disso, “Temos muito orgulho desses resultados do estado do Ceará. Sempre avançando, sempre melhorando, com a parceria do presidente Lula e do ministro Camilo Santana. Agradeço à secretária Eliana Estrela, todos os gestores escolares, professores, pais e alunos pelo empenho. Isso é um orgulho para nosso povo termos a qualidade do ensino que temos em nosso Ceará”, avaliou o governador Elmano de Freitas. O Indicador foi criado em 2007 e é divulgado a cada dois anos. Ele avalia o desempenho dos alunos principalmente em matemática, língua portuguesa, além do número de aprovados e reprovados. Eliana Estrela, secretária da Educação do Ceará, avalia que o Ceará tem avançado com as escolas de tempo integral: Eliana Estrela, secretária da Educação do Ceará, avalia resultado do Ideb 2023. title: Bristol Knights of Columbus ‘spirits, suds’ fest
creator: BRIAN M. JOHNSON @brianjohnsonBP
content: BRISTOL — The Knights of Columbus Palos Council 35 hopes to raise $10,000 for charitable causes at this year’s Beer & Wine Festival Aug. 23-24. The festival, now in its fourth year, will be held from 5 p.m. to 10 p.m. both days at the Church of Saint Anthony at 111 School St. It will feature more than a dozen local brewers and distillers offering samples. There will also be food trucks, a DJ, a cornhole tournament and lawn games. Read full story in the print or e-edition of The Press

title: Clima en Paraguay: el estado del tiempo para Asunción este 15 de agosto
creator: Infobae Noticias
content: Los pronósticos del tiempo, basados en la observación y modelos matemáticos , ayudan a prevenir el estado de la atmósfera en un momento y ubicación determinados a partir de diversas relaciones como la temperatura, la humedad, la presión, las precipitaciones o el viento . Los pronósticos del tiempo son ejercicios que se realizan desde hace cientos de años, incluso desde antes de la era cristiana apoyándose básicamente en la observación de patrones de las nubes, el viento, la época del año, aunque en un inicio éstos eran poco acertados . Fue hasta la llegada de nuevas tecnologías (como los ordenadores) que comenzaron a ponerse en marcha modelos matemáticos que permitieron lograr predicciones más acertadas, convirtiéndose en un factor fundamental para el transporte (vía terrestre, marítimo o aéreo), la agricultura, el turismo, la prevención de desastres, la salud pública y hasta operaciones militares , ello más allá de decidir si cargar o no con paraguas o qué outfit ponerse. A continuación el estado del clima de las próximas horas en Asunción para este jueves: El tiempo para este jueves en Asunción alcanzará los 31 grados, mientras que la temperatura mínima será de 19 grados. El pronóstico de los niveles de los rayos UV es de 5. En cuanto a la lluvia, la previsión de precipitaciones para dicha ciudad será del 0%, con una nubosidad del 0%,...

title: AI Is Transforming Travel: It’s Getting More Personal
creator: Timothy Papandreou, Contributor
content: Share to Facebook Share to Twitter Share to Linkedin AI is set to transform the entire travel industry from the customer journey to the support systems ... [+] and more. (Photo by Tayfun Coskun/Anadolu via Getty Images) Anadolu via Getty Images Artificial intelligence is already transforming the travel industry, from the initial spark of inspiration to the final homeward journey. Travel and tourism is a colossal economic engine generating trillions annually. AI, in all its multifaceted forms, is the catalyst propelling this transformation. From the moment a traveler begins their search to the instant they reclaim their luggage, AI is redefining expectations. A new generation of AI-powered chatbots is streamlining the booking process, handling everything from flight searches and hotel reservations to payment and baggage tracking. Moreover, the industry is embracing automation and robotics to optimize baggage handling and reduce delays. As technology advances, hyper-personalization will become the norm, tailoring every aspect of the travel experience to individual preferences and needs. However, this digital revolution is being overlaid on a legacy infrastructure that is often outdated and fragile. Systems like the venerable Sabre booking platform and the recent, industry-wide disruption caused by the CrowdStrike Windows update highlight the vulnerabilities within the travel...

title: सत्ताधाऱ्यांच्या स्थानिक स्वराज्य संस्थांवर 147 कोटींची खैरात, एका दिवसात रेकॉर्ड ब्रेक 93 जीआर जारी; नगरविकास विभागाची करामत
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: विधानसभा निवडणुकीची आचारसंहिता लागू होण्यापूर्वी राज्यातल्या विविध जिह्यांतल्या नगर पंचायत आणि नगर परिषदांवर स्वातंत्र्यदिनाच्या पूर्वसंध्येला तब्बल 147 कोटी 75 लाख 20 हजार 989 रुपयांची खैरात करण्यात आली आहे. यातील बहुतांश स्थानिक स्वराज्य संस्था या महायुतीचे मंत्री आणि सत्ताधारी आमदारांच्या मतदारसंघातील असल्याचे सांगण्यात येते. त्यासासाठी मुख्यमंत्र्यांच्या नगरविकास विभागाने एका दिवसात 93 जीआर (शासन निर्णय) जारी करून रेकॉर्ड ब्रेक केला आहे. स्वच्छ महाराष्ट्र योजनेअंतर्गत घनकचरा व्यवस्थापनासाठी विविध नगरपंचायत व नगरपरिषदांच्या निधीवाटपास या जीआरद्वारे मान्यता देण्यात आली. या योजनेतील केंद्र सरकारच्या हिश्श्यासोबतचा राज्याचा वाटा या स्थानिक स्वराज्य संस्थांना दिला आहे. मंगळवारच्या राज्य मंत्रिमंडळाच्या बैठकीत मिंधे सरकारने राज्यातल्या 105 नगरपंचायतींच्या नगराध्यक्ष पदाची मुदत अडीच वर्षांवरून पाच वर्षे केली आहे. त्याच्या दुसऱ्या दिवशी स्थानिक स्वराज्य संस्थांवर निधीची खैरात करण्यात आली आहे. जीआरचा हा तर ट्रेलर आहे अजून विधानसभा निवडणुकीच्या तारखाही जाहीर झालेल्या नाहीत; पण प्रत्यक्षात विधानसभा निवडणुकीची आचारसंहिता लागू होण्याच्या काही दिवस अगोदर सत्ताधाऱ्यांच्या मतदारसंघात विविध विकासकामांच्या नावाखाली निधीचा पाऊस पडण्याची शक्यता आहे. त्या कामांना मंजुरी देण्यासाठी यापेक्षा अधिक जीआर जारी होण्याची शक्यता नगरविकास विभागातील एका अधिकाऱ्याने व्यक्त केली.

title: Expresidente argentino Alberto Fernández es imputado por presuntas "lesiones graves" a su exesposa
Defensa Pública confirma hay crisis en cárceles dominicanas
creator: Redacción ALMOMENTO.net
content: Santo Domingo, 14 ago (Prensa Latina) En las cárceles de la República Dominicana predominan el hacinamiento, la falta de condiciones sanitarias e insuficiente atención médica, reveló hoy un informe de la Oficina Nacional de Defensa Pública (ONDF) El documento brinda una panorámica de la situación en los centros penitenciarios, donde en su mayoría se vulneran los derechos fundamentales de los reos, de acuerdo con la ONDF citada por Diario Libre. Refiere, además, la marcada diferencia entre unos presos y otros, pues tener dinero asegura una mejor celda, un colchón y comida decente. Acerca del hacinamiento de los recintos, a modo de ejemplo la ONDF citó el centro La Victoria con capacidad para dos mil 103 internos, y con una matrícula de siete mil 93 en 2023, cuando se elaboró el informe. Falta de comedores para los reclusos, negocios de comida improvisados, personas que duermen en el piso sin colchón, deficiente ventilación en celdas, ausencia de luz natural en algunos espacios y pocos medicamentos son algunos de los problemas más frecuentes citados. El resultado de la investigación, que evidencia la crisis en las cárceles dominicanas, apunta que hay 431 presos con VIH, el virus causante del Sida, casi mil 600 con hipertensión arterial, 726 con diabetes y 508 con enfermedades mentales, entre otras patologías. También hace referencia a la limitada oferta de...
