title: Kushinagar News: रक्षाबंधन को लेकर छह दिन तक बढ़े बसों के फेरे
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, कुशीनगर

title: Don’t Allow Zamfara Airport Project To Be Derailed, Ex-PDP Youth Leader Tells Gov Lawal
creator: Leadership News
content: Zamfara State governor, Dauda Lawal, has been advised to safeguard and complete the cargo airport project initiated by his predecessor, Dr. Bello Mohammed Matawalle. A former youth leader of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the state, Comrade Mubarak Shi’itu, gave the advice in a statement issued in Abuja on Tuesday. According to Shi’itu, the advice was imperative against the backdrop that certain aides close to Governor Lawal were against the airport project. Recall that the immediate-past governor of Zamfara State, Bello Matawalle, initially awarded the airport construction contract to AVIC International Engineering Limited for ₦11.4 billion. The government paid ₦3.5 billion (30% mobilization fee) to start work and an additional ₦2.3 billion (20% of the contract sum) due to the COVID-19 lockdown, totalling ₦5.8 billion paid for the project. However, Governor Lawal revoked and reviewed the contract with the project cost jumping to ₦62.8 billion. The former youth leader said it will be disastrous for a project considered as key to the promotion of trade and tourism in the state to be left half way and abandoned by the time this administration winds up at the end of its tenure. He noted that in view of the criticisms and outcries that have greeted the review of the project at a cost many alleged was grossly exaggerated, there was the need for the governor to guide the...

title: టీడీపీ ఖాతాలోకి ఒంగోలు కార్పొరేషన్‌
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: ఒంగోలు మున్సిపల్‌ కార్పొరేషన్‌ తెలుగుదేశం పార్టీ కైవసమైంది. గడిచిన ఐదేళ్లు వైసీపీలో అన్నీతామై కీలకంగా వ్యవహరించిన ఆ పార్టీ కార్పొరేటర్లు గట్టి షాక్‌ ఇచ్చారు. మాజీ మంత్రి బాలినేని శ్రీనివాసరెడ్డి అనుచరులుగా, ద్వితీయశ్రేణి నాయకులుగా చెలామణి అయిన మేయర్‌ గంగాడ సుజాత, డిప్యూటీ మేయర్‌ వేమూరి వెంకటసూర్యనారాయణ, పలువురు కార్పొరేటర్లు బుధవారం ఒంగోలు ఎమ్మెల్యే దామచర్ల జనార్దన్‌ సమక్షంలో తెలుగుదేశం పార్టీలో చేరారు. టంగుటూరు మండలంలోని జనార్దన్‌ స్వగ్రామమైన తూర్పునాయుడుపాలెంలో ఎమ్మెల్యే స్వగృహంలో బుధవారం ఈ చేరికల కార్యక్రమం నిర్వహించారు. ఒంగోలులో50 డివిజన్లు ఉండగా, మూడేళ్ల క్రితం జరిగిన కార్పొరేషన్‌ ఎన్నికల్లో టీడీపీ ఆరు స్థానాలకే పరిమితం కాగా, జనసేన తరఫున ఒకరు గెలిచారు. 43 మంది సభ్యులతో వైసీపీ ఏకపక్ష నిర్ణయాలతో కార్పొరేషన్‌ను ఇష్టారీతిన ఏలింది.కాగా, కార్పొరేషన్‌ను కైవసం చేసుకోవాలనే లక్ష్యంతో ఎమ్మెల్యే దామచర్ల వ్యూహాత్మకంగా పావులు కదిపారు. దీంతో మేయర్‌ గంగాడ సుజాత, డిప్యూటీ మేయర్‌ వేమూరి వెంకట సూర్యనారాయణతోపాటు మరో ఏడుగురు బుధవారం టీడీపీలో చేరారు. ఎన్నికలకు ముందు ఐదుగురు, ఇటీవల కాలంలో మరో ఏడుగురు వైసీపీ కార్పొరేటర్లు టీడీపీలో చేరారు. మొత్తం 19మంది వైసీపీ కార్పొరేటర్లు రావడంతో టీడీపీ బలం 26కు చేరింది. ఇద్దరు ఎమ్మెల్యేలు దామచర్ల, విజయకుమార్‌, ఎంపీ మాగుంట ఎక్స్‌అఫిషియో మెంబర్లుగా ఓటింగ్‌ ఉంది. దీంతో మొత్తం బలం 29గా ఉంది. అలాగే మరో ముగ్గురు వైసీపీ కార్పొరేటర్లు చేరేందుకు సిద్ధం ఉన్నట్లు సమాచారం.

title: Oscar Contender ‘Porcelain War,’ Documentary On Remarkable Artists In Wartime Ukraine, Acquired By Picturehouse
creator: Matthew Carey
content: Picturehouse has acquired North American rights to Porcelain War , winner of the Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary at the Sundance Film Festival . The film directed by Brendan Bellomo and Slava Leontyev will be released in theaters throughout North America in the fall, in advance of an expected Oscar run. “ Porcelain War is the story of three Ukrainian artists defiantly finding inspiration and beauty as they defend their culture and their country against Russian aggression,” notes a release. “In a war waged by professional soldiers against ordinary civilians, Slava Leontyev, Anya Stasenko, and Andrey Stefanov, choose to stay behind, armed with their art, their cameras and, for the first time in their lives, guns. As the war intensifies, Andrey picks up his camera to film their story, and on tiny porcelain figurines, Anya and Slava capture their idyllic past, uncertain present, and hope for the future.” Picturehouse CEO Bob Berney said in a statement, “The resiliency of art and artists is brought into sharp focus in this beautiful and terrifying documentary. The fascinating display of technique and success in both art and warfare is eloquently drawn by the filmmakers. Audiences will respond to their personal story and patriotism when life is turned upside down.” Following its triumphant bow at Sundance, Porcelain War has gone on to win best documentary awards at the Seattle...

title: Sepekan Lagi, Simak Jumlah Formasi CPNS 2024 Khusus Garut, Sumedang, dan Pangandaran
LA BIBLIOTECA: Ana Karenina, de León Tolstói
creator: yuris
content: En tiempos que parecen privilegiar las lecturas cortas, iniciar una novela monumental como , del ruso León Tolstói (1828-1910) puede resultar un esfuerzo titánico para no pocos. Y sin embargo, una vez superada la impresión de la gran cantidad de páginas, el texto seduce por su enjundia y su capacidad para recrear, con notable profundidad psicológica y decidido realismo, los conflictos internos y las emociones de un personaje complejo. Ana Karenina es una mujer marcada por sus pasiones y las presiones de la sociedad. Tolstói se ocupa de grandes temas (una y otra vez visitados por la literatura universal): el amor, la infidelidad, la familia y la ciertas nociones de la moralidad. Y al mismo tiempo ofrece una visión contundente de la sociedad rusa del siglo XIX, en la que las diferencias entre clases sociales y las tensiones entre tradición y modernidad abonan un entramado sentimental de por sí fértil. Tolstói es un estilista. Una y otra vez se ha reconocido su habilidad para describir con vuelo y precisión las veleidades del carácter. La novela no ofrece respuestas fáciles a los dilemas de los personajes, y esa circunstancia invita a los lectores a reflexionar a partir de sus propias creencias y valores. No en vano es un clásico de la literatura universal. Y su impacto cultural se renueva constantemente. En el teatro, el cine y la danza hay numerosas referencias,...

title: DE LA MÚSICA: Juan Carlos Baglietto, los éxitos continúan
creator: daynet
content: Ni ángel ni demonio solo un hombre que mira con los ojos de su corazón al mundo. Nacido en una ciudad portuaria con barcos que levantan blancas paredes en el mar, Juan Carlos Baglietto nunca pensó en ser marinero porque cuando aún era un crío rubio y travieso empezó a amar el sonido de los cascabeles o, tal vez, el del viento, transparencia huracanada. La música fue desde siempre su coordenada mágica, “algo que te atrapa como un imán misterioso”, me dice en una definición muy suya. -Soy de Rosario, a 300 kilómetros de Buenos Aires. A principios de siglo o tiempo después su puerto generó una mafia de la vendetta, con todo lo que esto arrastra; tuvo una historia bastante fuerte de la que solo quedan bares, pequeños cabarets, y de la que ya no existe aquel fulgor decadente, pero fulgor al fin, ahora es una ciudad húmeda a la cual quiero mucho. -A los cinco años. Empecé a estudiarla por aquello de que los padres trasmiten a los hijos sus frustraciones. Mi mamá amaba la guitarra y a ella me llevó, se lo agradezco. He tocado con muchos grupos de Rosario, donde me dieron pelota cuando triunfé en Buenos Aires, porque aquello de que nadie es profeta en su tierra se cumple. Baglietto me habla de su experiencia musical en el dúo con Raúl Giovanolli, la que tuvo con los rockeros del Irreal, y la posterior creación de su banda con gente muy talentosa como Zappo...

title: Continúa el asesinato de líderes
creator: yaima
content: El mundo vive en constante violencia, en los medios, en las redes, en las calles, al interior de nuestros hogares, en nuestros círculos. Parece lo de nunca acabar eso de imponer criterios, de disminuir al otro y quererlo borrar del mapa como si así pudieran eliminar las ideas incómodas. Es lo que sucede con tantos conflictos que ocurren en este momento, unos más mediáticos que otros, según la marea, es decir, la crítica popular, los intereses de las potencias, y más. Un asunto del que se habla, aunque no demasiado, es del asesinato de líderes en la región de América Latina. Se habla, sobre todo cuando ocurre un evento, cuando se realiza un acto, un llamado a la paz. Pero de tan frecuente, a veces los titulares pasan desapercibidos como “otro más”. Y, así, pasan los días de tragedia en tragedia, hasta que sacamos cuentas de la impresionante cantidad de personas ultimadas casi sin que se estudien a fondo los casos y se busque y castigue al culpable. ¿Por qué? Quizás porque no es conveniente. Esa es la única razón creíble para que veamos cómo la impunidad campea. Los esfuerzos no son suficientes. Lo confirman las estadísticas locales e internacionales sobre los sucesos de este tipo. Y los reportes indican que con mayor incidencia ocurren en Brasil, México y Colombia; sin descartar los picos registrados en otras naciones como Honduras, Haití y El Salvador....

title: Local golf: Owen, Little qualify for North Carolina Mid-Amateur
content: By Mike London mike.london@salisburypost.com CHINA GROVE — Chris Owen has the parking place at Warrior Golf Club that is reserved for the club champion, and he won the Rowan Masters at the course earlier this summer. With a qualifier being held for the North Carolina Mid-Amateur at Warrior on Wednesday, Owen felt the urge, almost an obligation, to sign up for the event. “I’d never tried to qualify for the Mid-Amateur, but with it being at Warrior, and with me playing pretty well lately, I figured why not,” Owen said. “(Warrior pro) Brian Lee helped talk me into it, and I got signed up, kind of a last-minute thing. Now I’m glad I did.” It was a tougher than usual day at Warrior for Owen and for most of the competition. He shot 2-over 73, not a brilliant day for him, but the cut line fell at 73, so Owen made it. “The greens were fast today and there were some tricky pin placements,” Owen said. “Some placements I haven’t ever seen before. I believe one guy shot 4-under, but that was the only low score. There were a lot of golfers around 73.” Owen rescued his round on No. 15, a 365-yard par 4 that may be the least forgiving hole on the course. Owen hit his worst tee shot of the day, then found a hazard for a stroke penalty. After a drop, Owen put his shot on the green, but he still had a 30-foot putt. He made that putt. “A 30-foot putt for a bogey, but that bogey saved the round,”...

title: Maharajganj News: हाथों में तिरंगा झंडा...जय हिंद के नारे से गूंजा शहर से गांव
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, महाराजगंज
content: महराजगंज। जिले में जगह-जगह तिरंगा यात्रा निकाली गई। शहर से लेकर गांव तक कार्यक्रम का आयोजन हुआ। भारत माता की जयघोष के साथ तिरंगा लेकर लोग निकल पड़े। पुलिस लाइन में हर घर तिरंगा अभियान के तहत तिरंगा मैराथन का आयोजन किया गया। युवा खिलाड़ियों ने तीन किमी तक तिरंगा के साथ दौड़कर एकता और सद्भावना का संदेश दिया। केंद्रीय वित्त राज्यमंत्री पंकज चौधरी ने गौनरिया बाबू से महराजगंज जिला पंचायत तक आयोजित तिरंगा यात्रा में हिस्सा लिया। रैली कलक्ट्रेट भवन से निकलकर महिला अस्पताल, उद्योग चौराहा होते हुए एसबीआई मुख्य शाखा पहुंचकर समाप्त हुई। इसके उपरांत रैली में शामिल लोगों ने एसबीआई मुख्य शाखा में विभाजन की विभीषिका पर आयोजित चित्र प्रदर्शनी का अवलोकन किया। रैली में आरसीटी की प्रशिक्षु महिलाएं, स्वयं सहायता समूह की महिलाएं और एसबीआई की महिला प्रशिक्षु शामिल रहीं। निचलौल प्रतिनिधि के अनुसार, तिरंगा यात्रा को ब्लॉक परिसर से खंड विकास अधिकारी शमा सिंह ने रवाना किया। स्कूली बच्चों ने हाथों में तिरंगा झंडा लेकर भारत माता की जय, जय जवान-जय किसान व वंदे मातरम के नारे लगाते हुए शहरवासियों को हर घर तिरंगा कार्यक्रम में शामिल होने के लिए प्रेरित किया। कार्यक्रम में सरकारी स्कूल बंजारी पट्टी गिरहिया, प्राथमिक विद्यालय निचलौल, मेट्रो कांवेंट स्कूल, चंद्र गुप्त मौर्य विज्ञान शिक्षण संस्थान के बच्चे शामिल रहे। परसामलिक प्रतिनिधि के अनुसार, कंपोजिट विद्यालय खैराटी में शासन के निर्देशानुसार बुधवार को हर घर तिरंगा कार्यक्रम आयोजित किया गया। प्रधानाध्यापक राघवेंद्र नाथ पांडेय ने बताया कि बच्चों ने देश भक्ति...

title: 5 ZODIAK HOKI Rezeki Spektakuler Hari Ini Kamis 15 Agustus 2024: Capricorn di Puncak Keberuntungan
Ser joven en este siglo XXI
creator: vladia
content: Marianita se quedó mirando al horizonte, como si escarbara entre sus 84 almanaques colgados entre nubes, y luego de un silencio más largo que lo esperado respondió a la reportera con la entonación de quien entrega toda una revelación: -Ya ni me acuerdo de qué cosa es ser joven, qué te voy a decir mi’ja. Uno de sus nietos, el que llaman en el barrio El Bichi, sí que no hizo esperar por su respuesta: -¡Ay tía, descárgame, pero no me quemes! Ando contra el tiempo. De todas formas, a la pregunta de qué es ser joven en este siglo XXI no puede responderse con una oración y, probablemente, tampoco con un voluminoso ensayo. Mucho menos el motivo de una efeméride, como este Día Internacional de la Juventud que hoy se celebra, podría conseguir una aproximación satisfactoria a ese tema. Pero valdría el intento si al menos sirve para que cada quien reflexione acerca de la juventud que le ha tocado y con la que hoy convive, cualquiera sea la edad que ahora tenga. La Inteligencia Artificial Generativa fue algo menos parca que los otros dos interrogados, pero tan abarcadora que resultó muy imprecisa: -En un mundo en constante cambio, ser joven hoy significa navegar por un mar de desafíos y oportunidades sin precedentes. La juventud actual se encuentra en la encrucijada de la tecnología, la globalización y la conciencia social, moldeando su identidad y su futuro de...

title: Bruno Fernandes "Mançester Yunayted"lə yeni müqavilə imzalayıb
content: Portuqaliyalı yarımmüdafiəçi Bruno Fernandes İngiltərənin "Mançester Yunayted" futbol klubu ilə yeni müqavilə imzalayıb. APA xəbər verir ki, bu barədə klubun mətbuat xidməti məlumat yayıb. Futbolçu ilə yeni müqavilə 2027-ci ilin iyun ayına qədər, daha bir mövsüm uzadılması variantı ilə nəzərdə tutulub. 29 yaşlı Fernandes "Mançester Yunayted"ə 2020-ci ilin yanvarında keçib. Ümumilikdə o, İngiltərə klubunda 234 oyun keçirib, 79 qol vurub və 67 məhsuldar ötürmə edib. "Mançester Yunayted" ilə Fernandes İngiltərə Kubokunu və Liqa Kubokunu qazanıb. Futbolçu əvvəllər Portuqaliyanın “Sportinq”, İtaliyanın “Udineze” və “Sampdoriya” klublarında çıxış edib.

title: ‘허니문 말고도 많아요’ 현지인처럼 장 보고 춤 추는 타히티 여행
creator: 매일경제
content: 허니무너들의 로망으로 꼽히는 남태평양 휴양지 타히티에는 에메랄드빛 해변과 해양 생물들 외에도 이색적인 즐길 거리가 풍부하다. 그중 한 가지를 꼽자면 타히티 현지인들의 소박하면서도 친근한 일상 속을 들여다보는 것이다. 하지만 타히티는 상대적으로 한국 여행객들에게 잘 알려지지 않은 지역이라 타히티에서 숙소를 벗어나 특색 있는 체험을 하기 힘든 게 현실이다. 타히티가 익숙하지 않은 여행객들도 편리하게 현지 일상과 문화 체험을 할 수 있는 두 가지 방법을 소개한다. 현지 셰프와 시장에서 장보고 요리하고 ​만약 타히티에 일요일에 머물 경우, 르 슐리(Le Sully) 레스토랑의 테레바 갈로팽 셰프를 찾아가 볼 것을 추천한다. 타히티를 대표하는 대규모 시장인 파페에테 시장은 매주 일요일마다 수산시장이 크게 열린다. 오직 일요일에만 볼 수 있는 광경인데, 갈로팽 셰프는 레스토랑 문을 닫는 일요일마다 여행객들과 함께 시장에서 장을 보고 그 재료들로 로컬 음식을 만들어 제공하는 프로그램을 진행 중이다. 여행객들에게 익숙하지 않은 로컬 재료들을 설명해주고 많은 가게들 중 맛있는 곳들을 추천해주며 셰프가 직접 이런 저런 식재료들을 구매하는 모습을 구경할 수 있다. 레스토랑에서 도보로 몇 분이면 파페에테 시장에 도착한다. 시장은 새벽 4시경 오픈하기 시작해 오후 전에 문을 닫는 경우가 일반적이다. 이른 새벽...

title: Deadline on August 23rd in Lawsuit for Investors who lost money with shares of FutureFuel Corp. (NYSE: FF)
creator: Shareholders Foundation, Inc.
content: Deadline on August 23rd in Lawsuit for Investors who lost money with shares of FutureFuel Corp. (NYSE: FF) 08-15-2024 12:29 AM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance Press release from: Shareholders Foundation, Inc. A Deadline is coming up on August 23, 2024 in the lawsuit for certain investors in FutureFuel Corp. (NYSE: FF). A deadline is coming up on August 23, 2024 in the lawsuit filed for certain investors of FutureFuel Corp. (NYSE: FF) over alleged securities laws violations by FutureFuel Corp. title: Cariñoso y amante de los toros, así es el joven desaparecido en Puntarenas
На юго-востоке Москвы реорганизуют 14 площадок по программе КРТ
creator: Елена Баталина
content: Инвесторы совместно с назначенными городом операторами реорганизуют 14 площадок по программе комплексного развития территорий (КРТ) на юго-востоке Москвы . Об этом в среду, 14 августа, сообщил заммэра столицы по вопросам градостроительной политики и строительства Владимир Ефимов. По его словам, ЮВАО входит в число лидеров по количеству реализуемых проектов КРТ. Уже ведется реорганизация 14 площадок, чья общая площадь составляет 212 га. Там возведут 5,4 млн кв. м недвижимости. Располагаются площадки на территориях бывших промзон «Серп и Молот», «Волгоградский проспект», «Южный порт», «Грайвороново», «Курьяново», «Выхино», а также на неэффективно используемых территориях, сообщает НСН . По итогам реализации проектов будет создано свыше 49 тыс. рабочих мест, пишет RT . Как рассказал глава столичного департамента городского имущества Максим Гаман, построят более 3,1 млн кв. м жилья, отмечает «Москва 24» . Также на участках возведут свыше 1,7 млн кв. м общественной-деловой недвижимости и более 504 тыс. кв. м современных производств, сообщает агентство городских новостей «Москва» . На сегодняшний день в столице на разных стадиях реализации ведется работа по 236 проектам КРТ. Их общая площадь составляет свыше 3,1 тыс. га, уточняет 360.ru . В июле мэр столицы Сергей Собянин рассказал об инвестициях в проекты КРТ . По его словам, инвестиции в проекты комплексного развития...

title: Is 19-Year-Old Connor Bedard Ready to Lead the Blackhawks as Captain?
creator: Tony Marchese, On Tap Sports Net
content: The Chicago Blackhawks stand at a pivotal crossroads as the 2024-25 NHL season approaches, with the captaincy vacant since Jonathan Toews' tenure ended following the 2022-23 season. The debate intensifies around Connor Bedard, the 19-year-old phenom, and his potential to lead as the team's youngest captain. While up until this point there hasn't been any official reports of Bedard being named, or being considered for the role of the team's next captain, there has been plenty of media attention given to the Blackhawks' vacant captaincy. NHL Network certainly got the conversation going among those longing for hockey to return with a post on X asking "Should the Blackhawks give Bedard the 'C' in year two?" Connor Bedard would be the youngest captain in NHL history if he's named ahead of this season. Should the @NHLBlackhawks give Bedard the "" in year two? pic.twitter.com/DjXFFJuwOc Connor Bedard's Rookie Season: A Glimpse of Leadership Potential Connor Bedard's debut season was nothing short of spectacular, boasting 22 goals and 39 assists . His remarkable performance won him the Calder Trophy as the NHL's Rookie of the Year , a testament to his skill and impact on the ice despite the Blackhawks finding themselves near the bottom of the NHL standings for the second straight season. However, the question looms: Does Bedard possess the maturity and leadership skills required to...

title: Brave little girl, eight, beats robber with a baseball bat in her dad's liquor store
content: Brave little girl, eight, beats robber with a baseball bat in her dad's liquor store The unidentified eight-year-old grabbed an aluminum bat at the liquor store She was seen whacking the suspect, Conchobhar Morrell, 37 By Melissa Koenig For Dailymail.Com Published: 18:22 EDT, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 18:29 EDT, 14 August 2024 e-mail 8 shares 94 View comments A brave young girl was filmed beating an armed robber with a baseball bat as she tried to defend her father - a manager at a liquor store. The unidentified eight-year-old immediately sprang into action and grabbed the aluminum bat at the Big Discount Liquors in Maplewood, Minnesota on Saturday night, while her father was working at the counter. She was seen whacking the suspect - who has since been identified as Conchobhar Morrell, 37, of St. Paul - while her father wrestled him on the ground. 'I'm so proud of her, she's so strong,' the girl's father, Leo, told CBS News , adding that he didn't realize his daughter was trying to help him until he saw the surveillance footage. 'When I saw the video, I didn't expect she'd do that. I expect[ed] a little girl crying, screaming.' A young girl was caught on surveillance footage beating a robber with a baseball bat at her father's liquor store The girl's father, Leo, said he was 'proud' of his little girl, as he showed off the aluminum bat she used He said he was preparing to...

title: How extreme heat is threatening education progress worldwide
creator: Somini Sengupta
content: The continued burning of fossil fuels is closing schools around the world for days, sometimes weeks at a time, and threatening to undermine one of the greatest global gains of recent decades: children’s education. It’s a glimpse into one of the starkest divides of climate change. Children today are living through many more abnormally hot days in their lifetimes than their grandparents, according to data released Wednesday by UNICEF, the United Nations Children’s Fund. Consider the scale of some recent school closures. Pakistan closed schools for half its students — 26 million children — for a full week in May, when temperatures were projected to soar to more than 40 degrees Celsius (104 Fahrenheit). Bangladesh shuttered schools for half its students during an April heat wave, affecting 33 million children. So too did South Sudan in April. The Philippines ordered school closures for two days, when heat reached what the country’s meteorological department called “danger” levels. Advertisement And in the United States, heat days prompted school closures or early dismissal in districts from Massachusetts to Colorado during the last school year. They still represent a small share of total school days, though one recent estimate suggests that the numbers are increasing quickly, from about three days a year a few years ago to double that number now, with many more expected by...

title: Посол открытым текстом: «Турция делает то, что не могут США»
content: «Я понимаю, что Турция не стремится извлечь выгоду из возможного конфликта между Израилем и Ираном, - отметил Джефф Флейк. – Считаю, что встреча с Аббасом в Анкаре была важным событием. Мы полностью поддерживаем развитие отношений с Республикой Палестина, так как они будут иметь большое значение в будущем». Посол США выразил поддержку политике Турции в Африке и в регионе в целом, подчеркнув, что Анкара способна вести переговоры с самыми разными группами стран. «Присутствие Турции в Сомали — это позитивное явление, - подчеркнул Джефф Флейк. - Блинкен и Фидан уже обсудили этот вопрос на своей встрече. Турция может внести значительный вклад в урегулирование конфликта в этом регионе. Китай традиционно предлагает инвестиции, которые приводят страны к долговой зависимости. Турция же предлагает альтернативный подход. Ее присутствие в Африке не связано с колониальным наследием, которое лежит на многих западных странах. В настоящее время Турция и Греция договорились о совместной работе. К примеру, вчера Греция отправила самолеты для тушения пожаров в Турции. Точно так же, если будет достигнуто мирное соглашение между Азербайджаном и Арменией и нормализуются отношения между Турцией и Арменией, этот процесс продвинется вперед. Конечно, в Конгрессе есть сторонники Греции, а также активные армянские группы. Однако отношение Конгресса постепенно меняется в пользу Турции....

title: 영주시, LA 한인축제 판촉행사용 농특산품 20t 수출
creator: 김진호 기자
content: [영주=뉴시스] 김진호 기자 = 경북 영주시는 '제51회 LA 한인축제' 판촉행사용 농특산품 20t을 수출했다고 15일 밝혔다. 전날 영주시 봉현면 영주일반산업단지 김정환홍삼본사에서 진행된 수출 선적식에는 10개 업체가 참여했다. 홍삼제품, 장류, 산양삼, 과실주스, 벌꿀, 쌀, 인견 등 29개 품목(한화 1억 4000만원 상당)이다. 이날 선적된 농특산품은 9월 26일부터 29일까지 4일간 미국 LA 코리아타운에서 개최되는 'LA 한인축제' 농특산물품 전시 부스에서 홍보·판매할 계획이다. 행사 후 남은 수량은 현지 바이어가 전량 구매하기로 합의했다. 권헌준 영주시수출기업협의회장은 "지난해에 이어 올해도 많은 업체에서 우수 품질 농특산품로 LA 한인축제 판촉행사에 참가한다"며 "이번 행사가 영주 농특산품 우수성을 알리고, 미국 시장의 지속적인 판로 확보의 계기가 되길 바란다"고 말했다. 박남서 영주시장은 "앞으로도 현지 한인회 및 수입·유통업체와 긴밀히 협력하는 마케팅을 추진해 해외 판로 확보는 물론 영주 농특산물 위상을 높일 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠다"고 밝혔다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Lucro da Brisanet recua 60%, no 2o tri, pressionado pela operação móvel
content: A Brisanet registrou lucro de R$ 17,3 milhões no segundo trimestre, uma redução de 60,6% em relação ao apresentado um ano antes. A piora no resultado final, segundo a companhia, se deu pelos custos e despesas associadas à operação móvel (4G e 5G), na qual parte dos custos de operação é fixa e será diluída com o aumento gradativo da base de clientes. Os custos com serviços prestados totais avançaram 30,3% em relação ao segundo trimestre de 2023, para R$ 206,4 milhões. Na mesma base de comparação, a receita líquida subiu 15%, para R$ 346,5 milhões. O resultado antes de juros, impostos, depreciação e amortização (Ebitda, na sigla em inglês) chegou a R$ 145,6 milhões, queda anual de 1,9%. Já a margem Ebitda caiu de 49% para 42%. As despesas operacionais somaram R$ 94 milhões entre abril e junho, um avanço de 27% no ano. A Brisanet teve uma adição de 36,6 mil clientes, atendendo, assim, a 1,36 milhão de clientes com banda larga fixa. No segmento móvel, as adições foram de 73,2 mil clientes, alcançando 128,4 mil clientes na base ao final de junho de 2024. No segundo trimestre, também foram adicionadas 21 mil casas passadas. A empresa reduziu suas projeções para 2024, divulgadas originalmente no início do ano, e passa a estimar uma cobertura de internet 4G e 5G para mais de 230 municípios até o fim do ano, oferecendo seus serviços a uma...

title: Buka Minggu Ketiga Agustus, Ini 5 Syarat Resmi CPNS 2024 Lengkap Formasi dan Prediksi Jadwal
Matthew Stafford exits productive Rams practice vs. Cowboys with tight hamstring
content: OXNARD, Calif. — Los Angeles Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford played in multiple 11-on-11 periods against the Dallas Cowboys at Wednesday’s joint practice before exiting about halfway through the day. A team spokesman said that Stafford was feeling some tightness in his hamstring and that pulling him was a precautionary measure. Advertisement I stayed on the Rams’ offensive field for the entire practice (after spending last week’s joint practice with the defense ). Especially with Stafford running the first team, but even when backup Jimmy Garoppolo took over for him, the Rams moved the ball down the field in what ultimately was a productive day for the group. The Cowboys have more lenient rules for credentialed media than the Rams do in that the practice is fully open to film and therefore more details can be shared (usually I would not be able to share specifics about play-by-play, position rotations, etc., during team periods). Here are my notable takeaways and plays: • Receiver Puka Nacua is still not practicing as he recovers from a knee injury, but he was present with the team Wednesday. In Nacua’s place, the Rams are so far trying out a rotation between veteran receiver Tyler Johnson and rookie Jordan Whittington . The opening series featured Colby Parkinson at tight end, Cooper Kupp , Demarcus Robinson and Johnson at receiver and Kyren Williams at running back....

title: Kaza sonrası silahlar çekildi
content: Bağlar ilçesi Öğretmenler Caddesi’nde dün akşam saatlerinde sürücüsünün ismi öğrenilemeyen içerisinde 3 kişinin olduğu otomobil, yolun karşısına geçmeye çalışan 2 kişiye çarptı. Kazadan sonra yaralanan yayaların yakınları sürücüye tepki gösterdi. Taraflar arasında çıkan tartışma sırasında yaralı yakınları, sürücü ve otomobilde bulunan 2 kişiye tabanca ve taşla saldırdı. Yaşanan olayda otomobildeki 2 kişi tabancayla yaralandı. Çevredekilerin ihbarıyla bölgeye polis ve sağlık ekipleri sevk edildi. Polis, silahlı kavgayı sonlandırırken, olayda 2’si otomobilin çarpması, 2’si de tabancayla olmak üzere yaralanan 4 kişi, sağlık görevlilerinin ilk müdahalesinin ardından çevredeki özel hastaneye kaldırıldı. Olay yerinde inceleme yapan ekipler çok sayıda kovan ele geçirdi. Tabancadan ateşlenen kurşunlar, bir otomobil ile bazı işyerlerine ne isabet ederek maddi zarara da neden oldu.

title: Gobierno acordó una nueva recomposición salarial con el sector docente
creator: María Rocío Figueroa
content: El Gobierno de la Provincia acordó una nueva recomposición salarial con el Sindicato Unificado de Trabajadores de la Educación Fueguina (SUTEF), que este miércoles aceptó la propuesta presentada en el marco de las negociaciones paritarias que se mantienen a través del equipo del Ministerio de Economía. A partir de este nuevo acuerdo se establece para el mes de agosto incrementar el valor índice un 7,5%, (respecto del mes de julio); reescalafonar un 4,2% los cargos del escalafón docente e incrementar el ítem adicional ‘Transformación Educativa’ de un 25% a 100% del básico. De esta manera, el salario de un docente ingresante, con antigüedad mínima, alcanzará los $680.811,34. Para los docentes de turno completo se garantiza que el salario final remunerativo sea el doble del cargo turno simple. Para el mes de septiembre, la propuesta del Ejecutivo establece incrementar el valor índice un 5% (respecto del mes de agosto); incrementar el ítem Adicional Transformación Educativa de un 100% a un 123%, elevar el ítem ‘Refuerzo Material Didáctico’ a $71.300 y mantener el Fondo Provincial de Incentivo Docente (FOID) en $28.700. El salario de un docente con el mínimo de antigüedad /a maestro/a que recién inicia, con el mínimo de antigüedad, será de $750.987,27. Por último, para el mes de octubre, el acuerdo establece una cláusula de garantía de un incremento del...

title: VIA’s CEO forum set for Aug. 23
content: The Valley Industry Association is set to host a CEO forum at the Hyatt Regency Valencia on Aug. 23 from 8:30 to 11 a.m. VIA invites business leaders to attend the forum to collaborate on new ideas and support the valley’s top executives. The goal of VIA’s CEO forums is to have decision makers collaborate to identify common business and community issues and develop solutions to boost success. This year’s forum will feature the topics of how to effectively navigate rising costs, artificial intelligence and technology, and workforce development. Tamara Gurney, president, CEO and director of Mission Valley Bancorp and Bank, is this year’s opening speaker. Tickets are $50 for VIA members and $60 for non-members. The last day to purchase tickets is Friday. To purchase tickets, visit the online event site at www.via.org/ceo-forum. The Hyatt Regency Valencia is located at 24500 Town Center Drive.

title: Ở một huyện của Quảng Nam có 2 ngôi mộ cổ đã 600 năm, mộ người cháu hoành tráng, mộ ông cố hiu hắt
content: Tại hai làng Đồng Tràm (nay thuộc xã Hương An) và Hương Quế (nay thuộc xã Quế Phú), huyện Quế Sơn, tỉnh Quảng Nam có hai ngôi mộ cổ. Hai mộ cổ này có niên đại cách đây khoảng 600 năm và được chôn cách nhau 69 năm, thuộc gia tộc họ Phạm. Hai ngôi mộ cổ với hai số phận khác nhau.

title: 健康網》適量燕麥降膽固醇 營養師示警「1族群」注意
content: 營養師表示,燕麥屬澱粉,澱粉容易使三酸甘油脂變高,建議三酸甘油脂較高者,要注意燕麥食用量;示意圖。(圖取自freepik) 葉立斌/核稿編輯 〔健康頻道/綜合報導〕燕麥是許多人早餐首選之一,吃完不僅有飽足感,還聽說能讓膽固醇下降?營養師邱世昕表示,燕麥確實有降低膽固醇效果,但也要看搭配食物種類,才不會出現越吃膽固醇越高的問題,想要降低膽固醇,應該是要將燕麥取代紅肉等才有效果。另外,也提醒,燕麥屬澱粉,澱粉容易使三酸甘油脂變高,建議三酸甘油脂較高者,要注意燕麥食用量。 邱世昕在臉書粉專「 營養師教練 世昕 」發影片分享,讀者詢問「為什麼爸媽吃燕麥後,膽固醇越來越高」;對此,他回覆,通常吃燕麥後,膽固醇應該會下降才對,因此進一步詢問早餐餐點,才發現原來讀者父母習慣吃培根蛋吐司,再搭配燕麥,那當然沒有用。想要降低膽固醇,應該是要將燕麥取代紅肉等,容易使膽固醇增加的食物,這樣才有效果。 請繼續往下閱讀... 邱世昕強調,燕麥確實有降低膽固醇效果,但也要看原先吃的食物種類,才不會出現越吃膽固醇越高的問題。另外,若為三酸甘油脂較高者,也要注意燕麥食用量,因為燕麥屬澱粉,澱粉容易使三酸甘油脂變高,建議留意飯、麵、冬粉、麵包等澱粉食物的食用份量。 許多人也會透過燕麥片減肥;對此, 國健署 提醒,只依賴燕麥片減肥,容易導致飲食失衡,且燕麥是全穀根莖類,攝取過多也會容易肥胖,建議別過量,謹記飲食均衡原則,才不會減肥不成反傷身。 國健署 補充,6大類食物提供人體不同必需營養素,缺一不可,也為國人制定每日飲食指南,建議每天早晚喝1杯奶、每餐水果拳頭大、菜比水果多一點、飯跟蔬菜一樣多、豆蛋魚肉1掌心、堅果種子1茶匙,讓身體更健康。 ☆健康新聞不漏接,按讚追蹤 粉絲頁 。 ☆更多重要醫藥新聞訊息,請上 自由健康網 。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Organizers hope Stockton's Ducky Derby will raise money for worthwhile cause
content: Rubber ducks are about to take over Stockton. The Ducky Derby returns for its tenth year, this time to the Lincoln Center. You can join the fun at the Lincoln Center's Summerfest Family Fun Night. The fundraiser benefits the Child Abuse Prevention Council. Organizers said this year's event promises to be bigger and better than ever, featuring a new venue and exciting new activities. It's taking place on Aug. 16 at the Lincoln Center at 374 Lincoln Center in Stockton. The event is from 6-9 p.m. Shauna Jacob and Erica Villareal with the Child Abuse Prevention Council spoke with KCRA 3 about how you can join the fun and support this great cause. "Previous years what we have done for our Ducky Derby is actually dumped thousands of little ducks in the river and then they kind of scoot along and we have a winner. This year, our ducks are going to be airborne so we have a big blow globe that we will be putting all our little ducks in, and they will be blowing this year to get our winners in our derby," said Shauna Jacob.

title: "남자는 당겨VS부드러워야" 데니안VS에녹, 살사 댄스 클럽서 '팽팽' 기싸움 ('신랑수업') [어저께TV]
BCRP: términos de intercambio crecieron 14,8% interanual en junio de 2024
content: De acuerdo al Banco Central de Reserva del Perú (BCRP) informó que los términos de intercambio, indicador que muestra la relación entre los precios de las exportaciones y los de las importaciones, aumentaron 14,8% en junio frente al mismo mes de 2023, la mayor tasa de crecimiento desde junio de 2021. Asimismo, el BCRP indicó que este avance estuvo favorecido por la subida de los precios de exportación en 14,4% y la caída de los precios de importación en 0,4%. Por su parte, los precios de exportación mejoraron, principalmente por los precios del zinc (38,5%), de los productos agropecuarios no tradicionales (29%), del oro (19,9%) y del cobre (11%) . Mientras que la caída de los precios de importación se debió a los menores precios de insumos industriales y de alimentos destinados como insumos . Respecto al mes de mayo, los términos de intercambio aumentaron 2,8%. Los precios de las exportaciones crecieron 1,7%, principalmente por los mayores precios de zinc, café y cobre. Los precios de las importaciones cayeron 1,0%, principalmente por los menores precios del petróleo y sus derivados.

title: Na Wall Street dalszy wzrost indeksów
content: Publikacja w środę danych o inflacji cen detalicznych w lipcu nie wywołała tak jednoznacznie pozytywnej reakcji na amerykańskich rynkach akcji jak dane o inflacji cen hurtowych dzień wcześniej. W pierwszej godzinie handlu inicjatywę miała podaż. Dopiero potem indeksy ruszyły w górę. Wskazywano, że choć raport był zgodny z oczekiwaniami, to niektóre jego części, m.in. dotyczące kosztów zakwaterowania i cen żywności nie budziły optymizmu. W ocenie analityków niepewność dotyczy teraz tylko skali obniżki we wrześniu. Widać było to po pierwszej reakcji rynku obligacji na dane. Rentowność obligacji 2-letnich USA mocno poszła w górę i na chwilę przekroczyła 4 proc. Tłumaczono to malejącą nadzieją na cięcie o 50 pkt bazowych, którą obudziły słabe dane makro z początku sierpnia. CME FedWatch Tool pokazał w środę, że rynek widzi obecnie tylko 35 proc. prawdopodobieństwo obniżki stóp we wrześniu o pół punktu procentowego. We wtorek było to 53 proc., a tydzień temu prawie 70 proc. Niektórzy analitycy wskazują, że szef Fed, Jerome Powell wykorzysta w przyszłym tygodniu konferencję w Jackson Hole do potwierdzenia rozpoczęcia luzowania polityki pieniężnej we wrześniu, a o skali cięcia stóp przesądzą dane dotyczące rynku pracy publikowane przed wrześniowym posiedzeniem w sprawie stóp. Na zamknięciu rosły kursy 60 proc. spółek z...

title: Join Hundreds of People for a Night Bike Ride around the Seawall this September
creator: Sponsored Content
content: 1 of 1 2 of 1 (This story is sponsored by HUB Cycling ) What’s better than live music, glow in the dark decorations, and a party on bikes at night? After a five-year hiatus brought on by the pandemic, HUB Cycling’s popular and family-friendly event, Bike the Night , is returning to Vancouver on Saturday (September 14)! Bike the Night is set to be Vancouver’s largest organized night bike ride in 2024. Hundreds of people are expected to join the bike ride along the iconic Vancouver Seawall and raise funds for HUB Cycling’s advocacy work. When the event ran in 2018 and 2019, it was a hit among local Vancouverites with rave reviews like: “Seeing all the different types of people cycling together was invigorating, folding bikes, recumbent trikes, trailers with kids and dogs, lights, flags, and all styles of helmets. Proves anyone can ride. People of all shapes & sizes, all walks of life,” said one participant. Another participant boasted that, “My wife and I haven’t done as much biking since we’ve had kids, primarily due to the lack of biking infrastructure and the safety of our kids. Bike the Night was a great, safe and controlled biking experience for our family. It was a magical night for us. Thank you.” This year’s Bike the Night will kick off with a pre-ride festival at David Lam Park featuring placemaking activations from community partners, including: live music, food...

title: Alcalde Daza informó que se harán estudios para que Línea 3 del Metro de Lima llegue hasta Ancón
creator: Redacción Gestión
content: redacciongestion@diariogestion.com.pe El alcalde de Ancón, Samuel Daza , sostuvo una reunión con la presidenta de la República, Dina Boluarte, para exponer los diversos problemas que aqueja a su distrito como: transporte, seguridad ciudadana, y el rescate financiero, que es necesario para superar la crisis económica que aqueja a la Municipalidad Distrital de Ancón . “La reunión ha sido muy fructífera y productiva, agradezco a la presidenta Dina Boluarte , quien de manera articulada con el Ministerio de Transportes y la ATU, se ha comprometido a iniciar los estudios de factibilidad para que la Línea 3 del Metro de Lima o su Ramal llegue hasta Ancón”, apuntó. De esta manera, los mas de 3 Millones de vecinos de Lima Norte y especialmente de Ancón, llegaremos más rápido al centro de la ciudad, señaló el burgomaestre a su salida del Palacio de Gobierno. En la reunión participaron el ministro de Transportes y Comunicaciones, Raúl Pérez Reyes, representantes de la ATU y el Ejecutivo. Otro punto de agenda que se trató fue el de la inseguridad ciudadana en Ancón, debido a los últimos casos de asesinatos sucedidos la última semana en el distrito y que requiere una atención importante por parte del ejecutivo. “Un proyecto tan importante como el próximo Parque Industrial de Ancón, debe responder a las expectativas de seguridad ciudadana. Nos corremos el riesgo que...

title: Familia anuncia nuevo adelanto del PAN
content: El Departamento de la Familia (DF) anunció hoy, miércoles, un nuevo adelanto de los beneficios del Programa PAN, disponibles para mañana, jueves, y el viernes, 16 de agosto de 2024. Las familias cuyo número de seguro social del encargado finaliza en 7 y 8 tendrán los recursos disponibles a partir de mañana jueves, 15 de agosto 2024, y los que finalizan con el dígito 9 de seguro social, lo reciben a partir del viernes, 16 de agosto de 2024. PUBLICIDAD “Reconociendo los retos que eventos como estos generan en la ciudadanía y buscando que cada familia que recibe los servicios del PAN pueda asegurar su alimentación, hemos decidido realizar esta reprogramación. Esto implica que para este viernes se habrán adelantado los beneficios a todas las familias participantes del PAN”, explicó la secretaria del DF, Ciení Rodríguez Troche. Mientras, el administrador de la Administración de Desarrollo Socioeconómico de la Familias (ADSEF), Alberto Fradera, recordó a las familias que “pueden acceder a la plataforma EBTContigo para verificar sus balances y la disponibilidad de beneficios, así como llamar al número que está al dorso de su Tarjeta de la Familia. No tienen que realizar ningún otro trámite para recibir el adelanto de beneficios”. Asimismo, se informó que las citas del programa PAN programadas para mañana jueves, 15 de agosto 2024 serán reprogramadas en el...

title: Vuelve a nuestro mar: WSL confirma nueva fecha QS en el Perú
content: Sonríe el surf: la WSL (World Surf League), ha confirmado que mantendrá el torneo Señoritas Open Pro, evento de nivel QS1.000 y JQS1.000 combinando mujeres y hombres en Perú, es por eso, que habrán nuevas fechas para el próximo año. Las fechas aún no están confirmadas, sin embargo, se llevaría a cabo en el verano peruano. Cabe resaltar, por otro lado, que en febrero de este año se realizó el Billabong Señoritas Open Pro en Punta Hermosa, donde el peruano Alonso Correa se coronó campeón en la categoría Open QS masculino, venciendo a su compatriota Cristóbal De Col. Por otro lado, en la categoría Open QS femenina, la peruana Daniella Rosas se consagró en el primer lugar tras vencer a Sol Aguirre. En la categoría Pro Juniors femenina, la peruana Arena Rodríguez se convirtió en la campeona juvenil del evento, tras vencer a su compatriota Kalea Gervasi, mientras que en el masculino Pro Junior se lo llevó el brasileño Rodrigo Saldanha tras derrotar a su connacional Guilherme Ferreira. Cabe resaltar que Perú será sede del Punta Rocas Open Pro en noviembre de este año. Este evento, que forma parte de la World Surf League (WSL), contempla competencias en tres (3) categorías: Open QS1000, Longboard y Juniors, tanto para hombres como para mujeres. ¿Qué es la WSL? La World Surf League es el organismo rector de los surfistas profesionales y se dedica a mostrar...

title: Siap-siap CPNS 2024 Dibuka Bulan Ini, Simak Jadwal Lengkap dari BKN
శ్రీవారి పవిత్రోత్సవాలకు అంకురార్పణ
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: తిరుమల శ్రీవారి ఆలయంలో పవిత్రోత్సవాలకు బుధవారం రాత్రి అంకురార్పణ జరిగింది. ఇందులో భాగంగా ఉదయం శ్రీవారి మూలవిరాట్టు వద్ద ఆచార్య ఋత్విక్‌వరణం నిర్వహించారు. సాయంత్రం శ్రీవారి సర్వసైన్యాధిపతి విష్వక్సేనుడిని మాడవీధుల్లో ఊరేగింపుగా వసంతమండపానికి తీసుకొచ్చాక మృత్సంగ్రహణం, ఆస్థానం నిర్వహించారు. తర్వాత పవిత్ర మండపంలో అంకురార్పణకు సంబంధించిన వైదిక కార్యక్రమాలు చేపట్టారు. టీటీడీ అదనపు ఈవో వెంకయ్య చౌదరి, ఇతర అధికారులు, అర్చకులు పాల్గొన్నారు. అంకురార్పణ కారణంగా బుధవారం సాయంత్రం సహస్రదీపాలంకార సేవను రద్దు చేశారు. గురువారం నుంచి మూడురోజుల పాటు పవిత్రోత్సవాలు జరుగనున్నాయి. తొలిరోజు ఉదయం ఆలయంలో పవిత్ర ప్రతిష్ఠ జరగనుంది.

title: Intuit Dome to offer free shuttle for events starting opening night Aug. 15
content: The Intuit Dome officially opens Thursday, and those attending the first nights’ events there, and thereafter, will be able to get free rides to the venue from around the region. The venue will offer a complimentary park-and-ride shuttle service for all concerts, shows and events starting Aug. 15 and 16, when Bruno Mars will perform back-to-back nights for the stadium’s grand opening. Shuttles will take fans to and from the Intuit Dome from five locations around Los Angeles County: The Intuit Dome Mobility Hub, where the shuttles will drop off, is on the first level of the venue’s east garage. Ticketed fans can reserve shuttle rides using the “LA Clippers + Intuit Dome” smartphone app, or at book.intuitdome.rideco.com Shuttles will leave the park-and-ride lots within two hours before doors open for respective events, through the event start time. After the event, the shuttles will depart from the mobility hub at different scheduled times, found in the app. After parking at a shuttle lot, look for the orange ‘Intuit Dome Park & Ride Shuttle’ signs. Directions are also provided in booking confirmation emails and in the Intuit Dome app.

title: Rio Ferdinand hails Jude Bellingham as a 'class apart' after his 'magnificent' performance in Real Madrid's UEFA Super Cup win over Atalanta
content: Rio Ferdinand hails Jude Bellingham as a 'class apart' after his 'magnificent' performance in Real Madrid's UEFA Super Cup win over Atalanta Bellingham produced a stunning display in Real Madrid's 2-0 win over Atalanta He assisted Kylian Mbappe's first goal for Real Madrid on the Frenchman's debut Get breaking Premier League news straight to your phone on Mail Sport's new WhatsApp channel By Kieran Lynch Published: 23:20, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 23:28, 14 August 2024 e-mail 7 View comments Rio Ferdinand has hailed Jude Bellingham after his 'magnificent' performance in Real Madrid's UEFA Super Cup win over Atalanta. Speaking on TNT Sports, Ferdinand was full of praise for Bellingham who produced a well-rounded display in his first game of the season. The Manchester United legend said: 'Jude Bellingham is a class apart. title: SPORTITALIA - Napoli, Natan saluta: cronaca di un fallimento annunciato
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Il difensore Natan sembra destinato a lasciare il Napoli . Il brasiliano, a meno di clamorose sorprese, approderà al Betis Siviglia . Il sito di SportItalia scrive a tal riguardo: "Il Napoli saluta Natan. Dopo un solo anno di permanenza il difensore brasiliano sta lasciando la maglia azzurra per approdare al Betis Siviglia. Natan non è mai riuscito ad affermarsi nella realtà napoletano. Pur non sfigurando e con prestazioni sulla soglia della sufficienza, il brasiliano non è mai sembrato in grado di inserirsi in un ambiente a tratti “tossico” come quello che si era creato nel club". "Tra difficoltà e cambi di allenatore, la differenza tra il brasiliano e l’ex difensore coreano del Napoli si è quasi accentuata. Troppo poco talento, troppa inesperienza nel calcio europeo, troppa poca personalità per prendere il posto di un “sergente di ferro” come Kim. Natan a Napoli, però, è solo la vittima di un’annata nata storta. A cominciare dalla scelta di un allenatore inadatto alla piazza, ma anche oramai alla Serie A. E, infatti un anno dopo aver sottolineato i dubbi sul suo acquisto, siamo qua a commentare il suo addio in direzione Betis Siviglia" , conclude il portale.

title: Atalanta, Gasperini: "Persa una bella opportunità, ci manca sempre una virgola"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Il Real Madrid , come da pronostico, ha superato l' Atalanta con un secco 2-0 finale nella gara valevole per la Supercoppa Europea . Ma la DEA non ha demeritato, soprattutto nel primo tempo. Ne ha parlato il tecnico Gian Piero Gasperini in conferenza stampa: "Ero abbastanza fiducioso che potessimo fare una buona gara e mettere in difficoltà il Real Madrid. La partita è cambiata dopo il loro gol, soprattutto il secondo che era evitabile: eravamo partiti bene, con un'occasione molto importante di Lookman e la parata di Courtois su Pasalic". "Queste partite sono complicate da affrontare quando devi rimontare perché se attacchi alla ricerca del pareggio rischi di esporti troppo alle ripartenze avversarie. Abbiamo perso una bella opportunità e questo mi dispiace molto, perché ci sono state occasioni per andare in vantaggio. Bisogna essere più cinici. Sono molto orgoglioso, ma ci manca sempre una virgola: a Dublino l'abbiamo messa e oggi avremmo potuto rimetterla. Mi dispiace per i ragazzi perché era un'occasione rarissima", ha aggiunto Gasperini.

title: Real, Ancelotti: "Giocare contro l'Atalanta è come andare dal dentista"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Il Real Madrid ha conquistato la Supercoppa Europea superando l' Atalanta con il punteggio finale di 2-0. Il tecnico dei Blancos, Carlo Ancelotti , ha analizzato quanto è accaduto nel corso di una intervista ai microfoni della redazione sportiva di SKY: "Sono onorato di allenare questa squadra, è un grande privilegio per me. Credo sia stata una bella partita, l'Atalanta ci ha fatto soffrire nel primo tempo, dopo quando è calata la pressione abbiamo trovato più spazi e i nostri attaccanti sono molto forti". "A Gian Piero Gasperini ho detto che giocare contro l'Atalanta è come andare dal dentista, i nostri giocatori erano un po' nervosi alla fine del primo tempo perché non riuscivano a fare quello che volevano, gli ho detto di essere pazienti perché questa è una squadra molto organizzata. Agli attaccanti ho chiesto maggiore mobilità, l'importante è occupare bene le posizione e aiutare la squadra a recuperare palla e lo hanno fatto. L'Atalanta ha giocato una ottima partita e ci ha fatto soffrire" , ha concluso Carlo Ancelotti.

title: PRIMA PAGINA IL MATTINO - Il Chelsea chiama Osi: vieni da noi. Via allo scambio con Lukaku
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: L'edizione odierna del quotidiano Il Mattino , in prima pagina, tratta l'argomento calciomercato. A tenere banco è sempre la questione attaccante con l'approdo di Romelu Lukaku alla corte di Antonio Conte e il trasferimento di Victor Osimhen al Chelsea. "Il Chelsea chiama Osi: vieni da noi. Via allo scambio con Lukaku" , si legge sul principale quotidiano della città.

title: Bathroom fans and sliding glass may be letting cold air into your home
creator: Daniel Miles
content: In short: New CSIRO research has found new homes and apartments are up to 50 per cent more airtight than those tested in 2015. Poor air tightness can cause draughts and increase energy bills by up to 20 per cent. What's next? The research has provided five recommendations for Australia's building code to address common issues. Australia has some of the least airtight homes in the world, and early mornings in old houses during winter can be particularly cruel. Perhaps the heater takes too long to get going or the kettle takes that second too long to bring you a cup of warm relief. For people living in newly built homes, it is not as much of a concern. New research from the CSIRO shows new homes are up to 50 per cent more airtight than those tested in 2015. However, older houses continue to cost Australians warmth and money. "The single biggest cost we have is running our heating and cooling systems," CSIRO senior experimental scientist CSIRO Michael Ambrose said. "Airtightness is directly related to that." Mr Ambrose told that a well-sealed house could halve the money spent on energy bills. "Heating and cooling costs are about 40 per cent of your total energy bill, and fixing leaks can reduce that by 20 per cent," he said. What the research shows In the most recent study, the CSIRO looked at 233 apartments and detached houses built across Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Brisbane...

title: ADL: "Buon Ferragosto a tutti i tifosi. E anche a Conte, al suo staff, ai nostri calciatori e collaboratori"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: L'atmosfera in casa Napoli , a pochi giorni dall'inizio del campionato, è serena. Nonostante le difficoltà incontrate dalla società azzurra sul mercato, i rapporti tra Aurelio De Laurentiis e Antonio Conte sono sereni. La speranza del tecnico è che la società azzurra gli possa mettere a disposizione un organico competitivo per centrare gli importanti obiettivi prefissati dal club (quello minimo è la qualificazione alla prossima edizione della Champions League, ndr). Oggi è Ferragosto e il presidente del Napoli, Aurelio De Laurentiis, fa gli auguri su X : "Buon Ferragosto a tutti i tifosi del Napoli, in Italia e nel mondo, e alle loro famiglie. E buon Ferragosto anche a Conte, al suo staff, ai nostri calciatori e a tutti i collaboratori del Calcio Napoli, della Filmauro e alle loro famiglie". Il patron si augura che Antonio Conte e i suoi ragazzi possano cominciare con il piede giusto la stagione, magari vincendo la prima gara di campionato degli azzurri, quella in trasferta contro l'Hellas Verona.

title: Suspeito de roubos em transporte coletivo é preso em Sumaré
creator: Felipe Machado
content: Uma ação da equipe da Polícia Rodoviária resultou na prisão de um indivíduo suspeito de realizar diversos roubos em ônibus que operam na linha Sumaré a Campinas, na tarde desta quarta-feira (14). Durante o patrulhamento, os agentes receberam informações sobre a presença do criminoso no transporte coletivo, intensificando as buscas na região. A equipe se preparou para efetuar a abordagem ao avistar o ônibus. No entanto, o suspeito desembarcou correndo ao perceber a presença do policial. Mesmo assim, os agentes conseguiram realizar a abordagem e realizar uma busca pessoal do suspeito, mas nada ilícito foi encontrado em sua posse. Após a operação e levantamento de informações, as vítimas dos roubos foram localizadas e reconheceram o criminoso. Elas relataram que as abordagens haviam sido violentas, reforçando a gravidade dos crimes cometidos. Diante dos fatos e do reconhecimento do criminoso por parte das vítimas, os policiais deram voz de prisão ao suspeito, que foi devidamente informado sobre seus direitos constitucionais. O indivíduo e as partes envolvidas foram encaminhados ao 1° DP – Plantão Policial de Sumaré para a realização das providências legais necessárias.

title: الخارجية الأمريكية تعلق على تقرير حول استخدام الجيش الإسرائيلي للفلسطينيين دروعا بشرية
content: وقال باتيل ردا على سؤال حول تقرير لصحيفة "هآرتس" بأن الجيش الإسرائيلي يستخدم المدنيين الفلسطينيين دروعا بشرية خلال حربه في قطاع غزة: "نحث إسرائيل على التحقيق الفوري والشفاف في هذه الادعاءات ومحاسبة أي مرتكبين محتملين". وأضاف: "تتحمل إسرائيل مسؤولية الامتثال لالتزاماتها بموجب القانون الإنساني الدولي، ولكنني أريد أيضا التأكيد على أنها مجرد تقارير في هذه المرحلة، ولهذا السبب نشجع إسرائيل على النظر فيها". وكشف تحقيق لصحيفة "هآرتس" العبرية نشر أمس الثلاثاء أن الجيش الإسرائيلي يستخدم المدنيين الفلسطينيين دروعا بشرية خلال حربه في قطاع غزة، بعلم كبار الضباط. وأشارت الصحيفة إلى أن قوات الجيش تقوم بوضع المدنيين في مقدمة الوحدات التي تجري تفتشيا للمباني والأنفاق، مضيفة أنه في بعض الحالات استخدم الجيش الاسرائيلي الأطفال والنساء والمسنين دروعا بشرية. وهذه ليست المرة الأولى، حيث المرصد الأورومتوسطي لحقوق الإنسان في وقت سابق أنه ومنذ بدء العميات البرية للجيش الإسرائيلي في نهاية أكتوبر 2023، وثق عشرات الحالات التي استخدم فيها الجيش الإسرائيلي مدنيين فلسطينيين دروعا بشرية، وفرضت على بعضهم قسرا القيام بأعمال عسكرية تشكل خطرا مباشرا على حياتهم، بما فيها دخول بنايات أو أنفاق أو البحث عن متفجرات وأنفاق محتملة، إلى جانب احتجاز آخرين في منازل ومواقع في مناطق اشتباكات ما يعرض حياتهم للخطر، بما يخالف قواعد القانون الدولي الإنساني. المصدر: RT+وكالات

title: SOSOK Kepala BPIP Yudian Wahyudi, Minta Maaf Paskibraka Putri Lepas Jilbab Saat Dikukuhkan Jokowi

title: Lewis County AAUW event to benefit domestic violence and sexual assault survivors
content: Best-selling novelists Garth Stein, who wrote “The Art of Racing in the Rain,” and Olivia Hawker, author of “One for the Blackbird, One for the Crow,” will answer questions and discuss their writing journeys during the Lewis County branch of the Association of American University Women’s (AAUW) Evening with Authors on Friday night, Sept. 6, in Centralia. All proceeds from the event benefit Hope Alliance of Lewis County, which works with survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault. Tickets are $20 for adults and $15 for students. In addition to the panel, the evening features book signings by local authors as well as hors d'oeuvres, beverages and raffle baskets. Matthew Young, of Tumwater, an associate professor at Centralia College who earned a six-figure advance for his memoir, “Eat the Apple,” will moderate the evening panel. The event takes place in the TransAlta Commons at Centralia College. Doors open at 6 p.m. with the presentation beginning at 7 p.m. Both Stein, an internationally best-selling author and cofounder of the Seattle7Writers Seven, and Libbie Grant, whose pen name is Olivia Hawker, will be teaching at the 10th annual Southwest Washington Writers Conference. All proceeds from the conference benefit the Centralia College Foundation. Hawker will teach a master class on Friday, Sept. 6, consisting of two sessions: “Take Off Your Pants: Outline Your Books...

title: Cowboys Rumors: CeeDee Lamb Contract Offer 'Not Yet' at $33M AAV; Deal Not Close
creator: Scott Polacek
content: All signs reportedly point toward CeeDee Lamb having a new contract extension with the Dallas Cowboys before the start of the 2024 season, although the two sides have ground to cover. Clarence E. Hill Jr. of the Star-Telegram reported Wednesday "there is no doubt that a deal will get done" even though it "is not close to being completed" at this point. Hill noted that Lamb is looking for a deal close to the $35 million annually that Justin Jefferson received from the Minnesota Vikings. However, Dallas' best offer is "not yet at $33 million annually" even though people with the team believe the deal will be signed ahead of the 2024 campaign. The Cowboys only have so much leverage. After all, Lamb is in the middle of his prime at 25 years old and coming off an incredible season that saw him post career-high marks across the board with 135 catches for 1,749 yards and 12 touchdowns. The offense will be significantly worse if he is not on the field. What's more, the wide receiver market was front and center throughout the offseason with Jefferson, A.J. Brown ($32 million per year), Amon-Ra St. Brown ($30 million per year) and Jaylen Waddle ($28.3 million per year) all agreeing to headline contract extensions with their own teams. Lamb figures to be the next in line, and the NFC East team may want to consider itself fortunate that Hill reported Lamb isn't demanding to be paid more...

title: Gala Montes encara a Gomita por hacer trampa y perjudicarla en la prueba de líder | VIDEO
creator: mariana.garibay@razon.com.mx (Mariana Garibay)
content: Gala Montes no se detuvo en la noche del martes para enfrentar a Gomita después de que se enterara de que la ex payasita saboteó el juego del líder para evitar que su equipo tuviera la oportunidad de ganar el liderazgo esta semana. Fue en la gala del martes que les revelaron a los habitantes de La Casa de los Famosos México 2 que tanto Gomita como Ricardo Pérez , habían confesado que jugaron sin ganas para evitar que sus compañeros, quienes pertenecían al cuarto Mar y eran Gala Montes y Arath de la Torre respectivamente, tuvieran la oportunidad de ganar el liderazgo. Esto después de que por sorteo se eligieran las parejas, las cuales estaban casi por completo conformadas por alguien de Tierra y alguien de Mar. El momento fue revelado con los videos en los que tanto Peralta como Araceli Ordaz (nombre real de la comediante), confiesan que "no le echaron ganas" al juego para asegurarse de que sus compañeros no pudieran ganar nada. Si bien los conductores de la gala reprobaron el comportamiento y señalaron que no es aceptable que no se esfuercen en los retos por una cuestión de ética, no hubo más reprimenda para los creadores de contenido, quienes se defendieron como pudieron de los señalamientos y trataron de negar todo hasta el final. Incluso después de la transmisión de las imágenes, Gomita se defendió al asegurar que la prueba era azar y Mariana Echeverría...

title: “Le pone 8 mil pesos de la verde”: joven va a la gasolinera y desconcierta a la trabajadora con su petición
creator: Ivanna Alvarez Sandoval
content: MÉXICO-. Un video publicado en Instagram ha causado risas entre los internautas, mostrando un momento divertido en una gasolinería . En el clip, un usuario llega a la estación de servicio y, al ser atendido por la empleada, hace un pedido inusual: “ 8 mil pesos de la verde ”. La mujer, visiblemente sorprendida, le pregunta: “ ¿800 pesos? ”, a lo que el joven insiste: “ 8 mil ”. La escena se vuelve aún más graciosa cuando la empleada, desconcertada, repite: “ ¿8 mil pesos? ”. Justo cuando la confusión parece alcanzar su punto máximo, el usuario, al ver la expresión de asombro en el rostro de la mujer, decide aclarar que solo estaba bromeando . El video no tardó en generar una oleada de comentarios en Instagram . Algunos usuarios destacaron el tono de la conversación, comentando: “ Lo cuestiona en sinaloense ”. Otros no pudieron evitar reírse de la reacción de la empleada, escribiendo: “ Hasta voltea a ver el carro ”. Un usuario, impresionado por el ingenio del joven, lo apodó “ Don Comedias ”. Este video es un ejemplo más de cómo situaciones cotidianas pueden transformarse en momentos de humor que conectan con la audiencia en redes sociales, dejando una sonrisa en quienes las ven.

title: Tim Walz Is Gung Ho to Debate—but Vance Hasn’t Agreed (Yet)
creator: Corbin Bolies
content: CBS News proposed four new dates in September and October for a vice-presidential debate between Sen. JD Vance (R-OH) and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz —and Walz has immediately accepted one. “See you October 1, JD,” Walz posted on X in response to the CBS dates, which include Sept. 17, Sept. 24, and Oct. 8. It is unclear who will moderate the CBS News debate. When asked by Fox News host Laura Ingraham on Wednesday whether he would agree to face Walz in early October, Vance didn’t say definitively one way or the other. “I strongly suspect we’re going to be there on Oct. 1,” he said , but added that he would need to approve the conditions and the moderators. “We’re not going to do one of these fake debates, Laura, where they don’t actually have an audience there, where they don’t actually set the parameters in the right way where you can have a good exchange of ideas,” he said. “In other words, we’re not going to be walking into a fake news garbage media debate. We’re going to do a real debate, and if CBS agrees to it, then certainly we’ll do it.” CBS had previously planned on a debate between Vance and Vice President Kamala Harris, scheduled for either July or August, though those plans were scuttled when Harris replaced President Joe Biden as the Democratic presidential nominee. Vance said at an event last month that he was “kind of pissed off” he would not get the chance to debate...

title: Мбапе: Ние сме Реал Мадрид и нямаме ограничения
content: Килиан Мбапе стартира по впечатляващ начин кариерата си в Реал Мадрид, отбелязвайки първия си гол още в официалния си дебют за клуба. Това стана по време на финала за Суперкупата на Европа, в който "белия балет" надделя с 2:0 над Аталанта. С гола си французинът помогна на Реал да спечели първия си трофей за сезона. След мача Мбапе не скри радостта си и сподели колко дълго е чакал този момент. „Тази вечер беше изключителна. Да нося фланелката на Реал Мадрид и да играя пред тези фенове беше мечта, която се сбъдна. Победата беше от изключителна важност, защото Реал винаги трябва да побеждава. Много съм щастлив от това, че успях да отбележа. Това е важно за всеки нападател, но най-важното за мен беше удоволствието да играя в този отбор. Нямам търпение за следващите мачове, а днешният ден беше великолепен старт. Имаме страхотни играчи на всеки пост и тепърва ще се подобряваме. За мен това беше важна първа стъпка," коментира Мбапе. На въпроса дали си поставя целта да отбележи 50 гола през сезона, нападателят отговори с увереност: „Ние сме Реал Мадрид и нямаме ограничения. Ако са 50, нека са 50. Но най-важното е да продължаваме да печелим като отбор. Само така ще продължим да вървим напред. Надявам се да празнувам още много голове с този екип,“ допълни Мбапе.

title: Добрата форма на Sentinels на Световното продължава
content: Американският Sentinels затвърждава добрите впечатления, които създаде по време на груповата фаза на Световното първенство по VALORANT. Тимът спечели първия си плейофен мач срещу DRX с 2:0, след 15:13 на Sunset и 13:8 на Haven. С усепха отборът си гарантира завършек в топ 6 на турнира в Корея, с награден фонд 2.25 млн. долара, а при нов триумф Sentinels ще бъде на крачка от спора за световната титла. Now that's how you kick off playoffs! @Sentinels roll in strong with a 2-0 over @DRX_VALORANT ! #VALORANTChampions Sunset: SEN 15-13 Haven: SEN 13-8 pic.twitter.com/tO7FsDswZl — VALORANT Esports NA (@valesports_na) August 14, 2024

title: अयोध्येत चोरांचा सुळसुळाट, राम मंदिर परिसरातील 50 लाखांचे हजारो दिवे गायब
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: अयोध्येत दर्शनासाठी येणाऱ्या भक्तांची संख्या दिवसेंदिवस वाढत आहे. त्यातच अयोध्या प्रशासनाच्या हलगर्जीपणामुळे चोरांचा सुळसुळाट रामनगरी परिसरात वाढल्याचे दिसून येत आहे. राम मंदिराकडे जाणाऱ्या मार्गावर लावलेले 50 लाखांपेक्षा जास्त किमतीचे हजारो विजेचे दिवे गायब झाल्याने एकच खळबळ उडाली आहे. या प्रकरणी रामजन्मभूमी पोलीस ठाण्यात गुन्हा दाखल करण्यात आला आहे. अयोध्या विकास प्राधिकरणाने यश एंटरप्रायझेस आणि पृष्णा ऑटोमोबाईल्स या कंपन्यांना मंदिर मार्गांवर विद्युत रोषणाई करण्याच्या ठेका दिला होता. त्यानुसार मंदिराकडे जाणाऱ्या रामपथावरील झाडांवर 6,400 बांबू दिवे आणि भक्तीपथावर 96 गोबो प्रोजेक्टर दिवे लावले होते. त्यातील 3800 बांबू दिवे आणि 36 गोबो प्रोजेक्टर दिवे चोरीला गेल्याची तक्रार यश फर्मचे प्रतिनिधी शेखर शर्मा यांनी रामजन्मभूमी पोलीस ठाण्यात दिली. चोरी झाल्यानंतर दोन महिन्यांनी तक्रार अयोध्येतील राम मंदिराकडे जाणाऱ्या महामार्गाची 9 मे रोजी पाहणी केल्यानंतर काही लाईट्स गायब असल्याचे आढळून आले होते. परंतु या कामाचा ठेका देण्यात आलेल्या कंपनीच्या प्रतिनिधीने 9 ऑगस्ट रोजी पोलीस ठाण्यात यासंदर्भात तक्रात दाखल केली. चोरी दोन महिन्यांपूर्वी झालेली असताना तक्रार दाखल करण्यास उशीर का करण्यात आला? या प्रकरणात पुणाचा दबाव होता का? असा सवाल केला जात आहे. अयोध्येतील सुरक्षेवर प्रश्नचिन्ह अयोध्येतील राम मंदिर परिसरात कडेकोट सुरक्षा व्यवस्था ठेवण्यात आली आहे. संपूर्ण मंदिर परिसर सीसीटीव्हीच्या निगराणीखाली आहे, असे असतानाही प्रमुख मार्गावरील दिवे चोरीला गेल्याने अयोध्येतील सुरक्षेबाबत प्रश्न...

title: EDG взе китайското дерби във VALORANT
content: EDward Gaming победи Trace Esports в китайското дерби в първия плейофен кръг на Световното по VALORANT. EDG спечели серията срещу своите сънародници с 2:0, след 13:7 на Bind и 13:10 на Sunset. С усепха отборът си гарантира завършек в топ 6 на турнира в Корея, с награден фонд 2.25 млн. долара, а при нов триумф EDG ще бъде на крачка от спора за световната титла. От своя страна Trace запазва шансове за прогрес, но вече е в долната част на схемата и без право на грешка. EDWARD IS GAMING! EDG WINS THE BATTLE OF CN AT #VALORANTChampions SEOUL! pic.twitter.com/yJP3p0XHem — VALORANT Champions Tour (@ValorantEsports) August 14, 2024

title: Ето кой е играч на мача Реал Мадрид - Аталанта
content: Халфът на Реал Мадрид Джуд Белингам бе отличен като Играч на мача от УЕФА в двубоя срещу Аталанта, завършил с победа 2:0 за "белия балет" и донесъл на тима Суперкупата на Европа. Английският полузащитник изигра ключова роля в срещата, като впечатли с изявите си на терена и бе основен двигател на успеха. Белингам не само контролираше темпото на играта, но и асистира за втория гол на Реал, реализиран от Килиан Мбапе. УЕФА подчерта значението на неговото представяне, като отбеляза, че той е водил отбора си напред през цялото второ полувреме. "Той печелеше важни единоборства и правеше силни включвания в предни позиции. Показваше отлично владеене на топката и демонстрира лидерски качества, като същевременно асистира за решаващия втори гол," обясниха от футболната централа.

title: Намушкаха бащата на Ламин Ямал на паркинг
content: В сряда вечер в град Матаро, където живее семейството на младата футболна звезда Ламин Ямал, баща му Мунир Насрауи e станал жертва на нападение на паркинг. Според информация на La Vanguardia, Насрауи е намушкан и в момента е на лечение в болница в Барселона. След инцидента, Насрауи е транспортиран до медицинско заведение в каталунската столица. Лекарите съобщават, че състоянието му е стабилно и няма непосредствена опасност за живота му. Полицията в Каталуня активно работи по разследването на случая и вече е задържала заподозрян. Властите продължават да събират информация и да изясняват мотивите зад нападението, като усилията им са насочени към разкриване на всички подробности по случая.

title: La Supercopa de los récords: Ancelotti iguala a Miguel Muñoz en títulos y Modric supera a Nacho
content: El presente Real Madrid es una máquina voraz de ganar títulos, como ha demostrado este miércoles conquistando la Supercopa de Europa . Esto provoca que cada temporada, los supervivientes vayan superando a los que se han ido, como ha ocurrido con Modric . El croata, suplente en detrimento de Mbappé , ha dejado atrás los 26 títulos que había conseguido Nacho, ahora en Arabia Saudí . Y Carlo Ancelotti ha superado a toda una institución como Miguel Muñoz , que en una época en la que se jugaban muchos menos partidos, ha alcanzado al primer capitán que levantó la Copa de Europa en territorio blanco. Tanto Modric como Ancelotti tendrán hasta seis oportunidades más esta temporada para engordar su palmarés. Un curso frenético en el que el Real Madrid solo ha cubierto una séptima parte de los títulos por los que luchará: Liga, Copa del Rey, Supercopas de España y Europa; Champions, Mundial de Clubes y Copa Intercontinental. Un calendario agotador de más de 70 partidos que pondrá al límite la resistencia de un equipo que cuenta con una escuadra soñada que deberá aguantar la máxima exigencia. Por el momento, Camavinga ya ha caído en combate, después de lesionarse por una entrada de Tchouaméni, quien ocupó su lugar en Varsovia. También suplente Modric, quien después de renovar por una temporada más, sabe a la perfección cuál es su rol. La temporada...

title: مفاوضات الدوحة.. فرصة أخيرة لهدنة غزة
content: وأضاف ممثل الحركة أن نتنياهو غير مهتم بالتوصل إلى اتفاق ينهي الحرب بشكل كامل، واتهمه بالخداع ومحاولة إطالة أمد الحرب وتوسيعها على المستوى الإقليمي.. في المقابل أفادت مراسلتنا بأن نتنياهو قرر إرسال وفد كامل لمحادثات قطر يضم كلاً من رئيسي الشاباك والموساد ومسؤول ملف الأسرى في الجيش الإسرائيلي، في غضون ذلك قالت هيئة البث الإسرائيلية إن مسؤولين إسرائيليين ناقشوا الضمانات الأمنية اللازمة في حال التوصل إلى اتفاق بالانسحاب من محور فيلالدفيا ومعبر رفح.. وتوقعت الخارجية الأمريكية أن تحقق هذه الجولة تقدما وقالت إنها أبلغت من شركائها القطريين بتمثيل حماس في المباحثات ، وأفادت هيئة البث الإسرائيلية أن نتنياهو متمسك بشرطين هما البقاء بمحور فيلادلفيا وتفتيش العائدين لشمال القطاع.. فما هي فرص الوصول الى توافقات بشأن وقف إطلاق النار في قطاع غزة؟

title: La Supercopa de los récords: Ancelotti iguala a Miguel Muñoz en títulos y Modric supera a Nacho
creator: Denís Iglesias
content: El presente Real Madrid es una máquina voraz de ganar títulos, como ha demostrado este miércoles conquistando la Supercopa de Europa . Esto provoca que cada temporada, los supervivientes vayan superando a los que se han ido, como ha ocurrido con Modric . El croata, suplente en detrimento de Mbappé , ha dejado atrás los 26 títulos que había conseguido Nacho, ahora en Arabia Saudí . Y Carlo Ancelotti ha superado a toda una institución como Miguel Muñoz , que en una época en la que se jugaban muchos menos partidos, ha alcanzado al primer capitán que levantó la Copa de Europa en territorio blanco. Tanto Modric como Ancelotti tendrán hasta seis oportunidades más esta temporada para engordar su palmarés. Un curso frenético en el que el Real Madrid solo ha cubierto una séptima parte de los títulos por los que luchará: Liga, Copa del Rey, Supercopas de España y Europa; Champions, Mundial de Clubes y Copa Intercontinental. Un calendario agotador de más de 70 partidos que pondrá al límite la resistencia de un equipo que cuenta con una escuadra soñada que deberá aguantar la máxima exigencia. Por el momento, Camavinga ya ha caído en combate, después de lesionarse por una entrada de Tchouaméni, quien ocupó su lugar en Varsovia. También suplente Modric, quien después de renovar por una temporada más, sabe a la perfección cuál es su rol. La temporada...

title: Анчелоти: Мбапе се справи чудесно, трябва да играем като отбор
content: Треньорът на Реал Мадрид, Карло Анчелоти, изрази задоволството си след победата с 2:0 над Аталанта във финала за Суперкупата на Европа. За „белия балет“ това беше първият официален мач за сезона, и за наставника бе от изключително значение да започне кампанията с успех. „Беше много труден мач, особено през първото полувреме. През второто показахме по-добра игра, създадохме повече положения и успяхме да използваме пространствата по-ефективно. Винисиус демонстрира своите качества, а въпреки трудностите, успяхме да се справим. Аталанта игра дисциплинирано в защита и беше предизвикателство да намерим пролуки в тяхната защита. Все пак, това беше първият ни мач и съм радостен, че започнахме сезона по този начин,“ сподели Анчелоти. Италианският специалист не пропусна да похвали и новото попълнение Килиан Мбапе, който също остави своя отпечатък в мача: „Мбапе се справи чудесно, особено като за първи мач. Отборът ни е добре балансиран и с Джуд Белингам в състава имаме много качества. Важно е обаче да се научим да играем заедно като отбор. Но е обнадеждаващо да разполагаме с толкова талантливи играчи,“ допълни Анчелоти.

title: Longmont man charged with attempted murder in connection with stabbing
content: A man accused of stabbing a man in Longmont last month was arrested Tuesday. Frank Rogelio-Perez, 30, was charged with attempted first-degree murder – after deliberation, two counts of first-degree assault with a deadly weapon, first-degree burglary – assault, second-degree burglary – enter a dwelling, three counts of felony menacing with a real or simulated weapon, criminal mischief – $1,000-$2,000, child abuse – no injury and four parole violations. Rojelio-Perez is currently being held in custody and has a preliminary hearing on Sept. 5. According to an affidavit, around 3:08 a.m. July 20, officers were dispatched to a disturbance in Longmont. The Longmont Emergency Communications Center advised police that there was an open line with people yelling in the background, saying “get off me” and “I’m bleeding out.” Upon arrival, a woman told officers that Rogelio-Perez broke into their apartment and stabbed her boyfriend. She said that her boyfriend left the area on foot and was possibly being chased by Rogelio-Perez as he was no longer on scene, according to the affidavit. In an interview with police, the woman said that she was out drinking with Rojelio-Perez at a bar when her boyfriend picked them up and drove them to Taco Bell at 2220 Main Street. According to the affidavit, an argument took place between the three, causing Rogelio-Perez to exit the vehicle out of anger....
